Message:
Hi there, Im a long term resident at a WoodSpring Suites location in Quantico, Virginia over  months in total. I liked staying here so much I moved in. Im room . Ive contacted the front desk and let them know about a resident directly below me who keeps ... pestering me by knocking on the roof with what I can only think is a broom. Its  PM on thanksgiving at the moment and whenever I even move the trash can, get in bed, sit in the chair, move the computer chair, open the refrigerator door or use the bathroom he starts ... banging on the roof as if Im being too loud for him. Im a single man just doing ordinary things. He even had front desk call me about a noise complaint at  PM today after simply getting in my bed. Im also a shareholder in your company because I like this place. Please ... take care of this. All times of the day hes knocking on his roof, my floor being nuisance. I could go as far to say maybe he is handicapped? Something needs to be done about it and I choose my room based on its location in the building so I will not entertain the idea of ... switching rooms. Ive let a front desk receptionist by the name of Katrina all ready know about the nuisance last week and yet he keeps on banging the roof and calling the front desk. Its  for crying out loud & I cant open the refrigerator door, get in bed or sit in the ... computer chair without this person banging on the roof or calling the front desk. Im pretty well known with the crew Joey, April, Katrina and Eric and can vouch for my character. Please do something about this as soon as possible. Its absolutely inexcusable harassment.  please check your DMs Ive sent you an urgent matter. Thanks! Thats not good enough for me. Your actually requesting someone that has been a customer for a year to move into another room rather then deal with someone who is banging on the hotel roof for no reason?    They didnt teach you customer service in school did they. Your boss will be hearing from me. Liz, 

Im a city dweller who liked the place so much I ended up moving in and just kept paying weekly. Ive been here sense last Christmas with only  weeks of a vacation in the middle. Front desk has been contacted as well as the General Manager. They were suppose to take care of it yesterday and yet again I woke this morning at  to use the restroom and crawled back into bed and the man started banging on the roof/ wall again as to tell me I was being too loud. Im even brought to say maybe the man below is handicapped. This is my permanent address. Im not up at the end of the week.       Im quite settled in and have been for going on  months (-) two weeks during a work trip to Louisville, Ky. I dont plan on moving. This may be a hotel to you but where I come from its a full fledged suite studio apartment with security all utilities included and I have a right to do everyday normal living activities without an absurd guest banging on the roof/ my floor at all hours of the day including PM having the front desk harass me for changing the trash and sitting the trash can back on the floor and moving the computer chair out far enough so I can sit in it. The correct action for customer service isnt to move to another room it should involve the mentally ill being put on the top floor or out of the establishment. Dont get me wrong Liz , the staff and general manager here are a fantastic group of people and Im not doubting their abilities to run the establishment properly according to your franchise agreement, just the first response came after I finally was in touch with the general manager and didnt agree with the way it was handled. Who ever stays in the room I am in will receive the same treatment from the gentleman downstairs and its not logical to just move me so we can continue to have the same issues I say we because i care about your company and its extensions as well. If your franchises do well it makes you look well and my stock price goes up. Ive been in management,  retail,  and customer service for over  years. This is coming from someone with massive amounts of experience not just a disturbed customer who books a room every now and then. Yes I know thats how a franchise works , I used to help open them, but the franchise directly makes your company, the company who sells out the franchise  have an image good or bad. I had no idea who choice hotels was but because I had such a great experience at Wood Spring Suites it made me want to learn more about it and it led me to you and Sandpiper and it led me to buying shares of your company which is investments and more money for the CEO , more money and bonuses to give out to its staff like you Liz. Creates more expansions for growing with the company as well all because I had a good stay at a franchise you sold rights too.  Maybe you should approach your business model a little different and become more involved in the contracts you create and more involved in the companies daily affair. Most franchise contracts or hotels sold still require the new owner to uphold standards. And lets be clear Its not about having a quiet place to rest after work. Its about the nuisance. I could care less if these people play music, have a party or tap dance in clogs above me but what I wont have is front desk calling me or having my floor knocked from underneath for simply sitting in a chair, taking a shower or laying in bed. Like I said before, the general manager knows and I woke up to pounding on my floor still. Have a good night.

Message: Comfort Inn in Turlock CA is a perfect location if you dont want to be bothered with feeling secure. Im honestly still in shock that it cost me nearly $900 to stay with my family in this hotel. My husband joked that it seemed like they werent bothering to put any money back into the location and were waiting for it to just burn to the ground and rebuild. Our security latch was flimsy from being reconstructed from what I can only assume was kicked in on several occasions. Our shower curtain was torn all along the top, the linens were thread bare, our comforters had rips and holes, rusted bathroom light fixtures, peeling wallpaper and chipping paint, holes in the curtains, stuffing coming out of the couch cushion and springs poking into my sons back from the sofa sleeper mattress. The security card swiper to get into the hotel was broken so any bum off the street had access into the building. The elevator control panel was broken with visible wires and the door handle to the stairs was completely gone, they were using some wire to hold it open. If I could post the pictures I absolutely would, feel free to message me through FB if your planning to stay there and see whats waiting for you. There are definitely much better and SAFER places to stay for the same price or cheaper. Hi Grettel, I appreciate your apology. Normally I do not write reviews unless they are positive but in this situation I felt completely duped considering the rating the hotel had on booking.com. Here is a screen shot with the information you requested and the reservation was under my name, Kristin Freeman. We also paid the additional pet fee of $120. Chuck Schaaf thats super disappointing to hear, I was kind of leery on their response. I agree it is an insult considering what we paid. My husbands response was why the hell would we want to stay in one of their hotels again!?. Im sorry you had a bad experience too. Apparently its a franchise thing but if thats the case there should be standards.
Summary_T5_1: The Comfort Inn in Turlock CA is a perfect location if you dont want to be bothered with feeling secure. My husband joked that it seemed like they weren't bothering to put any money back into the location and were waiting for it to burn to the ground and rebuild. Our security latch was flimsy from being reconstructed from what I can only assume was kicked in on several occasions.
Summary_T5_2: hotel paid us extra fee says iââm leery my husband

Message:
Be fully aware of these promotions. They offer such sweet deals, but with a lot of red tape.
I booked for the Thanksgiving holiday, as I have for the past ten years. Same city, same hotel... originally my bank account was debited over $400 for a stay that started on Sunday, even though I did not arrive in this town until Tuesday. Thankfully desk clerk resolved & returned the money to my account. 
I then paid for  nights, but didn't qualify for the "stay + nights get  points"  points promo. 
Decided to extend my stay for  more nights......couldnt do that, had to break it up into  stays, I'm sure to prevent another points promo "Stay  nights  points", and could not book the extended  days into one, promo "stay  nights for % off,. Had to book each night individually. And no one in Customer Service could solve the problem/issue. Just a lot of foreign language apologies. Ridiculous customer service solutions & promo programs. 
And I am a "Diamond Member". What a joke. Choice Hotels will do Good morning to respondents Numas  &  Liz. This is Anita Mae Johnson (Perry), member # AXP21240, been a,member since . This message is in response to my Facebook comment. 
Attached you will see what it is I'm talking about. Keeping in mind that #1- I live almost  miles from Nampa, Idaho; #2- I have been staying at this particular hotel for over ten years,  several times per year, #3- I am supposedly a "Diamond" Member which obviously means nothing in loyalty. 
And the topper on this particular episode, was that I had called on Monday morning before my arrival, to let Daisy know that I would be there the following day, Tuesday  /24. She told me they had me checked in, and I stated that was impossible as I was still at home working. She said she would fix it. 
I arrived on Tuesday /24 to check in, no reservation was on record for me, but fortunately Michelle had a room left for me, I checked in, swiped my card for  daybstsy @ $185.22. All was well. Until the following day when I noticed that my bank had been debited for $426 from Sleep Inn in Nampa! This was very upsetting, I contacted my bank & Michelle, and the money was returned to my account that day via my bank. 
I then decided to stay extra nights, because sometimes plans change,  (my children live all around the area & waiting to see who can spend time with mother is never guaranteed. ) Therefore I paid another $82.08 for Friday /27, because I could not extend my stay at the rate I checked in with, and same thing for Saturday /28 for another $82.08  All was well, I checked out Sunday /29 & headed home. When Monday came around I noticed the $426 charge had been debited to my account again, and credited back only $357. 
I contacted my bank as to how this is happening. She stayed that the merchant... Sleep Inn, kept denoting my account and she wanted to talk to the merchant. They would not talk to her.
These are the things that frustrated me with  not only the promotion play, but that money was taken from my bank account, on a cancelled card, without my authorization, and in was charged for a "no-show" when I had called to say I would be there /24. Choice Hotels 
As requested, I sent you a pm. No response. Not even read. I can share all the info here on your main page if you like.  Shay DaBaby 
Evidently  I fell for the same "send us a pm" b.s.. 
They never even read it.  Choice Hotels 
Thank you Liz for your response, not blowing me off, and not sending a computer generated apology. 
Have a safe, enjoyable, and Merry Christmas & Happy Holidays. Still no response Still no resolution. Choice Hotels good morning "Liz" & "Numas". I sent the requested information, along with copies of invoices. No one as of this date, has even looked at them.  It appears I am not the only disgruntled customer. And yet NOTHING has been done to resolve the issue.  This merchant debited my bank account, with an old card number to the tune of $426. Hello Liz. Then, as a representative of "Choice Hotels", and their "Choice Privelages" program, you surely can explain to me as to why I did not receive the extra ,000 Bonus points for staying three plus nights in a row? And why I did not receive the Extra ,000 Bonus Points for staying + nights?  This week was broken up into  different stays. One  night stay, one  night no show charge, and two additional night stays. Thank you Liz, I appreciate your professional courtesy, and ypur prompt attention to this matter. Have a Merry Christmas my friend.
Summary_T5_1: This is Anita Mae Johnson (Perry), member # AXP21240, been a,member since. She has been staying at this particular hotel for over ten years, several times per year. But when she arrived in Nampa, Idaho, on Tuesday, she noticed that her bank account had been debited for $426 from Sleep Inn. The next day she found out that her bank had been debited for $426.

Message: My name is Steven Gray. I recently started working for the Comfort Inn and Suites in Laramie Wyoming. Can someone please pass along I love what Pat, you, the entire staff, and organization are doing during the pandemic. I love the company structure and the community I work with too. I have a lot of insight into the hotel community in General. Go figure this would be the last one I would end up joining the membership program to. I look forward to watching the company grow and evolve. Appreciate all the training and hope there will be opportunities to advance within the company as I finish up my education. I have elite status at several other hotel chains and spent the better part of k attempting to create a business through the Marriott chain. I may no know everything but that is my view of life in general. Constant learning. I am just saying I know what makes the other chains special to me and why I would still choose to stay with them from time to time. To match what they have created may not be possible but to solidify this company as the third best and first when it comes to a starting place for those entering into the hospitality industry you are well on your way. Here is one free suggestion (the rest I want a consultation fee- kidding well partially maybe a donation to charity : ) They say location, location, location. Which the Marriott and Hyatt have the cities covered. Even some resort locations but there are what I will call mid-remote  locations that are part of what one of my coworkers just said she was in school for- outdoor tourism and travel that would be easy to acquisition. Bonderant, Alpine, Thermopolis Wyoming here in this state. Places like Rifle, Sagwatche, and the western slope in colorado, but what would I know I am just a dog. Sorry about the spelling. Do you have a fetch it and light up ball btw. They are the best christmas gift for a dog. nice decoration... I like the color Wait gray said thats a terrible idea. Besides who you gonna get to manage it? The people there are not very welcoming if your not from Wyoming and it snows a lot. Besides who is gonna want to travel to a destination thats remote, away from people, and in a beautiful location.
Summary_T5_1: Steven Gray has been working for the Comfort Inn and Suites in Laramie, Wyoming. He says he loves what Pat, you, the entire staff, and organization are doing during the pandemic. Gray: "I am just saying I know what makes the other chains special to me"

The bed frame was finally fixed today but it took way too much effort on my part as a guest for that to happen so late. Nor should we have had to transfer rooms as many times as we did all with problems and no assistance. Its like nobody cares at that hotel!! Also we have no where else to go. I dont have a ton of extra money to keep booking different hotels! None of this should have ever happened and when it did it should have been addressed immediately not  -  hrs later. The manager has not contacted us at all. Nobody told me this until just now and i have told everyone i spoke with i wanted a refund or a credit! I will definitely NEVER stay at ANY of your hotels EVER again! Message:
Is it possible to discuss some of the bad experiences I've had at your hotels this week? I understand its a pandemic and we all should expect things to be imperfect. However it seems many people are using the situation as an excuse for unacceptable service. I was promised a hot meal and the Comfort Inn in Yulee provided no coffee or any food other than individually wrapped cold muffins. All I asked for in return was a credit to my easily researchable account. I WAS  a regular customer. A loyal customer. Then in Savannah, the Quality Inn there was unapologetic after there were no towels in my room. I'm not sure what its about, in the hectic day and age just about anything can trigger an attack or passive aggressive antagonism. But I'd like to ask youre management team whether that situation is acceptable to them, especially since I am not planning to visit Choice Hotels ever again at this point. Thank you in advance for your reply.
 Respectfully, Dan Dixon Great, but what will you do for me? I'm registered on that enough? I have downloaded the receipts, where can I send them? It looks like they put a $30 charge for my room in Savannah too. I didn't even take a shower there so I'm not sure why. Is this just a joke? So obviously this means you don't care. I guess I'll go higher up the chain. And really, $30, for what? Just need to know where to send the receipts. You suck. Why would you make a lifelong unhappy customer? Confusing stuff. Thanks for your fake concern.

Message: Why are you not able to give a refund when I stayed at a clarion? I have filed a legal claim and now and being pushed to the side since July of this year!! Joe, I arrived on July rd for a one night stay in a jacuzzi suite. I normally travel to your other locations throughout the summer but due to covid I choose to stay in my hometown of Evansville, IN. I should have left town or booked a different hotel because this stay was my worst nightmare! I checked in and was told there would be no breakfast as was promised when I made the reservation(during covid). I was willing to look past it because Im understanding. After getting settled in I went to the pool. As I stepped on the ladder in the deep end the entire thing collapsed on me caused me to hit my knee on the side of the pool, scrap my leg and fall all the way to the bottom. I was unable to get help so my friend went to the front desk and got someone. He told me there was nothing he could do. After waiting a few moments and with the help of my friend I made it back to my room. I called the customer complaint line and they told me this was a legal complaint and gave the the complaint number . They then told me I would have to speak with the manager about a refund if I was unable to speak with someone to give them a call back in the morning. The manager was not working that night and told me to ask for her in the morning. When I checked out they told me the manager was not on site and they would take my name and number. I waited two days before calling the hotel and then the hotline. I have been getting the run around since-since JULY!! I have been calling the hotel only to hear the manager is not in. I will take your name and number and have them call you. I have a business card for Manisha R with an email of  I have emailed her every week since this happened. The customer service at choice has offered me credit for a night stay-that is not what I want. Im so tired of getting the run around with choice and clarion not returning my phone calls and emails. I have talked to an attorney who will take my case but Im trying everything I can do to not involve him. I will include screenshots of my reservation. I also have pictures of the broken ladder and my injuries. I hope you understand I have exhausted all my efforts on this case and my next step will be an attorney or going public with this matter until I receive a refund and compensation for this. Thank you for your time Joe.
Summary_T5_1: Joe has filed a legal complaint and is being pushed to the side since July. He was staying at a clarion in Evansville, Indiana when he got into trouble. The manager told him he would have to ask for a refund if he couldn't get help. When I checked out they said the manager was not on site and would take my name and number and had them call me.

Message:
Arrived a little while ago. Reviews must not be real. Floors are so sticky (literally, in the room's entryway and the bathroom). Notepad greasy. Both mirrors smeared and dirty. Didn't make it FEEL very clean, especially with the huge roach on the wall. But they say the remote is clean! Unfortunately the cardboard holder the remote is sitting in is very sticky, and dirty. I can't say we feel comfortable staying here in the midst of a pandemic. I don't believe that they are cleaning to the level they say they are. This was a mistake. This is to Joe who responded to my post on the feed. The reservation is in the name of Dan Tulloh. We are members, though I don't have any of that information with me. We checked in yesterday /4 and sadly we're here till tomorrow. If I hadn't have made an uncancelable reservation we'd have been out of here last night. Clearly I made an error in my reservation. Last year we stayed about a quarter mile away at the Sleep Inn and it was just fine. When I made this reservation I thought I was making it at the same place.

The clerk was thoroughly and difficult to understand and not helpful at all last night. I made a list of what's bad and what's good and I'm going to see if I can attach it here.

Thank you for the opportunity to say something. I don't even walk  in my bare feet here. I wore shoes to the bathroom and hate to touch anything.

Thank you. I think for $10 or less per night we could have stayed at that Sleep Inn that was very nice last year and I would have gladly paying it last night.

Oh, and we have a non-smoking room but you can smell cigarette smoke all the way to the door. Last night it started seeping into the room and when I called the front desk (when the room phone didn't work) using my cell, the desk clerk told me it wasn't smoke it was just a spray they spray. A spray that smells like cigarette smoke? I don't know who would even make a spray that smells like cigarette smoke.

Super disappointing. We had switched over to Choice from Hampton but I don't know after this. I also, due to the poor cleaning, hope that we don't get the Coronavirus from staying here. We provided our feedback within the hotel. The same unfriendly person was who we spoke with Saturday evening. The floors were cleaned better Saturday. The rest was still dirty. We have no plans to stay there again. The employee who was working there Friday and Saturday night (vmehta, according to our receipt) does not belong in a customer service role, in my position. This was an awful experience and I'll be sure to go to a different hotel the next time. I have also emailed the manager but there were no changes aside from the floor being cleaned. Thank you. I spoke with my husband and we will accept this-disappointing not to receive any sort of apology from management, though. Dan Tulloh,  -207-5231,  Red Field St, Cary, NC, , # (from our receipt, so I hope this is what you need) . Thank you. When should I log in to see the points? Thanks! Joe, thank you very much for your help. I do appreciate it.
Summary_T5_1: Clearly I made an error in my reservation, says Dan Tulloh. The clerk was thoroughly and difficult to understand and not helpful at all last night. This is to Joe who responded to my post on the feed.
Summary_T5_2: stayed hotel room smells like cigarette smoke

My only hope is that these people are penalized and charged accordingly so that in the future they might reconsider their actions. Although you and I both know that's not going to happen. You guys should investigate in smoke detectors that will detect it and go off at least that way you can pinpoint the perpetrators easier   Oh I'm agreeing that I for the most part don't want anybody to have to deal with my second hand smoke I do my best to be courteous about it. Message:
I need to let your company know I believe there is a problem at one of your hotels. Ive stayed in many different hotels under you guys from Comfort Inn to Clarion and probably most under you guys. However, none have been so rude and unhelpful as the Comfort Inn in Redding ca. I simply want my deposit back and it has become an act of congress to even get the manager to come to the phone. After almost  weeks since our stay, I am getting very upset with what seems to be a big run around. Can you help? No, its not been resolved. My name is Jennifer Cole. My family and I stayed at the Comfort Inn off Mistletoe in Redding, ca on Dec th . We stayed one night, we were put in room . I used the Hotels.com app to secure the room. I also did not use the same card at check in as I did when I made the reservation. I chose to instead use my American Express Debit card ending in . 
 I didn't put enough cash on the card to cover both the room and deposit. However, when I originally went to check in, the lady checking me in, erroneously told me the charge wouldn't go through at the time, I agreed to go add more funds, and I did. 
 When I came back to the hotel after adding funds, there was a different lady at reception, and she didn't quite understand why I was leaving more money, as the card HAD in fact been charged $98.76 i believe. She then charged me another $57.50 for the deposit. 
 It has been nearly a month since we left the hotel. I would say since we checked out, however, after standing at reception to check out for several minutes and noone to be found anywhere, we walked out and left. We never got a receipt for the original $98. Nor the $57.50 until a week or so ago when I started asking where is  i did get a case number and the receipt from when we first tried checking in.
 The case #10105143 that was given to me by the  #.
 After calling the hotel itself and asking for a manager, I was told for over a week that I *just missed him* I finally got to speak to him late last week. He was extremely rude and very condescending with me and claimed his name is *Dan*. He also claims I never paid the $57.50 and had i, then I need to take it up with my bank. Ive called my bank multiple times, however, because the charge has never been cleared by the hotel, there is nothing the bank can do. I need the hotel to refund it back as we've done zero damage to the room we stayed in. Dan says there's no record of this charge. 
 The  # (800-300-8800) they also have called the hotel and came bk to me saying there is nothing they can do either. They did send me a copy of the original receipt, not the second one for the amount I am still out, $57.50. Monday, the th, will mark  month of dealing with this. I am very upset. I will NEVER stay in that hotel again. I really hope someone does some internal investigating on this particular hotel. I have never been treated so rudely while at a hotel nor after a stay. It is pretty sad when half the reviews mimic exactly what I am saying here. This needs to be fixed asap, please! No, this is definitely YOUR hotel, not my bank. Also, the th thru the th is more than  days. And yes, your hotel did release my funds from the ORIGINAL transaction. They don't recognize the second transaction. Ive had my bank many years, and their hands are always tied until the business releases the funds. Now I see your entire chain of hotels is a joke, there is zero care to your customers and I will never stay in another one of any of your Choice Hotels. How does one go about contacting someone above manager Dan at that particular hotel? They are rude and uncooperative. They will not work with me and have been very accusatory towards me. This is why I now have my own attitude. I do apologize. However, the lack of willingness to help me resolve this issue is astounding by this hotel's management. I tried to do the right thing and made  payments to that hotel. 
 I would love to communicate with someone at the corporate level. This is terrible business on that hotel's part. 
 Thank you anyway for at least trying to help me. I understand it is out of your control. 
 I do want to leave a positive comment about the Comfort Inn in Shasta Lake, ca . Just up the road from the above problem one. They have had us a few times as patrons. They have always been very pleasant and easy to work with.  The hotel itself is pretty nice and the beds and amenities have always been perfect for my family and myself. The employees are always approachable and easy to find, unlike the above hotel off Mistletoe in Redding, ca. Kudos to the management and all employees at the Comfort Inn in Shasta Lake. Theyre doing it right.

Message:
These "points" systems are ridiculous! After being put on hold with two different people from the corporate number I received an email saying they can offer me points instead of a refund....I have emailed the pictures of the moldy AC, Bed bugs and moldy toilet-this didn't include the stained sheets of god knows what, the lazy hotel staff and greedy hotel "owner" says he will not refund.....that is okay....because these pictures will be shared all around if we do not receive a full refund. It is very sad that you think that you can offer "points" to stay at another one of your hotels. From living in the capital city of Florida......I promise you will lose a lot more business than the pandemic can offer.  :54 PM (2 hours ago)
to me

Hello Jennifer,
 
First, I hope you're having a safe and wonderful day and may this email finds you well. 
 
Our commitment and top priority is our guests health and safety during this time of pandemic. I apologize that you had to deal with all this issues during your stay.
 
It is disappointing that you are unable to enjoy your stay because of the condition of the room. Rest assured, your comments have been duly noted under the case number .
 
I would love to have another opportunity to show you how great it can be to stay with Choice Hotels. I am not able to process a refund directly to your credit card as each of our hotels maintains their billing transactions independently of Choice Hotels. We usually offer refunds thru check, however our staffing has been affected by the COVID crisis which means theres no one to process it at the moment.
 
As an alternative, I would like to offer you ,000 points instead. This is the fastest method as you will receive them within  hours and are redeemable immediately after they've been accepted. These points can be used towards free nights, gift cards and more. To help us finalize the process, please respond to this email with your acceptance.
 
and include the following information.
 
- Full Name
- Home address
- Phone number
- Birthdate (mm/dd)
 
I appreciate your understanding on this matter. I am looking forward to your response.
 
Again, I am truly sorry you had a frustrating experience with a Choice branded property, but I hope you will give us another chance next time you are in need of a place to stay. Thank you for your continued patronage with Choice Hotels. 
 
Sincerely,
 
Charisse
 
Your Customer Care Advocate
Guest Relations Department

 
cc: AL035,  This is the email I recieved I am not happy with receiving points I do not want points If you check your corporate email you can see the pictures that I sent Arrival date /05/2021-check out /07/2021 andalusia alabama John W. Dubose guest John & Jennifer Waugh The hotel directly told us that we must have brought the bugs So you should see and understand how I am requesting directly from your corporate services as they are not willing to work with me. How about this since the room was booked for two nights-you send two nights worth of stay? at any hotel Or make it three for the troubles!!!! The laundry mats washing, the anxiety of the bugs coming home, the throwing away a very sentimental suitcase that my grandmother bought for me for my college graduation (who is now deceased). The bombing spray that we had to purchase to spray our our vehicle, the continuous vacuuming of the vehicle-I could go on. John Waugh  Conrad Hills Road, Havana, FL  -879-1710 /27/1982 We do not have a choice awards program JXW171019 Just created one I doubt the manager will care or do anything :(. thank you for your help. I sure hope the health department gets involved so that he will clean his act up. Sandra Peat-keaveny the Quality Inn-Andalusia Alabama

When I asked for his name he told me he was nameless and he told me that he was going to call  to have me removed from the property. Please let me know that someone has actually seen this. The owner call the police last night to evict us and stopped by our room this morning to remind us checkout was at . The only staff at the hotel since we checked in Friday morning was the manager.  As I've said said he was not willing to provide anything to make my stay safe or pleasant.  He also would not provide his name,, saying he had no name.  There was no housekeeping at all during our stay.  Just in case, I have photos of the state we left the room in. 

We have made an online reservation at a Comfort Suite in Buda, TX. It should be at least double that since we had  nights with no heat.  

Also, safety standards were not met.  Emergency lighting in the hallways and stairwells failed so stairwells were pitch dark.  We bring flashlights when we travel but other guests did not have them.  The manager's solution was open firedoors. The member number is JXC13960
Name: Jeff Clark
Phone: -214-4227
Email:  
Address:   Queens Way N, Stillwater, MN  I do want to know that you will follow up with the manager of that property.  Calling the police to evict a customer who did nothing illegal is beyond the pale.  He needs to know that corporate is aware and there need to be consequences.  

There also needs to be corrective and preventive actions taken on the safety issues.  At one point he said to me that the generator would not start.  Later he said that there was no generator and had not said that.  It would seem that a generator to keep emergency lighting working is appropriate.

In a conversation before the power went out he told me that he had been asked by the city to house some homeless people during cold snap but had refused stating, "I don't want those people in here."  Since keeping paying customers safe was not a priority, that is not a surprising response but a disappointing one.  People in Texas are suffering with the cold weather.  When one has the resources to help they should. Thank you.  We are currently at another Choice Hotel in Buda, TX, and I have nothing but good things to say about this stay.  There is staff on site who are working hard to make the best of a bad situation.  There was a problem with the heater in our room.  Maintenance diagnosed the problem quickly,  replaced the faulty part and made certain it was working properly before leaving our room.  This property gets an excellent rating in my book.

Message:
Be careful when booking with Woodspring. I recently traveled to Beaumont, TX for work. Booked three days and paid daily, then extended a week. After  days in my week I got a call from work requesting that I switch cities. I assumed there would be a charge to switch my reservation to the nearest woodspring suites but was advised thats not possible. All in all i ended up paying  for exactly  week at the most mediocre place ive ever stayed. The staff has absolutely no compassion or could care less that I am in their town to help their people. Meanwhile I feel like i got robbed. Never. Again. Be. Careful.  Thank you for getting back to me regarding my comment. I arrived at Woodspring, Beaumont tx on /20 and originally booked until /23 on a daily rate which came out to .76. My company acorn claim service advised I would be in town for a week due to the freeze so I booked at the weekly rate on /24 for .45. I then got a call stating they needed to relocate me to Galveston, tx and I would need to check out /29. I went to the front desk to see if we could work anything out (ie charge me  days at daily rate. Or  days at the day rate on my new reservation and refund the difference. Im aware I signed a non-refund policy so Im probably out of luck but I truely feel like there should be some consideration in certain scenarios. I paid  for an  day stay. If you would like to discuss my phone number is . Thank you for listening. WoodSpring Suites I appreciate you taking the time to respond. I have sent my booking details in a private message for review. Best regards.  WoodSpring Suites Thank you!! After receiving your response I know I will definitely not stay here again. I am sick to my stomach.    Ok. I was really hoping something could be done. Obviously Im
Not trying to pull a fast one. Just thought your company would try to be fair. Meh overpaying just hits you in the gut. At least I wont forget you guys.
Summary_T5_1: Woodspring, Beaumont tx is the most mediocre hotel I've ever stayed in. The staff has absolutely no compassion or could care less that I am in their town to help their people. Meanwhile I feel like i got robbed. Never. Again.

All in all i ended up paying  for exactly  week at the most mediocre place ive ever stayed.

Man, whos in charge of these places? Spoke to a manager to try and work something out at the Sleep inn in Lubbock Texas and their customer service is less than one star to keep in cordial. I believe this is all the information you requested. Choice Hotels just did  So you asked me to message private just to keep people in the dark then didn't even respond?  That's shady. I'll make sure to let everyone know how my service with not only myself, but the  other families I convinced to take refuge in your hotel  had.... mind you we all had the same service! Choice Hotels your website states some sites may not have certain amenities... if there are not available why not take them off so that theres no miscommunication? I convinced  other families...  with my own to stay at your hotel and once I got there found out you had no pool cause of covid. Ok... I can give that a break but then found out from another guest that you guys didn't have breakfast either. Wasnt  even told about this when I check in either!  Then when I brought my concern up to your desk agent I was basically told it's my fault for not asking!  This seriously  was disturbing as your site doesn't exactly say what hotels have what. Then I asked what they could do to resolve these issues and was told those amenities were free so no discount could be made for anyone. Not to mention one of my family's had their rook flooded and was moved from a  queen bed room to a  queen with a pull out couch. I was called by the manager from your branch to be told again that was not their fault and nothing could be done. I seriously disagree with that and hoped this could be resolved in a more cordial manner. Unfortunately... here we are.  Guys look for my previous post before checkin in to these places Jessica Williamson beware... look for my previous post What is ,000 points?? This was our first time staying somewhere other than a Holiday inn for their outstanding service. Sorry you think this was just about me but as I mentioned, I'm the secretary/travel coordinator for the #SAOUTLAWSBASKETBALL team and I was the one who made sure myself along with  other families booked here instead of Holiday Inn for once in our travels.  I would hope I wasn't the only one being compensated. Let me get with them tonight and I'll get back to you with their information as well. Where do the points get deposited?? Ok and what information do you need from the other families?  I'm not sure because I didn't send it all to you individually.  I just sent you my whole itinerary. And where do we go to find out how to redeem our points I would like info on places to stay in Corpus Christi, texas please and how to use points there? The link I only saw stores Then why not issue all the constituents at least  for the amount we at least spent on the whole family for the  nights  mornings there. I'm sure we would all be willing to look past this incident and continue forward with new stays with yall as the new hotel of choice in the future instead of Holiday Inn? How much money is  points for a night? Because I'm sure we will still have to pay out of pocket so I know? If you issue  amd the room cost ... how much will I need to pay out of pocket is what I was asking? Goodafternoon.  The other person's information is here. Choice Hotels Res Conf#  for /12/21  PM at Sleep Inn & Suites, Lubbock, TX. The other  already got in contact with corporate with their issues as well. It would be a lot better if we could at least be issues  credits each so we don't come out of our pockets on out next  or  night says. Just depends on what tournament or what city we end up going to next. Goodafternoon. Did mine get applied already? I have forward the information to the proper people. I do understand your point of view about this situation, Frantino. Keep in mind that due to the ongoing Pandemic some of the hotels' amenities were suspended. For example, on the website, you could find under the hotel's alerts that "Some hotel features, including fitness centers, pools, food and beverage, and other amenities may not be available at this time due to COVID-19" Nevertheless, your feedback is valuable to us; for that reason, we would like to increase our offer to ,000 points as a final offer for the issues faced. Should you find this offer, acceptable, please reply with your information so that we can deposit the points. -Numas And this was my information... what is it exactly that you're missing now? Like my home mailing address??  S. MONUMENTAL ST. 
SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS   . Please do not add me on any mailing lists nor add me to any automated phone messages. Ok thank you

Message:
Choice Hotels bologna! We had a problem with a Rodeway Inn. Called customer care twice. They did nothing!!! Told us to work it out with the hotel. What a joke. Weve been choice members for over  years. Wont stay at another choice hotel. Trusted hotels my butt!!! Will NEVER stay at another choice hotel again. Been members for over  years. We normally stay at comfort suites, but it was booked. We made reservations at a Rodeway inn because Phoenix was busy and that's all we could find. We got there at about  pm
 Stood outside in  degree weather for over an hour. My husband is  with a bad back and knees. I am .  The lobby was being used for storage. They had a window for check ins. The clerk was rude. She was the only one there on a  hour shift. She bad mouthed the owners and the hotel. Prostitutes and homeless were walking around the parking lot.  The hotel looked run down. A truck driver that stays there regularly said if anything is wrong with the room let the clerk know immediately or you wont get your deposit back. We finally got to the window to be told our room wasn't ready. Come back in an hour. We went to Walmart to buy disinfectant to clean the room. We returned to a long line. We called customer care to cancel our reservation. They tried to call the hotel. What a joke. We told them she was busy. She didnt answer. We left and were charged for the room. We have called customer care twice. They told us to work it out with the hotel. Trusted hotel my butt. You put your Choice Hitel name on a run down crappy hotel and dont stand behind it. Shame on you Choice hotels. You wont be my next Choice. Christine Washington forgot to mention they were charging $140 for a room that wasn't worth $60 because phx was booked for spring break and spring training.  Choice Hotels Gretel we have done this twice already. Customer care did nothing to help us. They called the hotel the first time and got no answer. The second time we called you the desk clerk answered and told you guys the manager was not available. Customer care told us to work it out with the hotel.  It has not been resolved. Conf #  rodeway inn -20-2021 Cornelius Washington     choice member cxw032631 member since . We have called you twice for help resolving this. You haven't been there us, and you took our money and we still dont have our points. We want our money back. Liz, I provided my phone number and priviledge number in the message I sent. We paid an extra  dollars to get  points we didn't receive. So yo are offering us  points. We will accept the  points..807 w Simmons rd tucson az .  
Honestly if we paid for the points I dont see why we have to occupy the room to get them. We showed up twice to check in. The first time our room wasn't ready. The second time there was still a line to check in. It was for his birthday,  we planned dinner out, not the evening standing in line, at a flee bag overpriced  hotel. And my husband wanted you to know he called you guys  times today. Agent #1 called the hotel, after  minutes on hold he was hung up on. Agent #2 disconnected him after she started reading the notes on the account, #3 tried to help him but he couldnt get the hotel to answer after  minutes. This isn't the first time we had problems. I paid for a room in Mississippi and near the Grand Canyon in AZ. we were denied our points because I paid with my credit card and the choice privileges is my husband's name. Have a great day. Thanks for your help

Message: Sounds good until you leave something behind and the manager, who was COMPLETELY not helpful tells you your wrong (even though they show at his hotel). I asked for camera footage, denied. And I asked for his bosses number and he refused. So if you stay in these hotels, dont leave ANYTHING behind. Theyll keep it.   Hello. Below youll find a copy of my information. Heres what happened. Sunday morning I used my Apple airpods. When I got done I put them under a pillow. Well when we checked out I forgot them and did not notice until Tuesday I was missing them. I pulled up their location and it showed that hotel in Arkansas. I immediately called and the gentleman said hed get with the manager and give me a call Wednesday. Well Wednesday about noon I never heard from anyone so I called In. The manager asked me to call back at . So I did. He said he only has  housekeeper and his housekeeper never turned in anything. I told him I KNOW my airpods were left there. I know that for a % fact! And he said well let me ask my house keeper. So he did. I guess she said she never found anything (it was in a different language so I cant verify that) he then said hed go up to the room to verify but that room had been cleaned. I asked if he could pull cameras. He said no. I asked him if I could get his bosses number because my AirPods were left on the bed under the pillow. So not finding them wasnt acceptable. He said he was the only boss. I said youre the owner? He said no and refused to give me any more information. Eventually he started yelling and wouldnt let me talk. Im appalled by this service. My apple airpods by the way, have my name engraved on them. So the housekeeper or manager who took them from that room have my airpods with Chelsey Apple on them  Choice Hotels just messaged you! Message:
I have many issues with a room at the Quality Inn in Columbia, TN. The entire staff was rude and did not let me or my SO address concerns with management (thank you Tim) so here I am. Can we discuss in DM? Thank you. Some pics included from my room  Thank you for the reply! I just got off work but me and my partner are getting everything together now and will have everything sent in the morning. Hello! Thank you for the response. Since my partner is the one who booked and paid for the room, I let him write a summary of our experiences. As he does not have a Twitter, any further communication should be directed to him as the room was booked under his name, Derrick Johnson. His number is (269)447-3198. I am still happy to assist in any way I can via DMs since I was also in this room. I am not sure where the confirmation number is on our receipt, so Ive included a photo of our receipt with all requested information. 

I booked a room at this establishment and planned to stay for  days. When I arrived with my fiance, we were overjoyed since we have been looking forward to this trip. Once we arrived, everything looked fine. At least for the first hour. The longer we stayed in the room, the more we started to notice that wasnt right. 

On the first day, we saw what appeared to be blood stains on the carpet and on the ceiling. There were red stains on the carpets and yellow stains on the shower curtain. There were stains in the actual tub and stains in and on the walls around the hot tub, which we paid extra for. I talked to somebody at the front desk and they said that they had no other rooms with the hot tub. Since I paid extra for the hot tub, I wasn't going to take another room and not get reimbursed the extra charge for the hot tub. So we had to make do. My fianc actually took some of the provided towels and cleaned our hot tub herself since we couldnt be sure it was even clean.

The next day I got a hold of housekeeping and requested extra towels, new sheets and maybe a new comforter. I was told that out of the entire hotel, there was only one comforter for the king size bed that we had. And it was already on our bed with weird, brown stains. We did get additional towels and bed sheets at least. The housekeeper was kind, at least. 

As the days went on, more and more stains just started to appear. On the curtains, on top of the heater, and everywhere else that you could possibly imagine. There even seemed to be some black mold in the bathroom around the bathtub.

It pretty much got to the point where me and my fiance didn't want to be in the room unless we had to sleep. We didn't want the hot tub to go to waste, though. The fittings on the hot tub were really loose, coming off with the slightest touch. We made sure to clean it ourselves after every use after our first night. 

Half of the outlets in the room didn't even work, and one of them was even installed upside down. The ironing board had some stain or burn on it but that wasnt a big deal to us since we didnt need it, but it definitely didnt look fit to use. Our experience overall was just horrible. 

Upon checkout I simply wished to speak to somebody about the condition of the room. I didn't want to complain and I wasn't looking for a handout or full reimbursement. I simply just wanted to bring these issues up with the person responsible so they could be fixed. However, the person that I talked to at the counter, Tim, was very rude to me. When I asked to speak to somebody about the condition of the room, he immediately assumed I was looking for a handout since he said "you were in there five days and youre now just saying something.

The truth is, I said something on day one but was told that I couldn't be helped. So I had no other choice. I had already paid almost $500 for this room. I at first only wanted to address the issues with our room with management so they could get the proper cleaning and maintenance done for the next guest who books the hot tub suite. The staff was no help so I took to posting a review on the official website for the hotel, which theyve since deleted. That was the reason for reaching out to your company via Twitter. We have no issue removing the tweet at your request so long as some action is taken. 

We have a collection of  photos of just our room conditions, which can be sent via Twitter DMs or can be emailed.  Thank you again for the response. My fianc and I are going to decline the ,000 points. We still are not looking for a handout, a refund, points, or anything of that nature. We just want the hotel in question to look into the room we were staying in. No guest should have to question if the red stains on the ceiling, carpets, heating unit, and curtains are blood stains, especially in the middle of a pandemic. While the points are nice, it still wouldnt make up for how disgusting our room was, how rude the staff was once we had a complaint, or the fact I had to clean the room myself because of how unsure we were if its cleanliness. I understand housekeeping isnt perfect, things will be missed. But this was just unacceptable. My fianc feels a bit insulted that it seems you havent read the full last message I sent with the full details of how awful our stay was and just how rude your staff at this property is. We just want you to address this issue with your staff so this room is not in such horrendous conditions for the next guest who has to book a room there. At this point, we still would not like any form of points compensation because we will no longer be staying at Choice Hotels properties.
Summary_T5_1: The Quality Inn in Columbia, TN was booked under Derrick Johnson's name. He is the person who booked and paid for the room. After paying extra for the hot tub, he took some of the provided towels and cleaned it herself.
Summary_T5_2: my fianc takes towels cleans hot tub despite booking

The hotel staff is nice and the hotel is clean. The management is very good!! They stick to there policies and they will let nothing trough. I am out  dollars and hopefully this review will deter someone from making my mistake. 
So my mistake.  After a long drive I finally get to the hotel.  I went to hotels.com and accidentally booked a room a day in advance. I immediately call the hotel.com and after telling them about my simple error. Hotels.com called the hotel and the Comfort Inn stood by the policy. The policy is that I could not get a refund or change the date on the reservation to a future date. 
If I wasnt a good guy, I would invest heavily in Comfort Inn because in my opinion they take advantage of their customers when they make mistakes.  Theyre a big chain and instead of showing some discretion they have that power!! 
I am a good guy.  I am a human and make mistakes. I learned my lesson therefore I will stay away from all Comfort Inns and all there sister chains. I will tell my story. I made the mistake, and I want to make sure no one else falls into this trap. I am going to tell people to be careful when you walk into Comfort Inn. Be careful when you give them your credit card. Management doesnt care if you make a mistake. They are a big business and they need to protect that policy!! Now, in a few months. I am going to be speaking in front of thousands and thousands of people. I will tell my story and hopefully this message gets across. Stay away from Comfort Inn.
The staff was excellent super helpful, management is strict, and just be careful at the Comfort Inn on I40 Exit  in Gallup.  I stayed at the Comfort Inn at I-40 Gallup, New Mexico.The hotel staff was nice and the hotel was clean. The management is very good!! They stick to there policies and they will let nothing through.  
It was a long trip. I was exhausted. I stopped at Comfort Inn. I miss read the dates. The moment I realized it. It was to late. I hit submit and immediately regretted it. I called hotels.com for a refund or at least change the date. Hotels.com made me wait. 
Hotels.com told me that Comfort Inn will stick to there policy. I think someone needs to reconsider there judgment.  I think what Comfort Inn is doing is wrong. Comfort Inn will not give it back. Please give me my money back!  Save yourself some money and headaches.  dollars is not worth it. They make rules to take advantage of their customers. 
My advice stay away from Comfort Inn or any hotels on the Choice Hotels list.  What are you talking about? I did reply. 
No one responded back to me! Figures... a bot is answering these posts and direct messages. Check in date was Mon, March  thru March  :00pm check in time  night stay
Address was  W Maloney Ave, Gallup New Mexico 
Hotel Phone number # -726-2700
Confirmation Number 

I understand the policy. But the moment I booked. I realized my mistake and I immediately called someone to cancel. But it failed. So now I am telling everyone who I meet. About this situation. The name on the reservation is Jacob Staffa My arrival date was March . I booked it on March .

Message:
Welp. After being promised compensation weve gotten nothing. Not even an attempt to contact. So here we go. 

We arrived at the Quality Inn Kenly at about am this past Saturday morning. I had booked a drive up room because we had the baby and so many things to carry. 

I go into reception and the receptionist isnt wearing a mask. She checks me in and tells me were on the second floor. I show her my reservation she tells me she cant do anything and theyre booked oops oh well too bad. She also gave me another dirty pen after me telling her that the pen I had access to was in the dirty cup. After driving  and a half hours this was a bad start but whatever. 

We get up to the room and the entire thing REEKS of weed and cigarettes. We booked a non smoking room. 

On every surface is that lovely sticky stuff shown below. In every corner there are crumbs. Clearly the room wasnt cleaned. The pillows which I didnt get a photo of were STAINED  The floor (carpet) was STICKY 

I literally used my own blanket I was so disgusted. I felt like a bad mother letting my child stay in that room. But we didnt have a choice at that point. 

We make it through the night and I go to check out and... nobody is there. Says be back in . Im frustrated but theres a phone and it says to call if you need to so I did. 

I say I need to check out and she asks if I need a receipt leaving me to believe that had I not wanted one or had to talk to someone she would have just let us leave without checking out leaving us liable for anything. Big yikes. 

I tell her I dont need a receipt but I need to speak to someone and she said shed be there in a few minutes. She arrives and you guessed it NO MASK!! Mind you were in a state where its a law. This woman is sweating and breathing heavily in my face without a mask. I was holding my breath. 

So I go on to tell her about the experience. She lets me know the woman from the night before lied about giving us $25 compensation. Uhm? Anyway she seems genuinely sorry and disgusted. She starts crying and getting emotional. And Im like okay.... and she lets me know her mother passed away from covid. All while crying and leaking fluids from her face  feet from me WITHOUT A MASK!!!!!!!! At this point I just want my money back or something to be done. 

She tells me shes giving me her personal phone number and that she will be contacting people personally for me to get us a free room at any choice hotel on our way back because shes so sorry and this was so unacceptable. This is the assistant property manager btw. She takes my phone number and email and promises me up and down shell contact me both ways by Sunday night at the latest when it got less busy. 

Well. Its Thursday. No contact. No compensation. Im absolutely livid. Chelsea Crocetti. 
  S Church St. Kenly NC  That is acceptable. I am not a member so if you could create an account Id appreciate it. 

Chelsea Crocetti  Homberg Ave. 
Essex, MD  


    Thanks! When I try to click redeem points nothing happens. Am I able to use them today to book a room for tomorrow? Does an infant count as a child or should I just look with  adults Thank you
Summary_T5_1: Welp. After being promised compensation weve gotten nothing. Not even an attempt to contact the woman from the night before. She seems genuinely sorry and disgusted. She starts crying and getting emotional.

Message:
We are having a horrible experience with Choice Hotels.  My daughter has Covid and is in quarantine.  We are attempting to cancel her reservation.  We are being told no because it was pre-paid.  I will be writing to the State to let them know that Choice Hotels is not working with people who have Covid and we will NEVER pre-pay or use Choice Hotels again.    I've been on hold for at least  hours.  Started with the hotel and was told they could not refund since they couldn't even see the credit card info.  They said to contact Choice Hotels Corporate.  Corporate (after a lengthy hold) transferred me to customer Relations.  Customer Relations spoke to the hotel and they said I would need to call back to speak with the General Manager.  So I am back to where I started.  Horrible service and I will let everyone know that they should reconsider a stay with Choice Hotels! I understand that there are certainly restrictions on advanced purchases. But Covid has changed our world and companies have had to adapt to Accommodate things that are Beyond our control. She is in Quarantine and cannot travel. I would hope that Choice  Hotels would be more concerned about a customers health than making a profit on a room that wont be used.  No one has inquired about how she is at all.  I have spent two days on this now, trying to help her since she cant wait on hold for hours at a time due to how shes feeling.  Her reservation wasnt even for another nine days when I first called. Plenty of time to re-rent the room without any negative effect on anyone.  I will be waiting to see how this is handled.

Confirmation #. 
Jessica Alexander
Sleep Inn- Lake Bluff, IL
Checkin /9- Checkout /11 Please explain how we can change the arrival date when we have no idea how soon we can be healthy enough to travel? I did contact them- he stated that this non refund policy was set up by the owner to deal with multiple cancellations that were said to be Covid.  Bottom line is that we are being Penalized by the hotels desire to recoup lost dollars due to the Pandemic which is illegal.  I hope they do refund because my next step is to contact the State authorities
Summary_T5_1: My daughter has Covid and is in quarantine. We are attempting to cancel her reservation. We are being told no because it was pre-paid. I've been on hold for at least hours. Started with the hotel and was told they could not refund since they couldn't even see the credit card info. They said to contact Choice Hotels Corporate. Customer Relations spoke to the hotel and they said they would need to call back to speak with the General Manager.

Message:
I hope everybody on this feed read my post. I am a Diamond member who stayed frequently at their Choice Hotel in Henderson Nevada. A month ago I made reservations to stay  days in a row. I was told by an employee the manager made some negative comments bout me. During my stay my reservations were disrupted by the hotel meaning they canceled part of my reservation. That morning I got a Bill notified the front desk I had several days left to stay and they themselves canceled my reservations. After contacting the MGR they wanted to charge me about $30.00 more per night to rebook. I notified customer relations they contacted the hotel and resolve my stay. After a couple more days I left early and filled out a survey.

I received an email from the MGR asking me what was the problem. As a professional I stated kindly that an employee informed me negative things were said about me but I decided to just pray about it and told her if there is something I done wrong to please address me personally. I concluded with kind words and was willing to let it go.

Two weeks later I made reservations only to find out this young manager banned me. Now keep in mind I done nothing wrong but complained to customer relations and filled out a survey.

Choice executive contacted me  and finally got a response from the manager. The manager said I was banned because she has a video of one hour and a half of me mistreating her staff verbally and I was racist.

This is a Blatant lie and I ask that every member ask Choice Executive to get any video of me mistreating anybody. It a lie and a defamation of character. I replied I never had any altercation with anybody ever there. Second how in the hell am I racist? The staff is  percent Hispanic and the manager is a minority. I informed Choice that my family has various races of people and I am a minority! So Choice replied that it is true their staff of employees is what I stated and that I have a valid point.

I was banned because I contacted Customer Relations and completed a survey that was truthful but complimentary overall. So people i stayed over  plus nights throughout  in the Henderson Hotel Suite and the staff there like me very well. This young manager created a fabricated lie and now I am asking Choice Executives to review any video of my conduct. You know why Choice Executives have yet to receive the video? because there is not one of me of such nature. This is a lie and defamatory! I am a professional and a decent guy who treat people with respect. I want an apology and action against this hotel taken by Choice Executive! I am very offended! All because I filled out a survey and contacted Customer Relations to fix a problem they screwed up! Lj Smith read my post! I am staying with IHG as well! Choice Hotels I have I called your executive a few minutes ago! Just hurtful that a manager would defame my character and I have done nothing wrong but showed respect and kindness!  Choice Hotels I have privately sent your corporation emails. I do not wish to disclose the reference number publicly but please refer to Customer Relations Executives comments. Thank You! No its not resolved I will send you a response tomorrow. I already filed a complaint with Choice International Executives but if you cannot access that information I will send you my responses Arrival Date February ,  - March ,  but I was so unhappy I checked out on March , 

Hotel: Comfort Inn and Suites  Mark Street Henderson, Nevada

Name: TROY Collier

Confirmation Number: 

I was mistreated, defamed, and banned because I completed a Survey, I found out the manager made negative comments about me, and I contacted Customer Relations on March ,  because the Hotel cancelled my reservations. 

The hotel blatantly lied and defamed me by saying there is a video of me that last an hour and half or  minutes showing me verbally insulting their staff. The hotel called me a racist! These are defamatory hurtful comments that both Comfort Inn and  Monica Abrams are liable. 

You will not find a video of me insulting or arguing with anyone. 

Please review my comments and the Hotel owners should fire this manager immediately! Called me a racist and the hotel is  percent Hispanic workers,  percent Indian and Black, and  percent all others. My fianc is Hispanic. My family is a mixed race melting pot of different ethnicities. How dare she accuse me and used such defamatory comments about my character. I never argued with anybody and got along with the entire staff. I have been asked to both express my comments on both radio and social media. Confirmation Number 

The hotel cancelled this on March , 

Customer Relations rebooked me 

A week later even though I was not treated well I booked a new reservation with Comfort inn Henderson

Confirmation  the Hotel cancelled this reservation and banned me!

This is very low class, unprofessional, disturbing, disappointing, defamatory, and a civil liability tort!

Message:
That's way better than the Quality Inn in Huntersville, NC I stayed at
I understood they couldn't serve hot food, but their "continental breakfast" was an apple out of a bag & a chewy bar from Aldi's. Period.
Hospital breakfast looks much better, but yeah not great
Get well soon Replying to 
Hi, there! I know that breakfast is the most important meal of the day, so it's disappointing to hear it was not what you were expecting. To better assist you, can you plz send us a DM with your conf #, date of arrival, full name, & the hotel's address? Hope to hear from you! -LM I sent a tweet about the breakfast I got at your hotel, you sent this Here is the fare we were offered, a bag of apples and chewy bars My sister paid for the room thru priceline My name is Devin
Not sure we were supposed to be in that room where they used to have breakfast, stuff was all over and the "food" just thrown about.
I learned later that they put brown lunch bags on a table near the front desk for guests with an apple a nd a granola bar in it I got a good price so not complaining, but it was a shock after seeing what other hotels had
Like juice boxes, cereal boxes, milk cartons, individual pastries, etc. I have no quarrel with saving money, but advertising breakfast and then its an apple and a chewy bar was kinda deceptive
Plus I was on rd floor and elevator didn't work after st day
I am older, so stairs is a big problem, and my teeth are not great so no way could eat the "breakfast" lol
But again I got a good price, so I'll take the lack of amenities
I won't stay there again, staff doesn't care and everything is run shoddily, plus no upfront about breakfast
Just prefer a friendly place where I get what is advertised FYI, staff did help when asked, but basically they just could care less and it was evident
I get that it's mostly contractors and stuff that stay there, so maybe they don't need to be so friendly, but still stuff like clock didn't work, phone cord would not go in phone, making it useless, took  days to get toilet paper
That bespeaks of a lack of care and a willingness to be substandard
Even a small thing like I extended and the lady didn't do the right paperwork, so she had to come up  flights of stairs to get me (as phone didn't work) and instead of brining the paperwork for me to sign, she made me come down and do it
Again, lack of concern or even thinking
Why inconvenience me for your mistake
Sorry lol, as I think about it more it was not a good experience

Message:
Hello. Who can I contact to lodge a complaint about the GM of Choice Hotel I recently stayed in? Thank you! I will send you something soon. Just was a busy weekend. :) So I stayed at the Rodeway Inn in Blythe, California a little over a week ago. Address is  E Hobsonway, 
Confirmation #15001483 
Date of stay April -18, 

My adult daughter was also traveling with me and we both had some pretty major issues with our room. But that is not the reason I am contacting you. I frequently stay in hotels as I have to travel to California from Arizona about every -6 weeks. I do like to stay in a Choice Hotel because I have found that the quality of the hotel is usually pretty consistent, and they are priced right, too. However, that was not the case with this stay! My issue is with GM of this homeland how I was treated by him after I filled out the survey I received regarding our stay there. I honestly answered it, as I do all surveys, and pointed out why we wouldn't be staying at this place again.And then I got an email back from the GM that was so unprofessional and offensive, that I think Choice Hotels should know what he said. The initial email is copied below:

>> Your recent stay at Rodeway Inn & Suites in Blythe
Nikhil Shah 
Sat /24/2021 :21 PM
To: Pamela Cole 
Cc:  
Dear Pamela,
Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. 
On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.
I would like to rebuff your review with my side explanation too.
We did not give you the wrong room but rather you went to wrong room yourself and it was clearly written on the key that we gave you. Your key worked for the room which had  beds which you requested. 
If you were not happy you could have told us right away the reasons and we would have given you other room  to make you happy but you chose to stay in the room and write bad review after staying in the room whole night which shows your BIAS and your agenda against us. We do offer very clean rooms with new linen and pillows nicely tucked in. The water in Blythe is hard water and if you know the effect of hard water on bedsheets you would have understood. We clean everything after the guest check out with Lysol/pine sol and do the laundry every day and your comment is unwarranted as you had biased view with out understanding but reaching to instant conclusion. As a motel owner why would I have a bad toilet with yellow water in it. Think about it. City of Blythe had done some water pipeline work and that is why there was yellowish water in the toilet which we had no control over. After we talked to City of Blythe Public Works Department which you can also call and confirm by talking to Suze to report also about bad water at (760)922-6611. For us customer happiness is very important and we go out of our way to help guest with their needs.
For your and our safety we keep our front door locked and do the business through our night window and this should not be a issue rather your understanding of the virus situation was needed. We are trying to protect you and us. I do not see anything wrong in that.
We are OK to have lost your business to motel  as we can not please everybody. After you checked out we had rented the same room to other couple. They were extremely happy with our service, our room and all linen and furnishing. 
We get many customers who stayed at Motel  and they become our repeat customers and gladly pay  or even  more dollars for the efforts we are putting in to our motel.
It appears from your review that you had came to our motel with an agenda to promote motel , which is OK. More power to you.

I am glad that you realize the past year has been hard for the hotel industry and people who stay at our place are coming back every time they travel on I-10. 
Sincerely,
Nikhil Shah <<

My reply back to him is next: 

>> Re: Your recent stay at Rodeway Inn & Suites in Blythe
Pamela Cole 
Sun /25/2021 :37 AM
To: Nikhil Shah 
You should have stopped typing after your st paragraph, accepting the fact that your motel needs help. Instead you try to turn your back on me which is very unprofessional! Let me assure you that I have NO "bias" or "agenda" against you. I am actually offended that you said that. I really wanted to like your hotel, and it just didn't measure up. NO bias or agenda whatsoever! 

Regarding the room, I was very clearly told room  and repeated it back to confirm. I don't generally check the number on the key to the room number as I've never had reason to. You even apologized for giving us the wrong room number. So that is on you, not me!

The beds were made up the same in each room. So I had no reason to believe that another room would be different. And it was very late when we got there, and my daughter and I were both very tired. We had already unloaded our things from our car, and I didn't want to have to move all our stuff in search of another room. If you had better rooms, why didn't you just put us in one of THOSE rooms to begin with? 

And I do understand what hard water does, and there are water softening add in that can be used. But it wasn't hard water stains, the sheets weren't even really tucked in but kind of thrown on the bed and rumpled liked they'd been slept on. Perhaps you need to talk to your housekeeping about doing a better job?  

And perhaps you need to stop being so defensive and listen to your guests when they honestly tell you what they experienced. Again, I wanted to like your motel, I really did. But I'm sorry, it just wasn't what I've learned to expect from a Choice hotel. FAR from it. And over the past couple of years I have stayed in many motels/hotels as I have to travel to California from Arizona often. I leave good reviews if they are warranted, but I'm also honest when something is not right. I've not ever been berated for giving my honest review though. That is really uncalled for and I will be lodging a complaint with Choice hotels as a result of your offensive reply. <<

I do feel for people like him who are struggling as a result of Covid-19 restrictions and lockdowns over the past year, however, that does not give him an excuse for his very unprofessional and offensive attitude over a negative review. The fact of the matter is, the review was very honest, and I was appalled at the condition of the room, as was my adult daughter, and it's the worst Choice Hotel I've ever stayed in. The GM had an excuse or accusation for everything, and emailed me twice more (he did apologize for offending me, but then turned around and said that I offended him and continued to try to defend the state of his hotel.) The room was WAY overpriced, as well. I do realize that the Rodeway Inn is a lower priced budget hotel, but this was so below my expectations, especially for the amount I paid for  night,  that I really felt something needed to be said.

If you need me to send you the rest of his communications, I am willing to do that. Honestly I didn't even read his last email as it started off the same way and was long and wordy and I really don't want to engage with this guy anymore. Thanks. I appreciate the additional points. :) 

My membership # is PXC86483
Email: 
Phone #: -389-8648
Mailing address:  E Chelsea Dr, San Tan Valley, AZ
Summary_T5_1: Pamela Cole stayed at the Rodeway Inn in Blythe, California. She answered a survey and pointed out why we wouldn't be staying there again. But she got an email back from the GM that was so unprofessional and offensive.
Summary_T5_2: youve stayed at choice hotel write bad review pamela
