Message: I hate complaining but after staying at the Quality Inn Hotel in Montreal at  Herron Road for my quarantine stay Im disgusted. They tried to double charge my stay and then when I called to complain they completely denied it. I called my bank and they saw the- These charges only happened after I went to the Quality Inn and quite frankly it cant be anywhere else considering, like I stated Im in quarantine. They have no social media I can reach out to them on. Calling has done me nothing, they only deny it. Wont be using here again. Hi my name is Leah Rowan Bloschichak I arrived in Canada on April st  and my confirmation number is  to get more into detail I was okayed by the Canadian government to go to my final isolation destination on the nd, so thats when I checked out. I had paid my hotel fees on March th and quite oddly a security guard had me sign off on confirmation of all payments as I was about to leave. I checked my bank account because I had to get a taxi, and noticed almost immediately my account was trying to process the same amount of money I paid back in March again from the Quality Inn. Obviously I was alarmed and called them where I was on hold for  minutes and actually had to call twice just to get a response from anyone. The lady told me she saw no such pending charges and had no idea what I was talking about. I said I was going to talk to my bank. I called my bank and they confirmed that the hotel was trying to charge me again and said to keep an eye on it because it was suspicious but they themselves could not do anything about it until the payment actually processed. I waited it out to see when it would go through, and the charge was cancelled I believe on Saturday. It was only then I noticed a new pending charge from a food delivery company for .00 also processing. Obviously like I said it cant be me because Im in quarantine still and ordering food is clearly not an option and the delivery service isnt even offered in Canada from what I can gather. The charge is still trying to process and Im worried someone from that hotel stole my debit card information. Im going to be in Canada for six months and to have this happen is beyond inconvenient and really crappy. There is no other places that could have taken my card besides the quality inn. This is the quality inn in Montreal located near the Trudeau airport address  Herron Road. Thank you for any help you can offer me! Update for anyone wondering                     I got a passive aggressive email from the quality inn I stayed at but then curiously enough all suspicious charges were dropped and I havent had a problem since. #qualityinn #LoveIsNotTourism
Summary_T5_1: Leah Rowan Bloschichak was staying at the Quality Inn Hotel in Montreal. She paid her hotel fees on March th and a security guard had me sign off as she was about to leave. When she called to complain they completely denied it. They have no social media I can reach out to them on. Calling has done me nothing, they only deny it.

Message:
Checked into the Comfort Inn (1500 Market Blvd, Roswell GA  on Sunday March th (Actually  day earlier than our original book date)
Booking com #2114601571
Upon arrival, checked in, within  mins of going into our room, we requested to cancel due to the accommodations & conditions of the hotel (exposed AC wires, cigarette & marijuana, door entrance from parking lot broken allowing anyone access - unsafe).
I spoke with your rep, he claimed it was nothing he can do since booked with 
He told me to cancel it & dispute it w/capital one. 
Yes, thats your employees remedy suggestion !!! 
We booked into a different hotel.
I disputed the charge. 
Denied because your hotel states they did everything on their end.
I involved 
They sent me an adjustment. Still charging me for one night. (See picture) 
Fine I will accept it. 
Charging me $72.98 instead of $364.45
I received that updated invoice on April ,2021
No adjustment made! 
When I followed up with they claimed comfort inn has not approved the request from
Even though went ahead and adjusted.
Your hotel chain which initially told me to DISPUTE IT, has not helped out one bit! 
Youre more than welcome to see this ongoing dispute. 
We are in the middle of a pandemic, money does not grow on trees.
Your hotel was not up to standards & now your hotel is tying up my funds.
This is disgusting at this point. 
My request is that the entire $364.45 charged on my CC be refunded. At this point, its the most courteous move your company can do given that your staffs response was oh well, nothing I can do, dispute it, then deny my request 
Andy Borrero & Amanda Rivera I look forward to your prompt response & resolution    Mind you, the adjustment confirmation email was sent to us April . That was  days ago & still nothing from comfort inn. This makes no sense. What is the point of the DM if its the same answer! 
If you truly dont have access to your own hotel chains, what the hell was the reason for the DM request if youre going to give me the same run around.
Furthermore, if the rd party has agreed to the adjustment, what gives your hotel the right to deny the request? 
If the rd parties resolution is to adjust the charge, why isnt the comfort inn abiding by the same rules? 
Your resolution/explanation does nothing for me. Your hotel received $364 for someone that didnt even stay at the hotel. 
I will continue to fight this bullshit. 
I will make sure this gets to your CEO
Summary_T5_1: Comfort Inn has apologised to the customer for not refunding her $364.45 bill. The hotel chain said it did everything on their end and that they sent me an adjustment. This is disgusting at this point, youre more than welcome to see this ongoing dispute!

Message:
booked under my husbands name IRVEN POLK, Booked a suite last minute and it was horrible!!!
Arrived to check in and the fire alarm went off and the front desk had to call the fire department..she was very nice but visibly shaken.

The shower rod was broken the shower had broked tiles and ugly patch job to the ceiling. 
The elevator had busted tiles and tiles missing. 
The sofa in the room was filthy, stains on the sofa and floor.
No hot water in the sink next to the coffee maker. 
No breakfast bar as advertised!!
The little girl working the front was totally overwhelmed with all as they were very short staffed.
The front desk gal ( Myriam)
Was very helpful and apologetic for the situation she was doing the best should could in a horrible situation.
She was having to clean rooms and handle the front desk.

This was in no way a SUITE with all the broken no functioning items.
Definitely NOT WORTH THE  $193.97,we paid...
When you travel you expect a great room for the money....
Its not like we booked a low budget hourly hotel but felt that way...
TERRIBLY DISAPPOINTED WITH THIS EXPERIENCE AND ANGRY THAT WE WASTED OUR MONEY I HAVE PHOTOS TO PROVE HOW NASTY AND DISGUSTING THIS HOTEL WAS... THE SOFA IN OUR ROOM WAS FILTHY AND SO NASTY WE WERE AFRAID TO SIT ON IT.... THERE WERE STAINS ON THE FLOOR... AS WELL AS THE NUMEROUS OTHER ISSUES I STATED PREVIOUSLY!!!!!!! WILL DEFINITELY NOT STAY HERE OR AT ANOTHER COMFORT SUITES EVER AGAIN!!!!!!!!!! HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE AND SEEMS LIKE NO ONE CARES BUT IF IT WAS YOUR $$ OR OR FAMILY MEMBER , I BET THEY WOULD GET A REFUND !!!!! Your priceline itinerary for Gainesville, TX - Saturday, April ,  (Itinerary# -751-452-76)
We booked through priceline
I have been waiting for someone to call me back regarding this matter Comfort suites Gainesville texas

Beware of the infestation of bed bugs at Comfort Inn,  Briarwood Dr, Jackson. MS......Choice Hotels seems to play it off like it's not a big deal...do better  Hello, my confirmation number is . We booked a  night stay for Apr  and May  for a funeral.  My husband was the guest.  He went to bed at am and at about :30am he got up due to discomfort. He turned on the lights and discovered the bugs. He then attempted to get in touch with Choice and also took all of his things to the front desk.  They advised him he would have to wait am to talk to a manager.  He went to his truck to try to get some rest.  Went back in at  but the manager did not show up until . They booked him at another hotel and told him he would be refunded and also we would get points on our Privilege account.  We have reached out to your guest relations to have refunds issued for the room and for compensation for medical bills and treatments.  They wrote a generic response back but did not indicate they would be issuing refunds or compensation.  The case number is .     My Choice Privilege number is SXC804316 This info was in the email he sent to your CR team.  Please have a Supervisor call me at -364-8291 after :30 pm CST to provide me with an update about my case.
Still no one has contacted us. Perhaps they are not reacting the entire email as it is at the bottom.

Message:
My dad and I got banned from the Antioch, California Comfort Inn because we called them out on ripping us off and didnt like it. We have earned a badge of honor! From my dad Daniel Bridges, he is a diamond member with Choice Hotels. This was written on /12/2021 and is regarding the Comfort Inn in Antioch, CA.

Terrible customer service. Charged twice for room and no one can fix their error. Told not charges but holds which means pending... customer still can't access those funds. Told to see the night auditor after :00 pm when her shift starts. So I'm up late to deal with all the incompetence going on...and paying for my room as well.

Extra $2 charge for safe in room added to the incidentals charge...$2 not refunded with the incidentals charge...this is not posted to inform customers. Security person stated the owners can do anything they want. $2 extra for every customer?...nice gig!

Contacted which owns this place. Hospitality?...right. Sign of the times, though...money, money, money and the customer receives no service, even when the hotel makes an error. Plenty of employees to make reservations...no one to help with customer issues after booking. No accountability or responsibility.  Hard to trust any company anymore...look what we've become. 

Stay away if you can, though things aren't much different elsewhere due to corporate ownership and greed. The place is also loud with other patrons and terrible freeway noise and the nice-looking flooring is actually filthy. 

Greed, poor service, and incompetence are not the results of covid... they're institutionalized and accepted as how places do business. Really sad. We were there on /10 and unfortunately I cannot find the confirmation number. Thank you, I greatly appreciate it. I was meaning to add Joe that you are first that has listened and that means a lot. Nobody else has listened.
Summary_T5_1: The Comfort Inn in Antioch, California has been criticized for its poor customer service. My dad Daniel Bridges is a diamond member with Choice Hotels. We were there on /10 and unfortunately cannot find the confirmation number.
Summary_T5_2: my dad gets banned hotel ripping us off
Summary_Bart:

 Like I could pay other ways. I'm assuming my choice credit card that I tried using declined since I just opened it and never received it in the mail to activate it. I dont think much more can be done. I rebooked the room, at the higher day of rate but I guess whatever at this point. The rep was nice at least. Message:
DO NOT EVER STAY AT THE COMFORT INN & SUITES AT THE PYRAMIDS IN INDIANAPOLIS, IN.!!!

This past Friday night (May th) my wife and I checked into this hotel not realizing that a Biker Gang from Detroit, MI was also booked there for the same night.  We later found out they had a block of + rooms and to say they were loud is an understatement!

Throughout the night this biker gang terrorized the entire hotel with their motorcycles, loud music, excessive drinking, yelling and fighting each other.  We got no sleep as we were afraid that this gang was going to break into the rooms of the other guest and we also felt trapped if we were to attempt to leave as we could be assaulted.  

In all my  years I have NEVER experienced anything like this while traveling throughout the US, Europe, and Asia.  And to have my wife with me made it worse as she has a heart condition and her nerves were shot.

Twice we called the front desk and was told "we are sorry but there is nothing we can do".    It was obvious that the people at the front desk were clearly out of their league and supposedly they called the police but we never saw any officers.  So nothing was done to calm the small scale riot and this went on until roughly :00am.

My wife and I got no sleep whatsoever.

The next morning I went to the front desk to complain and ask for a refund due to this situation.  The young lady at the front desk said her General Manager would have to authorize this and he wasn't in.  I asked when he would be in and she told me he'd be there at :00am.  So my wife and I went to get some coffee and attempt to enjoy breakfast (our nerves were still shot from the night before).  We came back at :00am and the GM was not there and she didn't know when he would be there.  I left my name and phone number for him to call me so we could discuss this.  

He never called, ever.

So on Monday (May th) I called the front desk of this hotel again and once again I got the run around.  So I decided to call Choice Hotels and spoke with  separate people in Customer Relations.  Both people apologized for the way we were treated at this hotel but said they could not offer a refund as the hotel would need to do this themselves.  They could offer me points for a free night some time later on, but that was the best they could do.

I felt that the LEAST anyone could do for us was to give us a refund of our room stay AND points toward a free night later on.  I was told that once I was given the points the matter would be considered "closed" by Choice Hotels and I felt that I was simply being brushed off.  I asked to speak with someone "higher up" and was given an email address to express these concerns, that I couldn't speak with anyone personally.

Remember, all I wanted was my room refunded and points for at least one free night.  I felt from what we had been through we deserved that much at least.

So today I FINALLY got to speak with the General Manager of this hotel.  His name is Jason.  He was very defensive and rude, and explained that he "couldn't very well throw  rooms of people out of the hotel for their behavior since they were guest too".  He said there was nothing they could do that night, and that since there is a Black Lives Matter movement going on in Indianapolis (yes these bikers were black), they and the police felt that their hands were tied.  So basically I was told that the lives and safety of all other patrons of this hotel didn't matter at all, and if I wanted to contact a lawyer "good luck with that".  

He then hung up on me.  

So I don't know if I will ever receive any sort of compensation from anyone at Choice Hotels, but I do know that if this is the way they show "respect" to their paying guest, it will snow in July before I ever stay at one of their properties ever again.  

ALL PAYING GUEST LIVES MATTER!!!  THIS HOTEL CAN GO BROKE FOR ALL I CARE!!!! Attached is the invoice from my stay in question.  My confirmation number was . Choice Hotels I sent you the PM as requested, showing the invoice (including hotel full name and address).  I also provided the confirmation number.   My full name is Charles Stephen (Steve) Peach.  This will show on the invoice and confirmation as Charles Peach.   My contact info is:

Cell - .596.3646

Address:   N Rosenberger St
                  Nappanee, IN. 

Please feel free to call me to discuss.  I believe I was on a recorded line on  separate occasions when I called Customer Relations yesterday to file this same complaint.  There are a lot of details on those recordings. Thanks for reaching out to me.  I will accept the ,000 points and am grateful that at least someone within your organization is willing to recognize this horrific event and is willing to do something for us here.  The hotel is refusing to do anything for us.

My Choice Privileges Rewards number:  CSP0108

My mailing address:
  N Rosenberger St
Nappanee, IN 

Email:  

Cell:  -596-3646

I brought the fact that it often smelled like weed and got very noisy on the fourth floor to a gentleman who was working the front desk. He shrugged, apologized, and said he would let the manager know. Since we paid for the month in full, we were told we could not change our reservations.

I was told there were no clean blankets. We were told this daily. After three days, I gave up and bought blankets for our beds, then called and made the complaint via the number listed on your website.

Hi Im from Seattle stayed at Comfort Inn Hotel and Suites in Colton, California I am very upset with service that staff provided here. I checked in on Thursday / I told the lady to charge for one night I wasnt to comfortable with the area. I returned Friday morning /14 because my key card wasnt working and to tell her to charge my card thru Sunday because no other hotel around had two bed available. Later that evening again my key card not working I went to front desk to tell the guy why my card not working He gave me a new key card I returned the nd time and again my key card not working! At this point Im very frustrated my room is across the hall on second floor, I walk back and again get another key card and front desk guy ask to try on outside door in front of him as if Im making it up . It works so he tells me if you put it with phone it deactivate the room key. Wow now Im really angry because no one said anything about that. Ok Im on my way to room and key card not working!! Well now the guy from front desk walks to me and says I seen you on camera so I came. Really! This whole time you watching me!! He opens the door and says key card not working because its out of batteries!! What kind of services is this? Ok its Saturday /15leave to funeral and my brother was to meet at hotel. I get a call from my brother that staff came to my room for payment. Im on way to funeral and pull over cause I dont understand what was going on I go back to hotel and front desk says its nothing everything ok meanwhile staff has run my card five separate transactions has been very frustrating especially when Im here for a funeral. Lastly Sunday /16 Im getting ready to leave and electric goes out! My plane leaves at  and i had to find another place to get ready. I explained to the front desk about my stay and she said that was nothing she can do until the electric goes on. I said ok Ill call you Monday /17 I spoke to her and she said to call  customer relations line and I called got hung up on twice. This experience has been very stressful and worst uncomfortable place. Front desk service hasnt contact me or communicate any kind of issues. I dont have any kind of help to get this resolved. Please contact me. 

Regards,
Olivia Malietufa    FXM60432
  O St NE
Auburn, Wa  
Faimasasa Malietufa

Thank you for listening and responding!

Message:
So  has the WORST customer service to exist. After being unable to check into a Clarion bc of roaches, bed bugs, no one behind desk for + mins, unanswered phones, corporate rep hangs up on me & I get no refund? How is ANY of this my fault? Yall are terrible! Reservation under Devin Zacchino.
Clarion Orlando International Airport (3835 McCoy Road Orlando FL )
Booked thru T-Mobile travel, conf #: TDB3FAX9. Booked for /17/21-5/19/21. 
Case #: 

I tried calling several times before arriving to see if they could accommodate an early check in, or allow me to use a table to work until my room was ready. Over  days, phone went unanswered. Upon arrival, the lobby was in disarray, messy, dusty, and empty. No one behind the front desk, phone ringing off the hook. Someone appears after  minutes and told me my room wouldnt be ready for several hours. 

I sat at a table to work on my laptop and I saw several cockroaches both dead and alive, the carpets were ripped and stained, and the table had smeared dried liquid on it, similar to blood. Place smelled like mold and had bucket in the corner to collect water dripping from ceiling. 

I heard a couple fighting and talking about bed bugs, how their bodies were covered in bites after only  night in the hotel among other issues. I went to cancel my reservation with the manager and tell him I no longer was going to check in, but he was no where to be found. Phone ringing off the hook again behind desk. I had to leave and connect to WiFi to work, so I couldnt keep waiting around. Waited another  minutes and left. 

Called customer service line  times, and all  times I was hung up on and never called back. Case #10265311

I have traveled the world and stayed in some very sketchy scenarios and I am not expecting luxury at a clarion. But this felt like something out of a movie because of how awful it was, and being flat out ignored & hung up on by your team has made this even worse. I cannot believe how difficult it is to get my money back ($98.17) or even a call back to discuss. -681-7296  DMed. I am not a member, and after being told by several different people that there is nothing you can do even though it is YOUR clarion hotel that is holding onto the funds, I do not want to become a member. I do not want points. I want my money back. I booked thru T-Mobile and they said the hotel has the money and wont release it. I cannot get in touch with the hotel because they will not answer the phone. So I go to you, and you OWN the hotel and cant get the money? How is this fair or acceptable? Im just shit out of luck because that hotel wont answer the phone to give me my money back? I dont want points. I want you or someone on your team to call me or randomly inspect that hotel which has not been even vacuumed in years, and tell the manager to send my money back. This is absolutely ridiculous and I genuinely am not going to just let that money go. Im sorry if Im getting aggravated, I know this isnt your fault. Its the individual hotels fault. But please, what measures can I take or how can you help me get my full refund that I think I deserve? So theres literally nothing you can do to get me my money back? At a hotel I didnt stay at because of bed bugs? This is genuinely insane lol why would I ever stay at one of your hotels again after a terrible experience and you not even being able to help resolve it? Thank you for absolutely nothing  The hotel literally does not answer the phone. How am I supposed to get them to give me my money back if they dont answer? Would you like to pay for a flight for me to get back to Orlando, walk into the hotel, hunt around for an hour (again) hoping someone appears being the desk and ask for it back? If youre thinking of staying at a  be prepared that if you find bed bugs theyll do absolutely nothing to help you get your money back besides say sorry  thanks for nothing! Xoxo

Message:
you have a real problem at #QualityInn #Bradenton North I-75. A real problem. Staying at Quality Inn North I-75  th St Ct E, Bradenton, FL . Pretty sure I'm grossly overpaying at $200/night but I had no choice because it's Memorial Day weekend and my son has a baseball tournament here. We arrived just before pm to check in and girls at the front were having computer issues. I literally stood at the desk for  minutes while they tried multiple computers, all the while not giving me updates or options. After standing there a half hour with my wife and kids in the car, I suggested that I leave and come back. They said that was a good idea. I asked how long I should stay away. They said they had no idea. I suggested  minutes. They said they couldn't promise that would be enough time because they needed to call reservation support. I finally suggested they call me when they get it figured out. They said they would. After + minutes of driving my family around killing time,  I came back to find that my reservation had been resolved. I asked why they never called me and they said they did. I asked what number. They rudely said "the one you gave us". I again asked them to confirm the number and sure enough they wrote my number down wrong. The woman at the front desk who was at least acting like she somewhat cared had a name tag that said Tamie. The other girl had no name tag but was responding to the name Tiffany. Tiffany has a nasty attitude. At one point when I tried to ask a question,  she interrupted me and said "Do you want to give us a minute?!?" The lack of empathy and service was disheartening. Additionally why were they ok with me waiting more than an hour for a room that I properly reserved and was ready?  Why not put my family in the room and figure out the computer issue later? It's like this was a normal occurrence for them and I should just stand there and wait. Add to that the carpet in the room is so dirty that it's turned the bottoms of my socks black. And my ankles have been bitten multiple times laying in this bed,  but I don't even want to turn the light on to check. We will probably check out tomorrow a day early and just eat the $200 I paid for Saturday night. If I owned this property I would be embarrassed. 

Chris Garrido 
Reservation dates May ,  - May ,  Itinerary #72098906169698 Went ahead and decided to investigate what was biting me. There are bugs in the sheets and pillows. Here's one I got on video. This is disgusting. I want my money back. We had to be at a baseball tournament at :30. When finish today we are getting our stuff and driving home. We will then get up early tomorrow and drive back down. Why would you think the front desk staff would have any resolution given their attitude and lack of competence yesterday? We have checked out and expressed our concerns to no avail. I will get my money back for tonight's stay even if I need my lawyer involved. Zero chance of that. There will be $199 coming back my way. Don't want or need your points. You don't care enough to fix this at the corporate level. The property doesn't care enough to fix it at the local level. Time for next steps. I will not pay for a room that I couldn't use because your property has a bug infestation. I will tell the world though. You're starting to sound like a bot. I'm going to get my money back. Not points. Your offers are insulting. I have done both Grettel. And plan to do much more. Keep your points. I'll be getting a refund.  You can burn your points. Just like in burning the bed bugs that traveled hom with me from your disgusting property.  You can burn your points. Just like I'm burning the bed bugs that traveled hom with me from your disgusting property.  You can burn your points. Just like I'm burning the bed bugs that traveled home with me from your disgusting property. Bed bugs INSIDE my pillow case. We checked out and they still charged us for our full stay. Their solution? ,000 rewards points. Like I will ever stay there again. Choice Hotels won't do anything. They will just offer you rewards points. They still won't refund me my money from the bed bugs that were crawling in my pillow Friday night.  Tina Cordero-Torres if you have video you can upload to YouTube. That's what I did with these bed bugs that were creating inside my pillow at the Quality Inn in Bradenton Friday night. Choice Hotels I've been through it over and over again through your Twitter support team. Ask Joe, Grettel, Ed and Numas. None of them were willing to help. I'm sure you're no different. So instead I will just remind the internet every single day how disgusting your properties are until you refund me my money. Choice Hotels yes! That's the pre written response that Ed sent me yesterday on Twitter. You guys must have a whole library of pre written responses that sound you like actually care about your customers. That's efficient. See you tomorrow Helder. Don't let the bed bugs bite.  It's been a week. Still no reply to my multiple emails to the manager of the property. It's time for you to handle this at the corporate level. No one should have to pay to sleep with bed bugs inside their pillow case. My next calls will be to the BBB and the local health department. Here's video of what was crawling in my pillow in case you forgot me. It's been a week and I know there have been several more complaints about your disgusting properties since then. Kalila Chantelle' Peyton good luck. Worst company ever. Our carpet was so dirty it turned my socks black. It was a non smoking room but it reeked of smoke and air freshener. It took an hour for me to check in because their "reservation system had a problem", yet other people checked in fine while I waited. The girl at the front desk had a major attitude. And the best yet - I found bed bugs. 

Choice Hotels has bed bugs. And they have the worst customer service ever. And their non smoking rooms reek of cigarette smoke. And their carpets are so dirty they turn your socks black. And they take an hour to figure out how to check you in. And their front desk agents have horrible attitudes. And when you reach out to management they don't respond. And their online customer support agents cycle through a handful of canned responses and try to silence you with reward points. Soooo...not really excellent. Not just roaches. Bed bugs too. Choice Hotels if you're going to start filtering and deleting my comments, then I will just post more. All this can stop if your property manager responds to my  emails and refunds my money. But they don't care and neither do you.  Choice Hotels here is the problem Grettel. I will never stay at one of your properties again so those points are meaningless. You've also contradicted yourself. You see, the fact that you have a franchise agreement absolutely means that you can ensure that this hotel manager responds to me. That's the purpose of a franchise agreement - so that you (the franchisor) can guarantee that the property owner (the franchisee) operates according to your regulations. So either your franchise agreement doesn't cover room conditions and customer treatment, or you guys don't care enough about those things to actually enforce the agreement.  Quality Bed Bugs.  Choice Hotels has bed bugs and the worst customer service.  I agree with Lynn. And I have the video of the bed bugs to prove it. And the lack of customer service is just as bad as the filth. Tricia Bergmann Montelongo don't waste your time. They don't care. They will do nothing to make this right.  Worst hotel chain ever Sammie. I'm thinking of starting a group of people that Choice Hotels has screwed over. Zero customer service. I had bed bugs crawling in my pillow, checked out and went home early and they refuse to refund me. They just keep offering rewards points that I will literally never use. And I had to pay $200/ night for this dump because it was Memorial Day weekend.  Robert Royce garbage!  With their scripted responses. It's ridiculous.  Sammie Marie Medonic-Seabolt can't believe one of the hotel employees is harassing you on social media too. They should no longer have a job, but Choice Hotels doesn't care enough to take action on that either.  Starlena Holland unreal. This is the worst company I've ever dealt with.  Carol Murray that agent did you a favor. Book elsewhere. Choice Hotels has the worst properties and customer service, but the best bed bugs.  Michele Frick our carpets were so dirty they turned our socks black and we found bed bugs. We left. Still fighting for a refund.  Carolyn Thomas eager to see if you get refunded. We had bed bugs too. We left and they refuse to refund me at the corporate level and they refuse to respons at the local level.  Sharita Johnson lol. Grettel using another of Choice Hotels pre written responses. Meanwhile, I can't get a response to my  emails about the filth and bed bugs we encountered.  Dang. Laney got two responses.  Meanwhile I'm on email number six to talk about the filth and bed bugs we encountered. "Yikes!"  I love your fake shock Jendy. As though you guys don't get comments like this every day. This is who you are. You are a chain of filthy, bug infested hotels, manned by employees with terrible attitudes and absolutely zero customer service. Own it. Same here. These bed bugs crawling inside my pillow case wasn't the worst part of my stay, if you can believe that. Michele Frick Quality Inn Bradenton FL

Message: Hi. I'd like to speak with someone about a recent stay I had at a comfort suites in Brenham. I went through last minute travel because they had a cheaper rate than that of the choice website or calling direct to the hotel. Will the confirmation from their booking suffice? I stayed at a Comfort suites in Brenham, Tx check in was May  check out was May rd I had two rooms, one under Aaron Bunch and one under Sarah Bunch I checked into the hotel in Brenham Texas I had a horrible stay I wound up spending four hours having to clean my own hotel room. The general manager there is refusing any sorts of refund. And I've already spoken to your guest services agent, named roger, who has told me that you guys have absolutely no authority over the individual hotels as they are individually franchised. You have no way to enforce your lowest price guarantee, as I found a lower price, and that the best he could do is to offer me points to stay at another hotel. Those of you that travel, or those of you looking for hotels to stay in. Do not stay in any  Because if you have a bad experience, they are absolutely helpless and unable to help and can do nothing to get your refund other than to offer you points to stay elsewhere Jendy- I appreciate the offering the compensation of points, but in all of my  years of hospitality experience I have never run into a corporate chain that couldnt process refunds. When I worked for IHG if a customer contacted corporate regarding a refund, the hotel was contacted and if corporate deemed it appropriate then corporate issued the refund and then charged the franchised hotel for the refunded charges. Obviously Choice doesn't handle the situation that way. While the offer of k points is generous two nights stays doesnt cover the two rooms that I had for two nights or offer compensation for the + hours that my wife and I spent to clean both of these hotel rooms. I have sent an email to  with picture attachments. I look forward to a follow up. ,000 points. And do you have the contact information for the franchisee? Btw I had to speak with Rick the manager there because I was charged for the incidental charges and he told me the reason why he didn't give me a refund is because I gave him a bad review. Just adding more fuel to that fire of the type of franchisees that you have in your chain. That you know as long as I would have kept my mouth shut and not blowing the whistle on the fact that he runs a crap hotel. This is complete garbage And to be honest I booked two rooms for two nights, if you wanted to make it right after all this non sense, if cost ,000 point to stay at this hotel for one night. On points so ,000 points would refund the entire stay on points. ,000 points is only one room, one night So I'd say that ,000 points is fair. The local management will do absolutely nothing because I've contacted corporate. They will not even provide the owners information. I feel my request for ,000 point is reasonable, I did not earn points for this stay and ,000 point is at least one night for two rooms at another property, not the two night for two rooms that I had at this stay in question Sorry ,000 points would cover two. Rooms for one nignt Night The hotel management refused to do anything, direct quote was "I was going to offer you a refund, but you left a bad review". So the manager refuses to give me any money back, and as corporate, you're telling me that one, all you can offer is points, but not even the points to cover the stay which would be comparable to a refund of the stay... It's as if I'm being punished by the hotel management because I contacted corporate. I didn't even get points for the original stay... How about points for the original stay which what I should have regardless, and k extra, which is equal to refunding one night for two rooms. That's really the best you can do? ,000 points, that's only one room one night, I stayed two rooms two nights, and for whatever reason, I'm assuming because of the third party booking, I didn't get points for my original stay. I will take the k points. My choice privileges account is AVB9604 The local hotel manager wants me to go in and change my reviews and give shining reviews for his hotel in order for him to give me any sort of points or compensation and there's nothing for me to change because I simply stated that I had a bad State and that he has refused a refund or points. So I will take your far subpar offer to at least get some compensation. I have a hotel stay coming up next week and can use at least one free night so I might as well get at least one free night back. But I will not stop posting my review and I will not stay at another choice property. I don't even know how I would possibly begin to change or update my review. I really feell that I should at mimimum be credited k points per room. I had two rooms on my stay, so that would be the k points. I am on the phone with guest relations currently, and have been told that I can only get the k for one room. So why is it that we can't do k for EACH room. I have two different reservations. I find it incredibly hard to believe that the "best" that you can offer is k points. There has to be a way to do better.
Summary_T5_1: Jendy, a guest at Choice in Brenham, Tx, was staying at a Comfort suites hotel. She had two rooms, one under Aaron Bunch and one under Sarah Bunch. The general manager there is refusing any sorts of refund.

Seriously y'all, do not stay here unless you like being robbed and lied to. They are not pet friendly either so don't fall for it. I've done that several times. Yall keep telling me that you're all individually owned and yada yada. Then you offer me points to a system that I can only use if I stay at another one of your locations. This business puts out false advertisements and then once they have your money, they come up with different rules that are not stated anywhere on the website. Someone please tell me why I would wanna stay at a hotel that I wouldn't trust to hold a penny? No accountability in the middle of pandemic. This is literally the most unprofessional business I have encountered during the entire pandemic. 

Transparency goes a long way. Kaylee Smith pure greed! I honestly don't know how they stay open. So many businesses buckled due to covid restrictions, yet this business never took a single precaution, and the rooms only get cleaned once every  weeks. It sounds like every single manager at each location treats people the same way.

Message: I stayed at a choice hotel in Frederick Maryland. Worst experience I ever had. Bathroom was infested with ants. Went there for the indoor pool and the miniature golf since I had my grandson. The pool supposedly was broke but yet the day we were leaving it was up and running with little to no work the lady couldn't find the clubs for the miniature golf. Ice machine was broke on our floor. The refrigerator in our room froze our drinks. The toilet paper holder was broke so the toilet paper just fell right on the floor.  Our lamp was broke on the left side of the bed. The digital clock made a humming noise do we had to unplug it. The lobby was very attractive but we got to our building the carpet had holes stains very dirty. I contacted the desk at least  times about the ants and they each time and they would be up in a few minutes and never showed up. The last day we could not get a shower because the ants were all in the bathtub it was disgusting. I don't know if they're all like this but the one in Frederick Maryland was terrible. The only thing they would do to for me with give me points that won't even cover a one night stay. I spent two nights there and I should have really left on the second day but we got in late and I didn't feel like packing up n driving home. It's so sad that the staff continue to lie to me and say they would be right up and they never showed up. Terrible experience. Donna L King a few years back I went out to Corbin Kentucky and I almost stayed at the Econo Lodge in Corbin thank God I didn't. I recently stayed at Econo Lodge in Frederick and it was awful. Not very clean a big gap in the door and the bathtub was so old and worn my grandson would not even get in it yo take a bath because he thought it was dirty. I will never stay at an Econo Lodge again. Also I don't know if they housed homeless people there because that's what it looked like to me and the cops were continuously there. I was there  minutes and a cop showed up  Doors Down and then when I was arriving back later that evening there were six cop cars around the corner at another room. Won't  never stay at one again. Choice Hotels where do I send you a message to Confirmation number is  . We stayed there from May th through the th. The hotel was reserved under Rebecca Mitchell. The name of the hotel Clarion Inn Frederick Event Center. I did talk to someone today after I arrived home and they told me they would give me some points and the points they gave me arent even enough to rent again for one night of course not at that same Hotel again. It's a shame because it looked like a really nice hotel it had an indoor pool that was broke it had a miniature golf for the kids that they couldn't find the equipment to and had a lot of ants like I said. My grandson and I were touring and Gettysburg and we chose to stay at that hotel because it looked impressive because of the pool and things like that but it was a big like they own the entire weekend especially being invaded by ants in the bathroom. The main important thing that really bothers me is how I approached the front desk at least five times each day begging them for some help and they kept telling me somebody would be right up and they blatantly lied. Thanks for getting back with me I don't know what my member number is. My phone number is    and my email is Rebecca  @ gmail.com. my home address is  Continental Drive Glen Burnie Maryland . Thank you for getting back with me Thank you Ok TU
Summary_T5_1: The bathroom at the Econo Lodge in Frederick Maryland was infested with ants. Donna L King spent two nights there and it was awful. She says she will never stay at an Econo Lodge again.
Summary_T5_2: stayed at hotel infested with ants one night

Message:
Hello,

I am looking for contact information for a complaint. I booked a weekend stay my member number is  KCP3450  conformation #20368425. 

I am HIGHLY disappointed with this suite and if not for the unavailability of a closer hotel on such short notice I would not be staying. 

Following complaints: . Outside was not presentable, trash and debris all over the parking lot and entrance. 
 . Appears to be multiple drug exchanges going on outside. 
 . Long check in line and only one person working front desk. 
 . Swarm of flies in dining area. 
 . Smoking odor throughout the hallways 
 . King suite only has one television with no channel guide. 
 . Kitchen area has no utensils or even dish soap. No point in having a kitchen with no dishes or silverware. 
 . Air does NOT work. Room never cooled down despite air being on  degrees. 
 . Sheets were stained and or had holes
 . Only provided  towel and face towel. Asked multiple times for more which were not available. Towels appeared to be dirty. 
 . Asked for linen for pullout couch, none were available. Given one blanket that front desk had to find because he stated it was his first night. 

Overall, this room was not up to the standards that are represented on the website. This is highly disappointing and frustrating as we booked this hotel for location and Comfort as stated in the name but we have been everything except relaxed! Chris Garrido it was the worst ever! Literally not safe from all the extra traffic hanging outside at all hours. Thought we were in a safe location but it definitely wasnt!
Summary_T5_1: Guests have been disappointed with this suite. The room was not presentable, trash and debris all over the parking lot and entrance. There were multiple drug exchanges going on outside.
Summary_T5_2: hotel room cleanliness poor due drug fliers

Message: Is anyone aware of what is going on at the Econo Lodge in Jackson, MN?    Hello.  Thank you for the response.  As City Administrator of Jackson this hotel has brought shame to our town as the City, the sheriff's office, and building inspector are up there constantly responding to complaints.  Even the reviews on your website are horrible and are tarnishing your name and brand.  Please do something!  Thank you. This hotel has become the laughing stock of our town.  It would be funny if the health and safety of unsuspecting travelers was not at stake.  I know our building inspector would be very interested in talking to you.  His name is Harry Jenness.  Phone number -380-4555.   Shawn Hakken, County Sheriff, would also be able to provide additional information -847-4420.

Message: We just stayed at the Comfort Inn Dania Beach this weekend.   Let me tell you this was the absolute worst hotel I have ever been in.   We checked in and were assigned room  and upon walking into the room we saw blood on the toilet, band-aids stuck to the shower walls and soap still on the soap holder in the shower,  got a new room.....well that wasn't much better.   We had stained pillows and blood stained mattress pads.  I went back to the front desk and asked for new sheets for the new room and you would have thought I asked the guy to donate me a kidney.   I have several pictures and will be posting this on a Google review since I am not able to do so here.  The ONLY positive thing I can say is how Stephanie the front desk manager handled the whole situation.   That woman needs a raise or a new job.   She's too good to work for your company!! Guys,  avoid  .  I had made a reservation last week and then called the location on Bentonville,  AR and asked if their pool was open. They said no,  so I went back online and canceled. I don't know WHAT went wrong in this process... but it was never canceled. Hi!  I was told to message regarding my card being charged for a canceled room after I was told it wouldn't be.

Name on reservation: Abigail Freeman  
Confirmation number:  
Date of arrival was to be June 
Hotel address:  Moberly Lane, Bentonville, AR, , US

To clarify, when I called the hotel on Friday,  it was just to confirm that I was understanding the fees correctly and would only be charged for one night. 

The man on the phone told me he could just cancel it then and that any pending charges would just fall off, as he said nothing is charged until check-in. 

When it wasn't showing pending on my account Sunday,  I assumed it had done what he said,  but woke up this morning to it saying it cleared yesterday and any pending charges from yesterday clearing after. 

I called the hotel this morning and the man said something about the charges would be reversed and to give it a few days and then call back... but I'm having a hard time with trusting it after this mess,  especially once the overdraft charges hit   Thank you so so much!
Summary_T5_1: Abigail Freeman made a reservation last week and then called the location on Bentonville, AR and asked if their pool was open. They said no, so she went back online and canceled. I don't know WHAT went wrong in this process... but it was never canceled.

Our first step through the doors WOOOW it had a disgusting smell.  But ill let you know everything through message.  Now that I read the reviews and thought why in the world did I not look and read reviews before booking  This is my information  we stayed at Minocqua Wisconsin Quality Inn . First steps through the door  a disgusting muggy smell . The place smelled like stinky feet.  We tought it could of been just the entrance. Well that wasnt it . We walked towards our room through the hallway our room was #117 . The smell was horrible again like  thousand sport athletes shoes. Well now in our room I sat to use the restroom and the toilet seat rocked side to side .That scared the shiet out of me. Well now we go to the pool. The indoor pool all windows closed the humidity in there made it hard to breath . I tried opening a window to sit beside it and watch my son while he used the pool. The windows were barely functional hard a hard time getting it open . So on top of the pool there is a vent on the roof. That was full of mold. There was covid postings throughout those were inside sheet protectors all full of mold . The sofa in the room was all dirty .Overall the hotel was disgusting  .Never will I ever stay here again. I honestly never stayed in a place with all this going on. I have never found a hotel with a horrible smell period. And yet a charge of $278. Woow .honestly this place was worth about $14.95 a night .I am not even kidding  some director or supervisor should have a visit up there.
Summary_T5_1: Minocqua Wisconsin Quality Inn was a nightmare. The hotel had a disgusting smell. But it was worth about $14.95 a night.

I am waiting for my refund and I want my card refunded . I arrived at my hotel in Finley Lake NY and waited  min to get checked in. Multiple people told us this place was disgusting with no towels or toilet paper .  Them floor was so dirty it had spills all over it and dust was everywhere. Christmas decaf was still up.  We went to room after stairs to clime because elevator was broken and the stairway was dim because of lighting issue. Our room was so dirty with dog hair and fleas or bed bugs on bed. With a pandemic I cant expect my grandmother who is  to stay in these conditions so we left . The front desk told me I could get refunded only by calling the customer service number then customer service told me that only he could refund me.  I was lied to by this man , because he knowing knew that he wasnt going to refund me.  I want refunded I dont want points i will never be back to your hotels again. I dont care if its a gift card I just need my money back please.  This is a pandemic time and your hotels put my families safety at risk how shameful. Thank you. I have a case #  but no one has gotten back to me . I am a single mother and I dont want points I just want my money back . I wont be on vacation again for a long time . The manager told me I could call customer service and get my money back and I later found out that he was to do it and lied to me . That was my savings for my trip wasted . I had to book another hotel I would just like to be credited . Please I hope you can help me . That hotel can then release my information or I can release to you my credit card information for crediting.  I will never be able to use points . I dont travel nor have the time to do so being a single parent this was my trip for a long time . Is a gift card an option . 

Mailing address  state highway  conneautville PA    

 Alyson Burnham 
 /11/21
  If there is another number I can call for my reimbursement I will not stop until my card is refunded . I am ready with my card info so I can be credited I was not putting the safety of my family at risk in a pandemic and expect a full refund I would like upper management information then to speak with them . Again the individual owning it lied to me and said your customer service would refund me because his screen was grayed out therefore I need refunded. I cant use points I am a single mother this was my only trip that I saved for and I need that money back in my account for my family. I will give you my credit card information and amount owed to me If choice hotels owns the company then they should speak with that manger and demand my refund . Points will not help me pay for my family expenses I need my money back

Message:
I recently tried to file a complaint about staying in a hotel with BED BUGS and being charged for it. I am still covered head to toe in almost  bites. I have had such an extreme reaction I had to go to the doctor and am on oral and topical prescriptions to get through the itching. When you call customer service it keeps you on hold for  minutes and then hangs up.. I tried calling multiple times. I finally found an email and this is the official response, these empty words are how much they care about your health and well-being.
"Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel.
On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.
I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience."
I wouldn't wish this experience on anyone. DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND STAY ANYWHERE ELSE. The points and deals aren't worth the time, money, and pain I have from this experience. Message:
Who do I contact about a bad experience in one of your hotels. Rodeway Inn  Henderson Chapel Rd. Pigeon Forge, TN 
Confirmation number 
I made reservations to this hotel orginally on /5/2021. We were to stay from /16/21 to /18/21. Just days before I found out there was a small emergency at home and had to cut my vacation a day short. I made changes to my reservation to just stay /16/21 to /17/21. I received a new email showing the changes and was the same reservation number.
When we arrived on the th the gentleman that checked us in said there was a problem trying to get it to work and tried again. It didn't work so he had to manually type in  new reservation. No big deal. Once he was done the price had jumped up $12 maybe. Wasn't happy but again no big problem. Once everything was set and good to go we went up to our room. When we got in the TV was on, kinda weird but ok. Then I found a receipt from the previous person on the desk. My fiancee said the beds didn't look freshly made. I thought they did. It wasn't till her granddaughter turned and seen dirty towels on the bathroom floor still.
I marched downstairs to let the gentleman know. He had somewhat apologized and looked for another room to which he said there wasn't any. They would get the one we had cleaned as soon as possible and give a discount. 
At that moment I was mad. I had been driving for  plus hours and ready for some rest. I told him to just refund my money. He didn't even try to find another hotel near by for us. I had to find another which was another  minute drive from that one. Plus what I had planned got ruined because we had to drive  minutes to another hotel and it already getting late so we had to scrap the days plans. 
I stayed at two other choice hotels that week before going to this one and they were all great clean and had wonderful people. This Rodeway Inn was just disgusting. And the people were just sorta rude. 
Nathan Rayl 
Member #NXR76252 -309-7625 
   Joyce Dr.
South Bend, IN

Message: it is AM in Norfolk Virginia. We had reservations to check in tonight, but something got screwed up. The people in customer service on the telephone found us another hotel,  minutes away. That was sold out too. I don't know where my family will sleep tonight. [1/x] Left home this morning ready for my vacation. We had a reservation at a  location--a Comfort Suites in Newport News. The reservation was from /26 thru /1. But when we got there, the location said they had us checking in the next day - /27. We went right... [2/x] online to show the very dismissive woman behind the counter what the  website said. She wouldn't even look at it. She silently printed out a piece of paper that showed a /27 check-in date and wouldn't engage us in further conversation. So we called customer... [3/x] Service (it's about :30P) for the first  minute hold of the evening. They arranged a night at a really rundown Econolodge, but at this point we were like FINE. Just give us a place to stay. So off we went. After the  minute drive, we are just pulling into the hotel... [4/x] parking lot when my wife's phone rings. It was that Econolodge they had just booked us in saying "sorry, we don't have anything for you either. Better luck next time", only without the "better luck next time" part. This time my wife calls the  customer svc... [5/x] number so SHE can hold for over a half hour. At ONE THIRTY AM, we finally have a hotel to go to. It's another  minute drive to Hampton, at another Econolodge. Here's the best part--or my favorite, anyway. When we were directed by  to go to the first Econo-... [6/x] Lodge,  gave my wife a bunch of reward points so we didn't have to pay for this hotel. But when my wife asks the SECOND agent for this same courtesy at this new hotel, the  agent said no, couldn't do it. We had to PAY for this new hotel for the... [9/9] man, I've gotta tell ya,  getting this $371 dollar charge off my card should only the first thing we get tomorrow morning when my wife calls tomorrow. I've seen some Sh!+ shows in my life, but this takes the cake. Two nights later, my  nightmare still rages on. Best new development? At the gouging Econonolodge location, the RECEIPT I got said $321.xx, but they CHARGED my credit card $371.xx - exactly $50 more. WTF? Where did that other $50 go? On the phone now. Wish me luck!  I'll do it. FYI, I've been on hold for "customer service" for One hour forty-five minutes. I also received a similar reply on a Facebook page, about an hour ago. I am going to DM right now, as this is taking time from my vacation. Hello! The reservation is in my wife's name, Jennifer Miller. The check-in date was June  (the fact that the hotel had it as the th started our nightmare on Saturday night). The address is  Jefferson Avenue in Newport News. Her Account number is , CRS number . Thank you Jeremiah. We're still working with I guess the "Facebook side". Since I don't want your teams to duplicate efforts, I will say thank you and focus my efforts with the other team. Thank you!  Thank you for replying to our message.

Message:
I had always had great experiences at Choice Hotels until a recent visit to Charleston. It was so bad we left after the first night when we had booked for two. They hadnt cleaned the room at all. There was no toilet paper. Then we found out the toilet wouldnt flash. Drug dealers were right outside our door not even trying to hide what they were doing. I was very shocked the Choice Hotels would allow this. I travel a lot and had became used to updated, clean and safe rooms.  This is the hotel we stayed at. Im not looking for a  star hotel when I book a room, but up until this stay I had always been happy with the Choice hotel chain. Although they are doing some updates, this place is by far not up to standards with other Choice hotels Ive stayed in all across the country. I know everybody is short handed, but theres no excuse to not clean the rooms, have toilets that wont flush and have drug deals taking place in broad daylight. We paid for two nights, but could only stay for one because of this. We overpaid at that because they had a sign up advertising a construction special of $65. We paid over $200 for two nights. Here is a copy of the details from the email. My account number is AXG01933 
Allison Grooms   Long Branch Road
Robbinsville NC   -399-0193


My main concern is the safety of the guests that stay at that hotel. Yes, its a bad mark on the Choice brand, but with drug activity going on right outside our room which was right by the pool where kids play.
Summary_T5_1: Choice Hotels in Charleston, North Carolina have apologized for the hotel chain's actions. The choice hotel chain is updating its rooms but they are not up to standards with other Choice hotels. "We paid for two nights, but could only stay for one because of this"

Message:
Hello, I am currently staying at your Tuscaloosa Downtown location and experienced a problem.  One of the main reasons I booked this hotel was because it advertises an indoor heated pool.  We are celebrating my son's birthday and he loved to swim so it was a selling point for me.  I went as far as calling the hotel this morning to find out pool hours so I could schedule our day accordingly.  We get here and get ready for the pool, and once we get there we find the water extremely cold.  The kids try to go in but it's just to cold.  My husband goes and asks the front desk about the heated pool feature and is informed it is not working.  No one mentioned this before our arrival as we would have canceled and booked elsewhere, and the lady I spoke to about pool hours just  hours before our arrival didn't mention it either.  Again, this was supposed to be part of the birthday celebration and one of the main reason we chose this hotel over others in the area. Name: Johnny Estrada
Hotel: Comfort Inn and Suites Downtown
Address:  Jack Warner Pkwy, Tuscaloosa, AL 
Dates: July nd to rd
Confirmation number: 

Again, I called :20am on the day of our arrival to confirm the pool was open and ask for pool hours.  No one mentioned the pool would not be heated and thus too cold to use.  It was such a disappointment for everyone as it was part of our celebration that weekend. Numas, I understand that some amenities are not available during Covid.  I would like to know if you took time to look into the situation before throwing out the Covid excuse.  I would assume you did since I was asked to provide all the details of our reservation in the previous message.  The front desk told us the heating feature of the pool was broken.  It was not due to Covid.  It was something that could have been brought up long before our arrival, or even when I called to inquire about the pool specifically. ,000 does not help at all since I can't use those points without first spending more money in order to earn more points.  I think a partial refund of our stay would be a much more reasonable solution in this situation. Hello, I was working on creating an account to get those points added to. Ok, I created an account under my name.  The member number is YXE4901.  However, I don't know if there is a way to add the points for this past weekend's stay and the ,000 extra point to that profile. Ok, the ,000 can be added to Johnny's account.    Hamilton Ave 
Columbus, MS39705 -332-4901
 

Thank you Thank you!

Message:
what kind of scam are you running where you allow people to book rooms and upon arrival there are no more rooms?! Conf:  Guest name: Shayeeda Bush Location:  Broad St Building A - Clarion, Delaware Water Gap, Pennsylvania , 
United States Saturday July rd I arrived at the location, I was already charged and was told my room was not available. I was told that I should not have been able to make the reservation. It was at this point :30am and there was no where else for me and my sister to go. The front desk associate said he would make a note and Im like theres no note to make I need a place to sleep. The supervisor never showed his face and apparently was cleaning a room for a family that was waiting for a room for  hours with their two children one being an infant. A room was eventually found and I slept for a few hours with my sister in a full size bed and both of us are ft tall and above so it was not the best option but we had no choice at that point. At :10 am because am was check out and I was not made aware. The door was banged on to ask me to check out and hurry up before I would be charged another day. There was also some random man in a wheelchair rolling around the lobby and smoking out front. It was very odd and didnt make me feel safe. I assume he was staying at the Rodeway Inn connected to the clarion. When I called one of your representatives all they did was call the hotel that I was standing in. There was no assistance provided. I was told to call back if I needed mode help and to be clear was never helped. I asked the representative to call me back in  minutes to make sure it was resolved and they never did. Just an overall frustrating and disgusting experience. I asked the hotel for a refund of some kind and they said they would consider it. I dont believe them. I will never patronize this brand again. I simply want my full refund from that establishment. I have no desire to patronize this brand anymore. I cannot chance that this will ever happen again. That makes this situation even worst. Theres nothing you can do about this location and their incompetence but your name is on it.
Summary_T5_1: Shayeeda Bush was charged for her room at the Rodeway Inn in Pennsylvania. She says she was not informed of the charges and asked to call the hotel. The hotel said it would consider refunding her money.

Message:
Im going to start by saying Chris that was working the front desk needs a raise. We were booked for  nights July  through July . We arrived at pm, well past the pm check in time, there was no room available. After over an hour of waiting there was finally a room, so its pm and our room is a mess. There is no bedding, the room is filthy, two mismatched beds on different sized box springs, what looks to be a bullet hole in the headboard, a blood stain in the carpet and black mold growing in the windows. We come to find out housekeeping quit a couple hours prior and left Chris to clean rooms and run the front desk. This is so far from being acceptable that if I were you Id give him a promotion and raise for staying to try to clean up that mess. Ive had better accommodations sleeping in the cab of a fire truck working fires. Suburban Extended Stay Hotel Westminster Denver  N Mariposa, Westminster CO. We were booked July  through the th. Total disaster, I left details in an email and on my review. Kelly Hitson. 
Yes it was brought up to the lone guy working there that evening, Chris. I've been busy after getting back, thank you for reaching out. Right now Im waiting to see if Expedia is going to do right and refund me, or if I need to take legal action to get money back.

Message: My husband stayed only one night(it was supposed to be a two night get away)in the Comfort Inn and Suites in Daphne, Alabama. The hotel was supposed to send us a $50 gas card but never received that either.  So needless to say, that will NOT be our hotel of choice in the future.

Message: Staying at Quality Inn in Elizabethtown, KY right now. Please contact me regarding some very concerning problems with this property. Safety concerns for patrons and employees. Sorry I am just getting back to you.  rooms were booked for our family of  through Travelocity. Confirmation #31702454 and #31700949 under the name Jessica Shelton.  Check-in July ,  Check-out July , .  We arrived for check-in after pm on July  and were informed that one of our rooms was not ready. That was ok, we waited in the other room until it came available (about an hour). Later that night, while staying in room , the door became locked. We could not exit the room. The electronic mechanism is faulty, and the front desk attendant came to open the door. It took her several minutes but she finally got it open, and immediately said "I told them to block this room." When we closed the door again, the same happened. Locked in again. During this time, my son (11) noticed that the hotel room (210) did not have internal sprinklers.  So we were locked in a room without sprinklers, and with a window that did not open.  I shouldn't need to tell you what may have happened in the case of a fire. The fact that the hotel GM and employees KNEW this was a problem and continued to book the room in criminal.  If a fire occurs in that building Choice Hotels would be liable for deaths. I have already contacted the Fire Dept. of Elizabethtown, KY and encouraged them to do a full investigation. This extreme danger is more than enough for Choice (Quality Inn and Suites) to deal with currently, that I even hesitate to mention the room smelled of smoke (non-smoking reservation) and was quite dirty.  Certainly unacceptable in my mind. Thank you for the reply. However, I did not write this with any expectation of favor.  I simply do not want a tragedy to take place and innocent lives to be lost.  This is a correctable problem, and that is all I want.  I'm sorry that points and rewards are not what I am after. I do not feel safe traveling to a Choice Hotel property with my family.  We do not travel very often, and hope this is not normal practice.  I value ethical and moral action well beyond rewards and points.  I truly hope this is corrected soon and that a tragedy does not take place. Weve just had a continuing poor experience. After telling us we would not be charged for our room, we were charged for two rooms. Again, completely unacceptable. Now I am asking for something. I need the charges refunded. Im afraid that the GM and hotel owners are now upset that we alerted Choice and local fire officials of their potential criminality and are charging us because of that. Please refund our charges. And now the hotel has charged us for a third time. This is completely unacceptable. All  charges of $149 each need to be refunded immediately. The practices of Quality Inn and Suites in Elizabethtown, KY are entirely unethical and immoral, and likely illegal. Please correct the myriad of problems. We have already disputed the charges with our bank. I would really like the ethical problems we've encountered to be addressed.  There seems to be a grand moral failure from Quality Inn, Choice Hotels, the local GM, and the local owner (Gopal Krishna Inc). Ethical problem #1 - the fire hazards and lack of sprinklers.  Ethical problem #2 - booking rooms that are known to be dangerous to guests.  Ethical problem #3 - asking us to pay full price for a single room after we've had all these problems.  Ethical problem #4 -  days later charging us for a total of  rooms ($450).  Ethical problem #5 - the nonchalant attitudes of everyone regarding these ethical problems. Sorry, but I'm not quite convinced by the series of pre-programmed responses.  Honestly, the most appropriate course of action is to close the Quality Inn and Suites in Elizabethtown, KY until deemed safe by the local fire marshal. Still nothing on the moral failings then? Other than you "understand my point of view"?  I've done everything I can to prevent a disaster.  Why are Gopal Krishna Inc and Choice Hotels not taking this seriously, or taking responsibility?  People are being locked into their rooms! With no way to escape and no sprinkler system.  But you "understand my point of view" so everything is ok then.  It is quite obvious that Choice Hotels and Gopal Krishna Inc do not care about this problem and potential tragedy.  This is my final message.  Feel free to reach out to take some responsibility.  -Jeremy
Summary_T5_1: The Quality Inn in Elizabethtown, KY is liable for the deaths of thousands of people if a fire occurs there. Jessica Shelton's son noticed that the room did not have internal sprinklers and was locked in. She has already contacted the Fire Dept. of Elizabethtown, KY to do a full investigation.

Message: Never again quality suites. Just never again I have been a member for  years. My account is under my maiden name, Raven Johnson.  This past Saturday,  I stayed at the Quality Inn Suites in Cordova, TN on Varanas Rd. As arriving, front desk clerk Ricky Patel (Bobby Patel is the manager of this particular location) was in a full conversation with another guest that lasted  minutes without acknowledging that I was there. I know this because my alarm went off twice in  minute intervals. Ricky was severely rude and highly prejudiced against African Americans. I say that because in the previous conversation with the guest before me, I never heard him mention smoking and he told them the pool's operating hours. When it came to me, he mentioned "no smoking" once, and twice in front of my husband. I had my husband show up because my husband was paying and had to show his id. I have yet to understand why the specific reiterance of that phrase was needed, but I digress. He told us that the pool was closed and that family and friends were not allowed. (I'm a resident of AR, not TN. My mother's birthday was the only reason I came to Cordova and my loyalty to the company is why I stayed at that location). I received my room and upon arriving it was not ready. (Despite it being :12 p.m., check in time is usually :00p.m.) The housekeeper was cleaning the room, and sprayed not only a plethora of sprays but an insane amount. I had my infant daughter with me. I went downstairs to get another room. Upon explaining to Ricky the issue, he replied, " oh well that doesn't bother me but oh well". I was truly disgusted in his lack of concern about my room being ready. I asked him about the pool again because I noticed people walking towards the pool area. He then explained that the pool he tells local guests the pools are closed. I again explained that I am not a resident of TN and his response was "well you know how that goes". I have yet to receive clarity on that comment. When I walked down the hall to get to the second room, it smelled strongly of marijuana and tobacco. It was to the point of me having to spray a perfume from my bag. I inspected the room before having my family follow. As they are coming down the hall, they noticed the strong smell of smoke on that floor as well. The furniture in the room had to have been moved recently. Everything was so closed. I have pictures to show what I am explaining. My husband and I had to move the dresser around to have walking space. I continously bumped my shin on the edge of the bed because of the lack of space. There were several cords daisy chained (extension cords plugged to other extension cords) directly beside the bed. There was mold in the bathroom. I only stayed because the room was already paid for. The next morning, I went down the lobby to receive a "breakfast bag" as they called it. Greeted to a sign stating "no eating in room, eat food in lobby", I was left confused. I assumed it meant cereal or oatmeal option that was in the bag. Only thing in that bag was an oatmeal bar and a microwaveable chicken pita. After that, I knew choice hotels was off the list of upcoming stays. I'd rather pile up like sardines than to deal with another experience like that. Also listed was the "apple juice" that came out of the machine. I have never seen apple juice In that dark of color ever. In the second picture is mold I happened to see as I was using the bathroom Choice Hotels I have and awaiting your reply Also listed was the complimentary breakfast bag I would like that. It will become helpful in the near future. I have a birthday in August and an anniversary in September.  I greatly appreciate you not only taking the time to hear me out, but making sure the brand is saved. I'm two nights away from a gold status. Thank you so much.  I'm so thankful for you to hear me out
Summary_T5_1: Raven Johnson stayed at the Quality Inn Suites in Cordova, TN on Varanas Rd. The front desk clerk was severely rude and highly prejudiced against African Americans. When she walked down the hall to get to the second room, it smelled strongly of marijuana.
Summary_T5_2: iââm not a resident tn says hotel staffer

Message:
I've had some pretty bad hotel experiences in my life, but none so bad as I had this weekend with    ...that's just fascinating Hi there - yes, we're happy to share more details about our experience. I'll just have to check with some of the others, since we had five rooms. We checked in to the Quality Inn Aurora, CO on July th there were lots of minor issues, like rooms lacking refrigerators and other basic amenities, and the "ice machine room" was completely out of order, and then more challenging was that three of the five rooms had no air conditioning - we requested multiple times that someone come check on them, but that was never handled for any of the rooms and I would say the biggest problem was poor customer service. it was a huge hassle to check in, with one employee saying we couldn't until the person who booked the rooms arrived (even though his flight didn't get in until late Friday) and he had to make multiple phone calls for them to allow us to check in at all then, because the air conditioning situation was so bad, part of our group was going to leave and find a new hotel (which turned out not to be possible, as everything was booked up at other local hotels). but we confirmed with the front desk that, for our third night on our reservation, the one room we had for Sunday night would be one of the rooms with functional AC. the front desk confirmed that we could make that the room we kept for Sunday night. however, when we got back on Sunday evening, that room was locked and all of the stuff we had left in it had been locked up with housekeeping in a garbage bag. the front desk told us we could NOT keep that room, that we'd have to pay double the rate to get it back, and there was nothing they could do - except give us new keys to one of the rooms we had already checked out of, one which had no air conditioning. throughout the entire experience, the primary person we talked to (Christina) treated us like we were a huge inconvenience. I think we tried to be fairly understanding that broken AC isn't necessarily anyone's fault, and it's one thing for an employee to fail to express empathy for guests' issues, but she basically lied to us about which room we could keep and then pretended that we hadn't been very clear about what we had asked the night before No, it's because I've been hiking in areas without cell service - here's the information:  S Abilene St, Aurora, CO 
Names on reservation: Stephanski, Julian; Schindler, Joe; Guerin, Stephen. Brian Bedord and my name (Glenn Poole) were also added during check-in. I'll have to get back to you on the confirmation numbers. Four rooms were booked through Sunday morning, one additional through Monday morning. I gave you some of the names we reserved rooms under, and I do know the room numbers: , , , ,
Summary_T5_1: The Quality Inn Aurora, CO was a great experience. We checked in to the Quality Inn on July th and found some minor issues. One employee said we couldn't check in until the person who booked the rooms arrived. When we got back on Sunday evening, that room was locked and all of the stuff we had left in it had been locked up with housekeeping in a garbage bag.
