To whom it may concern;

Good morning to you. We hope this email finds you well. I run a Small Sharpening Business with my Husband here locally.

I am writing today to inquire if there is any need or interest for some Sharpening at your location for your hotel and / or restaurant. We are Mountain Crest Sharpening, and we handle Culinary Knives as well as Shears and also perform Repairs and Restorations. Please feel free to browse our website (link below) to see some Previous Work and for what Sharpening Offerings we have.

Our prices for knives is just $1/inch and we also offer a % bulk discount on  items or more. We Happily Travel to Your Location for just a $10 fuel surcharge.

We look foreword to hearing from you about this awesome opportunity.

Thank you for your time.

Cheers!

Mountain Crest Sharpening
www.mountaincrestsharpening.com
(775) -2574

 Wonderful, thank you for the information.

Below is the information for our local hotel we are looking to inquire with: 

  Ironwood Dr, Minden, NV -4704

Thank you for your kind response.

Cheers,
Laura & Jonny
Owners / Operators

Message: Highly will not recommend anyone to buy points from Choice Hotels. Even though Choice Hotels promote points will not expire in  due to Covid, Choice Hotels took my ,000+ points away because my account is not active for  months. I purchased my points for what? Choice Hotels... you can call me chicken but I wish I could travel during pandemic.  PM'ed. Thanks Fernando! I have sent this. It looks like Choice Hotels have a different PM. Anyway, here is what I sent - Dear Sir or Madam, this is the information you are asking for. AXY48801,  Bueto Drive, East Lansing, MI , -336-5028, and my email is  To provide you more info. After I read the post, I called Customer Service, the representative is willing to give me % of my total points Maybe I am mistaken. But if Choice Hotels have suspended points expiration until Dec , . Doesn't that mean it will have additional  months that the account needs to be active? In addition, I live in Michigan. The state closure was in place until April . This is basically not feasible to travel until now. Does this mean the points do not expire in  mean nothing to me in this case? I was thinking since the points does not expire in , I will have additional  months to use my points This is why I do not understand. If my points are set to expire on /01/21. And now Choice Hotels points will not expire in Dec . This means this advertisement does not apply to me? This is why I feel like it is a false advertisement. Yes, they did refund my points, but only %. This means % of my points were forfeited even Choice Hotel promised no points expired in . This also indicates to me that Choice Hotel does not really look at the reality. As I said, I live in Michigan. Michigan does not lift the restrictions until April . So am I correct to assume that Choice Hotel penalizes me because of my state restriction? Fernando, thank you for your reply. During our conversation, you have never explained to me about whether -month inactivity applies after Choice Hotel's advertisement about points would not be expired in . Anyway, I am disappointed because I checked my points on June th as I was planning to use my points for th of July. When I checked, the website did not indicate that I must use my points before July , this is why I assume  months after Dec , . This is also why I decide to wait until I want to use my points on July  (and found out that it was all gone). If I knew that  months does not co-existed with point expiration in . I would have used my points on June th. (If you can, please check my searching record. You would have noticed that I am telling the truth). I appreciate that you all have applied one time cursory to give me % of points back. I am just so disappointed as Choice Hotel does no have a consistent policy; I just feel like Choice Hotel is taking advantages of small potatoes during the pandemic. Anyway, thank you for reaching out. I will stay firm on my comment about not buying points from Choice Hotels as the policy is not consistent with the advertisement, not to mention there is no notification from the account stating the time that points will expire. Update - Choice Hotel is willing to exercise one time cursory to give % (and then % after I questioned repeatedly) of my points back. During my -day messaging, I found out that even though Choice Hotel advertised points do not expire in , but if you have not stayed with them on June  , your points will expire on Jan ,  as the advertisement is only applied for the year . There is no further  month December . This means this advertisement does not help me at all, especially my state does not lift restriction until April . I just wish Customer Service does not dodge this question repeatedly (Maybe company policy does not allow it). There is no explanation or remainder on point expiration date, so buyer be aware as I have lost over ,000+ points. I just feel like Choice Hotel is taking advantage during the pandemic, especially the policy is not clear. Helder, you nail it. Choice Hotel policies do not fit my needs anymore. Once I use up all my points, I will not give my money to other Choice Hotels, especially I have my Gold and Plantium status with Marriott and Hilton. It will try to boost my status further with them instead. Thank you.

Message:
Hello, my name is Kayla Byers and my fiance and I stayed at Mackinaw City Clarion and had an unpleasant experience. My fianc and I stopped for the evening in Mackinaw. We had scoped the hotel out online prior to booking due to the positive reviews. Unfortunately our experience was anything but positive. 

When we arrived at our hotel room , it reeked of cigarette smoke, had water damage in the bathroom, the wifi didn't work, and the jacuzzi seemed stained/unclean. Unhappy but with it being too late to find another hotel, we decided to make due and make the best of an unsatisfactory experience. After getting a few drinks and heading back to the hotel, our room key didn't work and we were locked out of the room. We walked up to the check in, got a new room key, walked back to our room, and it failed again still locking us out. Upset about our stay and now having our buzz killed, we got assistance from the front desk and had to change rooms to room  after checking the lock and determining it was indeed faulty

Once in the room, our wifi still didn't work so we had no access to the internet for the stay. In the morning the "grab and go breakfast " was a Granola bar, bottle of water, and an apple.

This stay was so awful compared to what we had expected, especially considering what we paid. I am still waiting to speak to management about our issues We arrived on Sunday July th and checked out Monday July th. Name on the reservation was Kayla Byers,  confirmation number is , address was  S Huron Ave, Mackinaw City, MI  Also thank you for hearing me out and taking my complaint seriously Unfortunately, I cannot use the voucher. I live /2 hours away, and don't intend to use it. I would appreciate an attempt to get some portion of my money back at least The voucher was forced on me by the combative front end manager
Summary_T5_1: Kayla Byers and her fiance and I stayed at Mackinaw City Clarion in Michigan. We arrived at our hotel room reeked of cigarette smoke, had water damage in the bathroom, and the jacuzzi seemed stained/unclean. After getting a few drinks and heading back to the hotel, our room key didn't work and we were locked out of the room.
Summary_T5_2: us couple stay hotel due faulty wifi water damage

Message:
we have used Choice Hotels for reservations over the past few years.  We have experienced a couple HORRIBLE experiences but no where to complain and it is always a hotel that gives NO REFUND once you pay.  In June we stayed in Hattiesburg, MS, the rooms not only smelled moldy - they WERE moldy.  You could see the mold along the floor/wall area in the whole room, the phone did not work, the "free WIFI" did not work, the employee was a whole new story, and we could not get our money back.  The Econo Lodge morning employee said she would do a particial refund while we were there checking out and we never received the refund and she was sending an email as well and it never came either.  The room cost was $88.80 and that is a lot of money to loose.  I did not expect a full refund because we did stay even though the room was really bad (it was late night). Message:
Sevierville, TN - Quality Inn,  Winfield Dunn 

Reserved three rooms. Rooms were not set up as we were told. But the worst part was that the bedding was dirty, the toilet paper holder was hanging out of the wall, we had no A/C until the second day when they decided it needed to be replaced (after asking the third time), the light in the bathroom did not work, and the hanging rack was hanging out of the wall (we couldnt hang clothes on it). Hotel staff were NOT helpful at all.  We tried to make the best of it but it continued to get worse. 

As we decided to just let it go, our family proceeded to go to the outdoor pool. We didnt realize food and drinks werent allowed in the area. The desk clerk proceeded to tell one of our kids that we needed to get out of the area with drinks (very rude, didnt speak with an adult). 

After speaking with the manager, things escalated even further. She let me know that a maintenance person was not on staff today and it pretty much was an inconvenience. She also was not understanding at all when I said we didnt see the sign at the pool. We finished our drinks and food, started picking up our belongings and she proceeded to call the police to have us removed from the property. I had already offered to check out of our three rooms but that was a no go because theyd only refund one.  

In addition, the police were not helpful and generally very rude. They gave us less than thirty minutes to get off of the property which was absurd.  We had three rooms to pack up. 

In the meantime, another couple left due to their room being unacceptable and they couldnt get their money back either. 

Overall, it was a HORRID experience. We obviously inconvenienced them by being there and complaining that the room wasnt in acceptable condition.   

Im hoping to still get the refund on the one room at least. We luckily ran into someone that worked for corporate - hopefully she will be able to help us. 

Its very unfortunate - we own our own business that has a crew that travels ALL of the time (hence our CHOICE status being the highest level). We will no longer have our guys staying at any CHOICE hotels. We had  rooms staying in the Atlanta area, theyve checked out early and we wont be using any of their hotels until this is resolved. Hi Jendy, I received an email from Marion. She stated theyre investigating and will get back with me. 
Thank you.
Summary_T5_1: Quality Inn, Winfield Dunn, TN, booked three rooms in Sevierville. The worst part was that the bedding was dirty, the toilet paper holder was hanging out of the wall and the light in the bathroom did not work. We tried to make the best of it but it continued to get worse.

Message: Hi, I had a reservation at Sleep Inn in Post Falls Idaho for Saturday night (7/17). I booked it through your website. The hotel called me at :30 pm (!!!) on Friday night /16 to tell me they were overbooked and cancelled the reservation. They said it wasnt their error but the Choice Hotels websites error so they refused to take responsibility for helping us out. We were planning on leaving in less than  hours to head to this hotel. We were unable to find another place to stay in Post Falls and had to significantly alter our plans. The Sleep Inns customer service was absolutely atrocious. They said your website was at fault. We checked that evening and were still able to make online reservations at that hotel, so it seems there was a website error. Please make this right. Thank you. Thanks, Zaira. Below is a screenshot of my initial reservation followed by the email cancellation I received. I did not see the cancellation email at all before the hotel called and would have not seen it until I was on my way to the hotel. The hotel called me after  pm at night as well (the conversation where they said it wasnt their fault so they wouldnt help me). I travel frequently for work (Im a travel writer) and used to work in a hotel quite a few years ago, so I know the hotels customer service was appalling. I asked them to follow the professional standard of walking me to a different hotel, by finding a hotel with equal or better accommodations and paying for and arranging the reservation and they outright refused. The woman I spoke to suggested I find a hotel in a different state (Washington) and she mentioned a hotel she wouldnt recommend. Neither of which was helpful at all. This caused a significant disruption in our plans and we were not able to visit Post Falls at all (we even had dinner plans there). Please make this right. I have another Choice Hotel reservation for Thursday night this week in Missoula Montana) and would like to know you stand by your website and service. Thank you.   Thank you for the message, Zaira. The same hotel costs ,000 points to book for a Saturday summer night, so I think ,000 points would be appropriate. Could you please provide ,000 points (the equivalent of a comparable night at the same hotel that cancelled the reservation) to make this right? Thank you. Thank you. I appreciate it. The account is under Kristen Pope, email is  .206.5771, and address is PO Box ,Victor Idaho

I know enough about hotels and how they work.I will message you all but I really do not expect much out of it.I'm so upset and am such a patient understanding person but this is unacceptable for a brand such as yours to allow your members to be treated so poorly, especially someone young female and all by herself at night in a bad/unsafe situation. This is San Antonio, TX. NEVER AGAIN! And refuse to refund my st night stay even though we tried to leave the same night but the front desk had closed      Bed bugs     I have so many more videos. In the bathroom, near the refrigerator. The entire room was infested!     Bites from their bugs Hello. My family arrived at WoodSpring Suites San Antonio South with a planned stay from July ,  thru July , . Address  IH  South, San Antonio, TX . 

We checked in on the th. Immediately upon entering the room a live crawling roach was noticed on the floor. We didnt make a big deal about it. We attempted to settle into the room when more live roaches began to crawl on the walls. I went to the front desk to inform them of the pest problem. The lady apologized and said it was because of the rain. A guy from the hotel was sent to put down some boric acid. He put it behind the refrigerator and said that should take care of the problem. 

We left to get dinner. Once we arrived back we noticed several live roaches in the restroom and some that had been smashed against the wall either by the previous guests or the cleaning crew. The live roaches had taken over the room. They were crawling ON THE BEDS, walls, ceiling, countertops and floor. On top of all of that there were BED BUGS! 

We unfortunately could not check out the same night because the front desk was closed. The customer service number I called regarding my refund said everything had to be handled at the front desk. The option doesnt allow you to speak with a person it automatically disconnects the call after stating the front desk at the hotel needs to be contacted. We (WITHOUT ANY SLEEP DUE TO ROACH AND BED BUG ATTACKS) waited until the following morning to go to the front desk to checkout and get refunded. 

I was given a refund for the days I did not stay but not for the initial night of the th. According to the hotel I did not checkout the same night so they are refusing my refund. I could NOT checkout the same night because they were closed and the customer service number said refunds are handled at the hotels front desk. My total was $516.08. I was given a refund of $435.78. They have refused to give the remaining balance of $80.30 which is all I am requesting. 

I have lots of video if needed. This hotel may need to be closed and tented because there is a complete infestation that needs to be dealt with immediately. 

If you have any further questions please let me know. 

Thank you!  DM sent

Hello! Who should I give a big public shout out to for your terrible customer service in your Choice Rewards Program. Your App was an epic failure and could not book anything in the same county- even though to target hotel and  closest hotels all confirmed dozens of rooms were in fact available.  If you look at the way it was finally booked, instead of the  weeks we wanted, we had  reservations for  week, each  per night, and then a paid day, and then another  reservations, again  night a time - then an impossible to book night then another  days of one night a time reservations! That is ridiculous! That impossible to book night was instantly booked by the front desk.
Hotel staff can not book with reward points. You have the only hotel chain on the planet where that is true.
Marriott where we only had ,000 points book us a room night in one call to the hotel, is mess than  seconds. Contrast that to the HOURS spent getting this done with Choice where I had ,000 points.
You should be way nicer to your top clients!!! It sort of worked  of those  times, but constant disconnects made it impossible.  points is nice but does NOT make up for how bad you system works. This isnt for fun, nor business. It is force by circumstance after a house fire. The staff at the hotel are excellent, but they are limited by your system. You are NOT the highest level of customer service. The is certainly your Boss, and they have a Boss, and somewhere above them is the Director of Customer Experience who has a name with the title and a direct dial phone number. That is the person who I should be talking to. If you want me excepting points that are this difficult to use, dont insult me with tiny amounts of those points.  Use numbers that inspire belief in your understanding just how spectacularly youve abused what it certainly This hotels best Client. Here is a hint: I spend miles in ,000 chunks. Start there and work your way up. Jendy, if this is being escalated, when will I hear back from someone in power who can effect positive change?
This was a MAJOR SCREWUP, not a little inconvenience. Your offers are tiny drops in an ocean of change that must happen. Make it a much more rewarding offer There have been  different respondents to this thread. Hoping you all read all that was written. We were first offered ,000 points, which only materialized as ,000 and youve gone on to offer LESS each time, like this is a joke to you.
Let me remind you that ALL of our problems are with using your Choice Rewards Points. If you are going to give us more of those incredibly difficult to use points, at least do it in amounts worthy of an attempt. Rooms start at ,000 points. We only book at least   nights at a time. A good start at making this right would be multiples of that amount. That would start at ,000 points. Frankly, we would much prefer the CASH equivalent. Add all the points you want to the account. Note that this issue will not be successfully resolved until your system is FIXED. They are not acceptable. None of this is acceptable!

Message: I filed a complaint against the Econo Lodge in Crystal River, but I haven't heard from anyone.  The reservations clerks are extremely rude and not professional at all.  The beds were very hard and not comfortable at all.  Plus the room was overpriced.  The floor was a laminate flooring and I almost slipped on it several times.  But most of all, the customer service was awful.  I have been trying to obtain my confirmation number for my stay on July th and the reservation clerks REFUSE to give it to me.  I just spoke to an office clerk with a "Indian" or Mideastern accent, and he was extremely rude also.  I don't know what is going on at the Econo Lodge but the service there  is terrible. We stayed at the Econo Lodge in Crystal River, FL  on /6/21.  I believe they jacked up the price to $83.25 due to hurricane Elsa.  The internet said $64.00.  The office clerk on the afternoon of /6 was extremely rude and obnoxious; not what you expect when booking a room for the night.  The beds were ROCK HARD and not comfortable at all.   The laminate flooring was SLIPPERY.  I called yesterday to obtain my confirmation number, which I misplaced.  The clerk said she was going to send it via email; but she NEVER DID.  To me, that is another negative for this hotel.  I then called at  a.m. and spoke to a gentleman with an "Indian" or "Middle Eastern" accent, and he was also very rude.  Kept asking me WHY I needed my confirmation number, as if it was top secret to give it to me!!!  I am do disgusted with their service; I will never go back there.  The service was humiliating and rude! Nadia Dombrowski,  W. Hunterhill st., Dunnellon, FL   I already joined on your website.  I don't know what ,000 points is equalled to. That is really kind of you. The member number is NXD98241.  I don't know what agreement you are talking about. and my phone number....why do you need it?

Message: We were robbed in your Quality Inn @ Eureka. Our bikes which were double locked to our bike rack were cut off. We were told a) we couldnt back in (to hide them from view) b) that staff were monitoring the car park x7 and we shouldnt worry. We are very upset. Yes we have reported to the police Via        July th. Marisa Woodget.  th St, Eureka, CA  I dont know what to say. So there is nothing you can do? Dont you have insurance for things like this? If wed been allowed to back in theyd never have seen our bikes. If your staff had kept an eye on things as they promised our bikes would not have been stolen. Thanks Ed. I have a soft spot for social media managers as I have friends who do what you do. Heres the thing. Quality Inns brand is dead to me now. I cant stay there any more. And we road trip all the time. I feel so violated. My youngest son has been crying all day. One bike, mine, was a present from my parents who died in a car crash  years ago on July . I just expect more I guess. Im so upset and sad right now. (And to be fair. Choice hotels brand) A free night? We just lost: $3,000 of bikes. $200 of bike rack repairs. A wasted day of precious vacation days and a ton of upset and stress. Not to mention my poor you g childrens experience through this ordeal. A few night is a joke and I hope you can understand that. All of this could have been averted by the hotel staff taking their job seriously. To put it in context a free night at one of your thief traps is % of the hard costs (let alone emotional) of what we lost last night

Message:
please remove Comfort Inn and Suites Lombard from your group benefits list.  They allow employees to threaten guests with bodily harm and allow strange men access to underage girls rms. See my review  My party made group reservations for  July rd through the th.  We were not given a confirmation number.   rooms were under Gabriel Jackson, the other  rooms were under LaChanee Hipps.  All rooms used her card to pay.  The group stayed there under Buck Out Cleveland . The name of LaChanees dance studio, the reason we were in Chicago performing this weekend.  The majority of the girls were between  and .  I made our reservations with Violet, the sales representative for Comfort Inn and Suites in Lombard, IL.  Upon arrival  girls went to their room, used the room key, opened the door and saw a man sitting on the bed playing guitar.  Thankfully he was in there when they arrived, versus coming in later with his key when they were getting dressed or sleeping.  Another room had stinky food .  We still stayed in the room for one night because when we requested house keeping they said its too late.  So we decided to wait instead of moving.  By the next day the room was unbearable, however the room had clean beds , not sure why how the food was still left.  By this time housekeeping came, opened the door and it still stunk very bad as they were cleaning.  At that point our girls had to be moved to another room.  Next unpleasant situation, all within one weekend, the elevator started jolting and dropping before getting us to the correct floor, it felt like a roller coaster.  Saturday at :30am I experienced that, then later hotel staff mentioned the hotel was aware of it having problems since Friday the rd at  noon.  There was no sign and no mention of the elevator experiencing safety issues at our check in Friday at :30pm.  After my experience I told staff.  Saturday :30am  more party members arrived, used the elevator.  Was not informed about the issue until the elevator door was closing.  Michelle the staff member told them you may experience a problem but it would still get you to the right place to them after theyve already pressed the nd floor button.  It did not get them to the nd floor at all.  They were stuck for several minutes.  With one having a medical history of panic attacks, this triggered her mental anxiety.  Maintenance had to help them, Michelle was not at the front desk to hear the help bell.  Thankfully their cell phones worked in the elevator to alert a member of our party that was in the hotel still.  Most members were gone for performance practice.  After getting stuck in the elevator she was upset and asked for a credit to the staff.  Instead of the Michelle stating she was not the correct person, she argued with our group member.  Michelles daughter and granddaughter were in the lobby, after the incident Michelles daughter threatened bodily harm to party member stating Shes lucky shes here if she was anywhere else we would beat her ass!  After that statement Michelles daughter went to our party member and demanded the affected customer give her mother an apology.  We are requesting a full investigation of the tapes during that whole day.  After the incident I requested to speak with the general manager Frank.  Michelle refused to allow me to speak with the general manager several times before I raised my voice to continue to request speaking with Frank. At  noon she said Frank was sleeping, then she said she couldnt call him, then she refused.  We asked for a business card she said he doesnt have one.  Later at pm we spoke with Frank.  He was at the hotel for his shift.  After apologizing he took a defense position.  Even mentioned to the affected party member that she should have used the phone in the elevator, as if it was her failure of not knowing how to be properly stuck in an elevator as the reason why she was stuck so long.  He told us the best he could do was give $60 as a credit.  Our party paid over $2500.  He mentioned we already received discounted nights.  Yes we did, assuming that the elevator worked and that we would not be threatened in Chicago a city known for murders with bodily harm.  Due to that situation we request a full refund for our stay.  Even Monday after we home I called Violet, she told me to call the hotel and ask Frank to do something more for us.  Frank said no he couldnt, and each time he came from a disposition as if that situation was no big deal.  Im not sure if it is because our party is all Black as well as the employee that threatened us.  Maybe he feels that our lives dont matter, if our bones were shattered from a  foot drop in the elevator.  Maybe Frank who is Caucasian doesnt believe our lives were truly threatened by that employee.  Im not sure but his stance and tone was completely inappropriate. I mentioned to him was that all he could do because this is a legal issue, which it is, were not being informed about the elevator experiencing problems beforehand.  If we were we all couldve made the informed decision not to use before becoming affected by the situation.  He got extremely defensive and said its not, I got lawyers, you got lawyers.  As of to blow me off,    most of the party were young dancers and would and could be extremely affected by a  foot drop as well as psychiatric trauma.  Thankfully, it did not happen to them alone.  I would like Michelle and Frank to be let go for the situation, and for us to receive a full refund for our entire stay, we will think twice about staying with Choice Hotels in the future without an acceptable resolution.  Thank you for reading and allowing me to voice my concerns Before accepting I would like to know for one room, one night, approximately how many points does that use?  

When do the points expire? 

Can they be used for group rates or any other discounts? So one night, one room will mostly use all points.   rooms, over  people in our party were affected. 

No thank you.  Please offer provide another offer.  rooms were under my name.  The foul smelling room was under my name. Was there a resolution for the hotel staff Michelle and her daughter?  Our party was threatened in Chicago, a city known across the globe for murders.  Our license plates are visible and provided to hotel staff for parking.  License plates are public record, and Chicago has been known for soliciting physical harm to people even after they have left Chicago and are back in their cities. 

Have the tapes for that day been reviewed?

My shoes were sticking to the carpet.

The front desk would not answer the phone so I had to walk all the way across the hotel to get towels,  phone, etc. There isn't any maid service. The police were there the whole weekend with things going on. I feel like this place is just laundering money. I will be making a post with pics of this place. Ive tried calling the customer complaint hotline many times with hours long hold times and no answer. My hotel stay had blood in the room and no AC. I demand a refund and an explanation. The hotel was a Quality Inn and Suites at  Parkway, Pigeon Forge TN, 

My experience : We arrived at this location for a birthday get away. Checking in, the staff was very rude and quick, acting as if it was a hassle I was there to begin with. When we received our room, we went to it to discover that the A/C barely worked, causing it to never get below  degrees in the room, while it was  degrees outside. The maintenance crew came multiple times to only remove the cover and replace it and say they fixed it. The fireplace was stuck on too, causing heat to enter. The bed had spots of blood on it, or red wine, unsure. Management was contacted and they refused a refund and refused to move us to another room. Walking barefoot on the floor of the room caused our feet to turn coal black. The shower had no water pressure, the internet only worked % of the time. The parking is terrible as well. Unless you get back in super early, you have to park all the way across the road at a whole other building. All in all, this was a terrible place, and I wouldnt let my dog sleep there. 

The date of arrival was /30/2021

Name : Zachary Foster 

We wanted to check out early due to this problem, but couldnt due to no vacancies in the area. Why can I not just receive a refund? I have never been quite so grossed out. Completely filthy room down to used face masks in the trash. Not sure how this lives up to a single standard you claim to hold,  Hi there! We are having an awful experience in Chestertown, MD. The cleaning staff hasnt done much of anything so we walked into a filthy room with dirty towels and unmade used beds with trash lying around. The front desk person is trying her best, but she seems to be stuck by herself trying to clean rooms and help guests and fix things like our busted tv on her own. This is the worst hotel experience Ive ever had, and its made worse that this is the first hotel experience my children have ever had. - date of arrival: August th,  - name on reservation: Anthony Funari Bri was able to move us into a clean room after she was able to locate one about  minutes later. The person at the front desk last night is named Bri, and she was doing her absolute best to handle what sounded like an awful night. Big shout out to her! I just have no idea what happened to anyone else or the cleaning crew. We are still staying there - we have one more night. Do you have any idea how late the owners might be there? Were not likely to be back for -5 more hours. Got it! We handle this type of thing for my main client the same way. Thanks so much for all your help, from one social media person to another!

I know that the $50 gift card was to be delivered on Monday /2/21 since I have Informed Delivery from USPS and I have an email picture of the envelope to be delivered to my PO Box on that day. However the letter never arrived and I strongly suspect foul play at the post office. I've never had a mail piece more than  day late let alone an entire week. And since the envelope was easily identifiable as a gift card I  anted to let you guys know asap in order to cancel and replace.  This was the photo of the gift card letter that should have arrived on Monday. I understand that Choice is not responsible for a lost or stolen card. And I am asking for an exception due to the good faith effort I've shown. That's why I'm asking for Choice to cancel the card now since there is evidence for the card being stolen, and replace the card given the good faith effort made by me. The basis of my request to you is to cancel and replace the card given the prompt facts I have shown and the good faith effort made by me. If I haven't received the card by then I certainly appreciate your offer to provide a different experience of sending the card - hopefully I will receive the original card and you won't need to send the replacement. Good news - I went to the post office earlier today and after some searching they were able to somehow locate my missing gift card. So it looks like there is a happy ending here. Thanks for your attention on this!

Message: On May ,  I was visited by the police and was told by the police that I had to pack up and leave because the management wanted me to evict me because someone had told management that I had been taking pictures of children. This is unconscionable and should not have happened as it is not illegal for anyone to take pictures or video of anything that is within public view. I want and expect an apology from your hotel chain regarding this issue. Management should have known better than that and should have dealt with this person's complaint better. The police never should have been called as I did not do anything illegal or wrong. I went to Florida to meet a woman in person that I had been talking to online, but could not verify if she was real or not. I stayed at your motel in Kissimee as it was the closet motel that I could find to where this woman was staying and was the only motel that I could find at the time that actually had rooms available. Photography is a passing hobby of mine and I like taking pictures of things that I see not only for posterity, but also to improve my photography skills. The pictures and video's that I was taking were of the property and the surrounding area and were with the intent of being able to preserve the memory of my trip to Florida. I am not happy about what happened to me and I believe that an apology by your hotel chain is in order as photography is not a crime and I should not have been treated like a criminal for taking pictures and video of the area. Kissimee is a well known tourist hotspot because of Disney World and Epcot Center and Seaworld. Photography and tourism go hand and hand and is to be expected in an area like Kissimee. The management should have known that as it is important to your business and overall bottom line. If your hotel chain tries to prevent people from taking pictures or video's during their stay at your hotel, then you can and will lose customers and business and that can and will effect your ability to stay in business. This matter should have been handled much better by the hotel management and an apology to me is in order. This kind of behavior is bad for business and it can lead to potential lawsuits as people have the legal right to photograph or film anything that is within public view. This issue needs to be properly addressed before it becomes a legal issue. I do not have a confirmation number. The name of the hotel was the Clarion Inn & Suites - Maingate located at  Irlo Bronson Hwy in Kissimmee, Florida. This incident occurred on May , . I checked in on Tuesday May ,  and checked out on Sunday May , . I found this hotel through a Google search on my phone on Tuesday May , . I chose this hotel as it was close to where I was at the time and because of their nightly rate and their availability of rooms at the time. With the exception of this incident I did not have any issues with the hotel and actually liked the hotel itself. If this issue can be positively resolved, then I will recommend this hotel to others, but only if this issue is resolved. I will not recommend any hotel or motel that tries to penalize or criminalize guests for things like taking pictures and videos. Basic common sense says that you do not attack or try to criminalize tourists for taking pictures as it is an unwritten rule that when you are on vacation you take pictures and it is something that most hotels/motels know and understand. No one likes being treated like a criminal for taking pictures and any business that attempts to penalize or criminalize tourists/vacationer's for taking pictures and video's can and will lose business and find themselves out of business as that can and will get around through word of mouth. Basic common sense says that you want your guests to positively remember their stay with you so that they will potentially recommend you and your business to their friends, family and business associates. That is why customer service is so important. Without guests, your business is out of business. I stayed in room .
Summary_T5_1: The police never should have been called as I did not do anything illegal or wrong. Kissimee is a well known tourist hotspot because of Disney World, Epcot Center and Seaworld. Photography is a passing hobby of mine and I like taking pictures of things that I see not only for posterity but also to improve my photography skills.

Message: Congratulations- you gave me the worst experience I have had at a hotel in my  years of traveling.  I will never recommend Quality Inns again. Per your response to my tweet regarding my recent stay. My name is Susan Fultz.   On  July , my daughter and I were traveling from Kentucky to New Jersey to visit my son for my birthday /30 and to celebrate the end of my radiation treatment.  I recently completed two months of radiation treatment for cancer, and we decided to stop at a hotel, and finish our drive on Saturday.  We couldn't find a hotel at several exits, and went in through the Choice app about am on /31.  We were connected with a very nice reservation specialist, Kenn Laurence.  He found a hotel with rooms, and gave us a choice of a King room or a room with two double beds at the Quality Inn and Conference Center,  Ramada Road, Somerset, PA .  We prepaid the room - he said that it was non-refundable.  The Acct #was .  When we arrived at the hotel, totally exhausted at :30am, the desk clerk was very rude, said there were no rooms ("the manager told me that we were sold out when he went to bed at midnight").  I said we had  a reservation, and she said she didn't care - there were no rooms.  I showed her the prepayment on my charge card and my reservation in the Choice app.  She watched my daughter unload bags onto a luggage cart, and then said, oh - here is a room.  She kept saying she was new and didn't really know what to do - the hotel was sold out.  She gave me a key card and said she didn't know how to tell us how to get to the stairs - that she didn't know her way around the hotel - I asked about an elevator, and she said there was not an elevator - in a conference center? and after watching my daughter load a luggage cart.  She walked us to the end of a hallway and left, and my daughter hefted our bags up the stairs.  We go to the end of another hallway, open the door to the room and it is a totally uncleaned room.  Beds used, bathroom filthy, food on the tv stand.  Went to call down to the desk - phone unplugged.  Crawled on floor to find the phone cord, called desk, she said to bring everything back down to the lobby - she was "talking" with the manager.   We moved everything back down two long halls - I was close to collapsing at that point.  Got back to the lobby - she told us to wait - the manager was "putting on his pants" and would be "down" in a few minutes.  She kept mumbling about she would clean the room if she had to, that it would all be her fault, that she is new, that she would make sure the manager put us on the first floor, etc.   We waited a bit, manager was a no show, then she said - just a minute - let me check this other King room (3 doors down from the lobby).  She came back a minute later and said she could put us in that room (in a hotel that she said had rudely told us no rooms were available upon arrival).  By this time, it was after am - the manager never showed up.  We went to this room - luckily it was clean.  We stayed in that room - it was very hot upon arrival - we turned the air down and went to bed.  When we woke in  the morning - the room was still uncomfortably warm.  We went to leave at a little after am.  No receipt had been put under our door.  Got to the lobby - nobody behind the desk - just a placard saying assisting another guest currently.  Nobody came, we put the keycard in the basket and left.  I have been traveling for business for over  years, and have never been treated like that.  Apparently, the manager told her I was lying about prepayment - the desk clerk never ran my credit card, but I had a pending charge on my credit card - which the reservations specialist had taken over the phone.   Hefting bags around a hotel to a dirty room, hefting them back down, in warm hallways, was not an experience I would expect.  I felt disrespected and was being called a liar.  This hotel was subpar and the experience was extremely disappointing.  I filled out the hotel survey sent by email reflecting the above information, and this morning I got an email saying, "Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel." and that was all.  Not what I expect from Choice Hotels. I do appreciate the offer and I accept.  My member ID is SGF3101, my phone number is -760-3101, email:  and address is:   Presidential Drive, Hebron, KY  .   Susan Fultz.   I do want to clarify my review put on the website - I did not demand to see the manager at am.  The clerk told me the manager was coming down.  (the hotel response makes it sound like I was being unreasonable and demanding to see the manager - which I never asked for-, when all I wanted was a room I had paid for and sleep).  He also calls your app a "third party" app and not the brands app.  Thank you.
Summary_T5_1: Susan Fultz's daughter and I were traveling from Kentucky to New Jersey to visit my son for his birthday /30. We couldn't find a hotel at several exits, and went in through the Choice app about am on /31. When we arrived at the Quality Inn and Conference Center, totally exhausted at :30am, the desk clerk was very rude, said there were no rooms. She showed her prepayment on her charge card and her reservation in the Choice app.

To whom it may concern;

We have made  attempts at reaching the Quality Inn & Suites Manager in Owego New York regarding the charges and the unsanitary conditions of both our rooms booked for one night only. We did receive a call back from Jessica, the night shift clerk who stated the Manager was willing to offer a % to % discount on both rooms.  This is NOT acceptable.   We should be receiving a full refund based on the disgusting, uncleanliness of our rooms. Not to mention, management told us not to check out and stated we would receive a call from him! He did not call and we were charged for the room anyway!

I sent photos, proof of what we encountered, with the Choice Hotel logo displayed on one of the photos. This Manager has still not called us back. 

Once again, this is simply not acceptable. I will be contacting the State health department, and provide the photos. In addition, these photos and reviews will be placed on every Social media site we have access to, as well as Choice Hotels, copied on this email.

The condition of our rooms was not sanitary. Not quality at all, which is unacceptable. We will never again stay in another Quality Inn & Suites again. We will encourage others not to stay at these facilities as well. People can get sick from unsanitary conditions such as these. Choice Hotels does not keep track of their hotels they are affiliated with. We stayed in Quality Inn in Owego NY and there was snot on the bed, urine stains on the sheets and feces on the toilet. Message: Just filled out a review survey that was emailed to me about my recent stay at the Quality Inn in Kalamazoo MI. I also posted a video on social media of my room. We give a full scholarship, once a month, for a veteran to attend our boot camp here in Galveston, Texas. We booked his room through my account with choice, for the week of /19-7/23. The room was at Rodeway Inn. I paid for the room in full with my Amex. The gentleman checked in, and immediately began getting bit with bed bugs. He went to front office, who seemed to be aware of the issue, and wrote on the receipt that bed bugs were present, and he was being checked out, and a full refund. The clerk's name was Chase, and he wrote it out on the receipt. .85. It is now /13 and the refund has never occurred. We have called them multiple times, and even when by in person twice. There is an excuse every time. This is unacceptable. I still paid for another room for our veteran, and paid the Amex as soon as it showed.

Not the way to do business for choice, or the rodeway inn.

I stayed at one of your locations and ended up checking out  hours after checking in because cockroaches and ants were found in my room. When I tried to cancel my other reservation at the same location I was told there was a strict no cancellation policy. I have talked to the general manager. I have talked to customer relations  separate times and the best offer I've received is ,000 points. I just want my $220.83 cents back. Here is the information you requested. Case #10406075 Your agent Maiden said she was marking it as resolved on /20/21 because she created me a member account and added ,000 points to this account. My issue is not resolved. My mailing address is  Sawyer Drive, Aliquippa, PA . Email is angelawilliams2 Sorry I sent too soon. Email is  and my phone number is . The confirmation number for the date of arrival for when my mother and I discovered bugs crawling around is  and dated /6/21-8/7/21.  The reservation I wanted to cancel after finding the bugs crawling around was for /7/21-8/10/21 with a confirmation number of . The hotel's name is Sleep Inn & Suites BWI Airport,  Belle Grove Rd, Baltimore, MD .
Four hours after checking in on /6 my disabled mother and I packed our stuff as fast as possible after seeing cockroaches on the wall and ants on the nightstand where her CPAP machine was set up. I stopped at the front desk to let them know we were checking out, why we were checking out, and to cancel my reservation that was supposed to start the next day. He said they have a no cancellation policy. He looked at my reservation and also told me that since I booked through Priceline I would have to call Priceline. I called Priceline who told me they had to call the hotel. Priceline called the hotel and was told there was a no cancellation policy. Priceline told me I would have to talk to the hotel directly. I called the hotel on /7/21 and spoke to Bill who informed me I would have to speak to the GM Kamal but he's out until Monday the th. I didn't get home from my travels until the th and when I asked to speak to Kamal I was transferred and received the voice mail of Robert Whaley. I left a message but still have not received a call back. 
I decided to contact Choice Hotels directly. I don't know the name of the agent I spoke to on /12/21 from :25am-12:19pm but she called the hotel and told me she was filing a refund request and gave me a confirmation number of . I asked her what I do with that number and she said the hotel will email me with instructions. A week went by and I didn't hear anything so I called back on /20/21 and spoke to Fernando who filed the official claim and gave me the case number . He called the hotel and Bill told him the GM was busy and to call back in an hour. Fernando told me to call back in an hour and another agent would call the hotel for me. I called Choice Hotels back an hour later and spoke to Maiden who would not call the hotel back but insisted on just giving me ,000 points and considered the issue resolved.
I have stayed at various Choice Hotels properties before and never had an issue until this one. Can this issue be solved? Thank you Just sent a message I wouldn't say I "accepted" the "offer". That agent was supposed to call the hotel for me but refused to and told me she can create a choice privileges account in my name and put ,000 points in it. I am trying to cancel and receive a refund for a  night reservation. I have a trip coming up in September to Columbus, Ohio for  nights. If you have any properties there will you give me  nights free? I would be checking in September th and out September th I didn't stay on /7. The /7/21-8/10/21 is the reservation I wanted to cancel and receive compensation for and again...I did not accept the points!! The agent, Maiden, refused to call the hotel back for me and instead created a Choice privileges account. I'm looking for a total of  nights compensation So your previous response was sent without even reading my case notes? Got it. Which reservation did that case "resolve"? I'd like to open a new case for the other reservation. Are you offering to deposit an additional ,000 points? I agree to those terms. My Choice Privileges number is ARW4122
Mailing address:   Sawyer Drive
Aliquippa, PA

Phone: -423-4122
Thank you for your assistance

Message:
Comfort Suites in Fairview Heights, Illinois needs new help. Who you've got working the front is the face of the hotel... The representative. I wasn't treated in a professional manner by your rep. I hope you remedy that. Hello and thank you for responding. I'm already in the process of speaking with your general manager at the  Ludwig Drive Fairview Heights, Illinois location. The morning attendant wants me to confirm her previously made complaints with her superiors. However, I will still give you the details on the event.

I'm very upset. Front desk attendant was very unprofessional. I don't know if you keep it dark afte at some point at night, but I didn't like how dark the lobby was upon our entrance back to the hotel this morning.

Fast forward...My sofa bed bedding didn't look clean & it was missing the sheets. I called the front desk about it & told me I had to come down to get them. I get down there for the lights to still be turned out & had to be loud alerting him to my presence, stating I was the the person who called a second ago. He emerged from the darkness & handed me the sheets from under the desk. I said, "I also needed the blanket & pillow case. There were two in the closet with the pillow that looked, in my opinion, used." Instead of him listening to me about it, he had an attitude. He said, "just because it looks like it's used, doesn't mean it is." I said, "sir, I've stayed here & got the same bed in a bag & it was fine. I've stayed in other hotels utilizing their beds in bags for the sofa beds & had the same clean looking bedding. When it's not, I've requested new bedding." But, in the middle of me speaking, he walks off. Not only did he have an attitude, but he walked off? Now, the polite thing to do was, at least, act like he was listening, & then tell me he would be back with my requests, but he didn't. He was dismissive. He comes back mumbling something & I say, "what did you say?" He says, "we don't have pillows."  I said, "I didn't need a pillow. I need a pillow case because the pillow in the closet was not in its bag & appeared used." He then says, "we don't have pillow cases. They're all dirty." I just stood there for a second. Then, all I could say is, "ok."

I left the counter upset. I'm still upset & it's :04A.M. & I'm writing a review. It's not that clean, the mildew smell, I assume, is just how it smells here. Now, we've added your attendant's funky attitude!!!

You might want to do some people skills training. The young man I encountered didn't seem to have any. It sounded like I may have interrupted something. After he walked off in the middle of my talking, I heard someone cough in the dark...I don't know...I don't care. Talk to me, & any other patron to your business, like you've got a desire to keep the job you're working. Rude service. Unpleasant demeanor.

I am not looking for compensation so that it's clear. This is my posted Google review. Didn't want to rewrite the entire situation. 
I also posted pics of how filthy our room was and a video confirming, in fact, things were how they seemed contrary to your night attendant's belief. This stay was under my sister's name: Darnella Pierce. My email address is 

Thanks for responding, as
I appreciate your concern.
Summary_T5_1: The front desk at Comfort Suites in Fairview Heights, Illinois is the face of the hotel. Representative was unprofessional and didn't listen to my requests. He said, "just because it looks like it's used doesn't mean it is"
Summary_T5_2: hotel staffer says need pillow cases gets mumbled

Message: I stayed at the Quality Inn at  E Eads Parkway in Lawrenceburg, Indiana on /30 and /31. I rented two rooms, one for my son and his wife and their two boys and one for my two granddaughters and myself.  My comfirmation number was .  We got in late on the th and my room was filthy. There was mold all over the bathroom ceiling and it smelled. I was two tired to do anything but sleep there. The following morning I asked that my room be changed as it gave me a headache from the mold smell. I was given another room for my granddaughters and me. The new room had some mold, but wasn't nearly as bad as the first one. I did take pictures and I showed the woman at the front desk. She said she didn't know anything about the mold problem, but they get lots of complaints. In fact while I was there another man asked for another room because of the mold in his room. My grandson gave the first room key back and I was given a new room key. When we were checking out I was asked to pay for the new room too. I explained that I only spent one night in the first room and I was given another one and the and I should only be charged the $524.16 for two rooms for two nights. The woman assured me that it was taken care of and that I wouldn't have to pay any thing else. I just got my charge card statement and I was charged an additional $120.96. I tried calling the hotel at -537-2552, the phone number that is listed on line and a recording keeps asking for my access number. Please help me get this straightened out. I have never had a problem with any place that I have stayed. This experience has been the worst. Sharon Law -370-9635 I was finally able to talk to Heather the manager for the day and she said the $120.96 charge was a security deposit from the credit card processing center and she remembers me being there and changing rooms. She said she can't do anything. I called the number heather gave me -800-528-3118 and was told I need to talk to Choice customer relations. I was transferred to customer relations and was told that the hotel put the charge on and she will talk to them. Really. I have been working on this all morning. I just want my money back. This is the ceiling in the bathroom of the hotel. The black stuff is mold. Thank you so much for taking care of this for me. I appreciate your help.

Message: Bait and Switch is illegal!!!! I made a reservation through Booking.com at the Quality Inn hotel in Lawrence, KS for /19-8/21 for student drop off weekend. I reserved the room because there was a FREE  hour cancellation notice, and we did not know how long we would be there. We only needed to be there a night. When I tried to cancel my nd night the Manager, Mr. Nitin Patel, the General Manager raised the prices on my st night, which was my original reservation. I told him I have an email stating free cancellation  hours in advance. Mr Patel he said it was not his problem and he didn't want to see the email. The price goes up or get out of hotel. He said take it or leave it. It was drop off weekend and there were no hotels in the area or I would have left. I told him that this is a bait and switch and is illegal. I have traveled a  nights a year for business for  years and have never seen such a blatant money grab, i.e. criminal behavior. I have proof of everything I am saying, emails, witnesses and some video of the night of the th. I sent my concerns to the Choice Organization and received a Form letter with no explanation for the criminal behavior I experienced from the hotel. Is it Quality Inn's practice to disregard their contracts? Is this a national practice of just in Lawrence , KS? The trash all around the hotel in and outside, musty dirty room and a cold breakfast are not what makes a good experience. Please don't stay here, it is a horrible business. Choice Hotels it seems like you are passing the buck. McDonalds are owned independently but there are standards all owners must adhere too. Lying and cheating is condoned by Choice Hotels? That is what your previous note implies. BAIT and SWITCH is not legal. Please do better than this. Mr Patel swore at me and told me he didnt care if he was breaking the law he was going to do what he wanted to do. Disgraceful  Choice Hotels you dont show your appreciation by doing nothing to fix the problem.

Here's a link to the review I posted. Well as much of it as the word count would allow. A picture is worth a thousand words. The room was disgusting, but not as disgusting as their response has been and that's saying quite a lot. Choice Hotels I've already done all of that, Grettel. I've been doing that for going on two weeks and I've been getting the same runaround. I don't want apologies or Choice points. I want my money back. Read the review and look at the pictures and tell me you wouldn't want your money back too. Read these other reviews and complaints from the country. It's not just that one location. Why would I want points to stay at another establishment to experience the same thing all over again, but at another address. Save the cookie-cutter response. If you'll check the thread, your fellow associates have said the same thing to me and others, with no results. I want results. I want my money back. Choice Hotel Reservation for Eden Harris Choice Privilege Membership #EXH70866  
Confirmation #35382870
Arrival date :8/1/21 @  Wildwood Circle North in Homewood AL  Room . Departure date /31/21. Choice Hotels I sent the information you requested. I've sent it to everyone in your organization who has requested and the best you can offer is a canned apology and $97, when we spent over $2900 for a  day stay during the worst time in our lives and to be treated so badly. If they can cut a check for $97, they can cut one for $2900.  There were no "amenities" offered or used. Merely a filthy room, we came in the door cleaning, with surly unprofessional staff, who harassed us repeatedly. A room that I assure you we left cleaner than we found it. We used our own towels, soap, paper towels, toilet paper, cleansers, trash recepticles and bags, broom, vacuum and Swiffer. Disinfectant and hand sanitizers. We're still in the middle of a pandemic and housekeeping service once every two weeks was unacceptable and so was charging extra for linens was reprehensible. I've tried communicating with the local hotel to no satisfaction. My legal representation attempted to speak with them as well and they refused to speak with them. Choice Hotels yes, I read your response: "Hi again, there! Thank you for your response. After making research in the system, we indeed found that previously ,000 points were offered, or a $97.00 check. Kindly keep in mind that the room and amenities were used for the whole reservation. We can only send the $97.00 check as a final offer. If you would like further assistance with a refund for your hotel stay, please contact the hotel directly. Alternatively, feel free to dispute the charge with your credit card company. If you accept the offer, please reply to us with your agreement, accepting either the ,000 points or the $97.00 check, along with your mailing address, phone #, and email address. We will keep an eye on your response. -Fernando"
 Choice Hotels here's my response: There were no "amenities" offered or used. Merely a filthy room, we came in the door cleaning, with surly unprofessional staff, who harassed us repeatedly. A room that I assure you we left cleaner than we found it. We used our own towels, soap, paper towels, toilet paper, cleansers, trash recepticles and bags, broom, vacuum and Swiffer. Disinfectant and hand sanitizers. We're still in the middle of a pandemic and housekeeping service once every two weeks was unacceptable and so was charging extra for linens was reprehensible. I've tried communicating with the local hotel to no satisfaction. My legal representation attempted to speak with them as well and they refused to speak with them. Choice Hotels Fernando, they can't pay you that well to be this relentless in your responses. This is pettiness. You working on a Sunday and "you got time." You're whiling away your shift trolling the person who was vocal about their horrible experience. You lack empathy, a key component to good, competent customer service. But just know: you're not the only one who "has time;" I do too, boo.  Choice Hotels the issue of a refund might be a matter for the local billing staff where  we were staying, but this petty, insensitive response is a bad look for corporate. They've all been captured and forwarded to my legal representative. You've clearly committed yourself to being a part of the problem and not the solution. The rooms are filthy. The staff has nasty attitudes and corporate supports/ignores the dirty business dealings of the hotel that use their branding. It was a disgusting experience, all around. Robby Adams They have these same shitty practices across the country. You are not alone. They keep it real cute when they're telling you to "eff off" too, don't they?!?   Bobbie Marie They really are! I've gotten this same cookie-cutter response from Ed and Grettel, and a host of others. Then there was ole buddy named Fernando who went back and forth with me on another complaint thread and he kept getting ruder with each response like I was asking them to pay me my refund out of his pocket. They can't be paying him well enough for all he was doing. He was doing the most. And they are still pushing these funky  points. Then they had the nerve to offer me "take it or leave it." $97 after I spent almost $3k for that filthy room and their shitty service.

Message:
Choice Rewards # NPJ7313
Quality Inn & Suites -  MI080
  Highland Road, Waterford, MI, 

We arrived at :20 PM on /4 after reserving a room through the app. When I walked up to the counter, there was a note stating that the front desk would be back in the morning. It took a half hour to get a customer support person on the phone. Customer support called the emergency number and told me that the General Manager would be there in an hour to get us checked in. I had to wait  hours to get checked in to my room and it was not the GM. The hotel credited my stay, but I was never awarded the points I should've earned for booking a stay at a Choice Hotel. I had every intention of paying for my stay and I believe my account should reflect the points earned.
Thank you,
Nick James
 Numas,
I appreciate your quick response. My address is   Amesborough Rd
Dayton, OH 
Email address is
 
Honestly, this was my first bad experience, and I understand that things happen that are outside of anyone's control. The hotel manager did what he could under the circumstances. 
Thanks,
Nick Thank you

Message:
Hello we were really excited to finally be here after all the wonderful things different influencers have showed and mentioned about this beautiful place. We got here about an hr ago. As you can imagine were exhausted. When I called and spoke to Rome who assisted with my reservation she was incredible. She was very kind and super super helpful with my reservation. Iam huge on customer service especially as a healthcare worker during this scary time when most are not as friendly because of the stress and fear. I completed the survey for her because you should know of such wonderful ppl you have working for you. I was just so pleased and way excited to get here with my family for a fun weekend in Disneyland Upon arrival I walked in and kindly greeting Yesenia, your front desk clerk. I advised I had a reservation. Compared to Rome, Yesenias body language was as though I was inconveniencing her. Her first words were name? I provided it ofcourse. She didnt have to greet me back I guess or maybe she didnt hear me even when I was the only one. She then asked for the payment card to be inserted. As I do so I ask for the total. She literally ignores me and says you need to hit the green button I then saw the total which I was fine with but trying to understand the difference from what Rome had given me. I asked Yesenia about it just so I understood, not disputing or anything. She says well you can pull up the booking online if you want by this time she pushed the green button for me and even the signature acknowledged the signature screen because I can assure you I did not, nor did I sign. By this time I just picked up that something was wrong with her. I proceeded to ask her if she was in a hurry. She said no. Im still trying to pull up my reservation to understand the total I had apparently agreed to since she hit the green tabs for me on the key pad and would not give me the reason for the difference. I logged into the membership acct then just stopped and told her its fine Im tired and Ill figure it out later. Not once was I rude to her, please watch the video to see her demeanor and hitting the credit card buttons for your guests. Is this normal? She seemed so in a hurry and maybe she was almost off I dont know. I just literally felt like bursting into tears being treated so poorly during such an exciting time for me and my kids. I work very very hard to be able to take these short vacations with my family. Cambria offered everything we wanted in a hotel. We typically stay at the Disney Hotel or Paradise but felt the water slides were so fun and this place is gorgeous so why not? Id like to confirm that ultimately Yesenia did provide the information she didnt provide earlier. I really wish she was a much more pleasant individual like Rome. I was so disappointed. But I think the cherry on top was when I called the front desk to ask about how to close the blackout shades. The female that answered said there should be a strong on the side. There isnt. She then put me on hold. When she returned she said shes never been in the rooms and would go check a room to check what I was talking about and call me back. Anyway its been nearly an hour and have yet to get a callback. 
I dont expect anyone to go above and beyond for me I promise but when they do like Rome did, I like to make sure and report such amazing help. I dont intend to get Yesenia in trouble but I do hope everything is ok with her and if not it shows and its impacting your guests. Im hoping the rest of our stay is much more pleasant because we were so excited and just are here to be kind and fun. Please watch the surveillance video to better understand and see for yourself. I was shocked. 
Thank you for your time. Yes  arrival /16 between -3am under Melissa Silvas Member #MXS992131


  Donner Ave Clovis Ca  

Thank you. 

Id like to add that after reporting a leak in the bathroom
 it was determined by engineer that I needed to be moved to a different room as a leak was pretty severe so I was glad that they moved me immediately.
Summary_T5_1: Upon arrival at Disneyland I was greeted by a front desk clerk who seemed to be inconveniencing me. She ignored me and said you can pull up the booking online if you want but couldn't understand the difference. By this time I just picked up that something was wrong with her, she said no. Not once was I rude to her, please watch the video to see her demeanor and hitting the credit card buttons for your guests.

Does anybody actually read these messages? I've got a problem I need help with, and the phone number just puts you on hold indefinitely. I am a diamond member so I'm really hoping for a resolution for this time-sensitive issue. I am a Diamond member and have spent thousands of dollars with Choice already this year. We never stay anywhere but Choice hotels when we travel which is a lot! But I'm starting to think that needs to change! You don't actually care about your most loyal customers at all. I was misled by a CSR into making a purchase of points and only told after spending my money that those points would not be available for  hours. That was all the money I had to get us a room tonight, and since you refuse to refund me, my two small children and I will be sleeping in our car tonight three hours from home in a large city. I am so beyond disappointed and angry. This is what I get for all the money I've spent with you. Not to mention our reason for travelling is my father's passing a few days ago  I am a Diamond member and have spent thousands of dollars with Choice already this year. I am so beyond disappointed and angry. This is what I get for all the money I've spent with you. Not to mention our reason for travelling is my father's passing a few days ago  Sorry, I was working when I read your response and forgot to reply when I got home. I will get that information for you. CP #: SXH119917  S. Green Bay Ave.
Gillett, WI 

  points +  bonus points purchased on /19/21. Confirmation number 

The situation was I called to make a reservation, and the rep noticed I had some points but not enough to cover the room. They suggested I could purchase enough points to cover the room that night. So I purchased the points and then attempted to book the room. I was then told that the points were not showing on my account and that thay can happen as it may take  hours for them to post to the account. I was not told this prior to purchasing the points. As well, I have purchased points several times in the past and they have always been available immediately. So while I understand now that it can take  hours, I did not know that at the time, and I was told by the rep that I would be able to use them immediately. After purchasing those points, I no longer had enough money to buy even a very cheap room for us, so I spent a couple hours going back and forth talking to Choice customer service in various departments. I was told flat out there was nothing they could do to force the points to show up, and a refund was not possible. I asked to speak to someone higher up that may be able to help, and that request was ignored. My  and  year old children and I ended up sleeping in our car in a park and ride in a large city which was uncomfortable to say the least as well as scary.

I have previously worked for Choice as well as my dad has managed a choice hotel for nearly  years. I am a diamond member and stay in Chouce hotels as often as once or twice a week, and I recommend choice hotels to everyone I know. I have always had excellent experiences. This experience however was incredibly disappointing and upsetting. The lack of willingness to try to resolve the situation was disheartening. I feel like I was tricked into spending my money with you and once I had, no one cared. I hope i can get some kind of resolution from this even though it is over and done with. Thank you.

Ive contacted the property who basically told me they can do whatever they please in regards to refunding me my funds. I was then hung up on and told not to call back again. Message: Blood and bodily fluids on sheets, floor and wall.I stayed at COMFORT INN BLUE ASH ON THE TH OF AUGUST for one night. Initially I booked  nights for checkout on the st. When we got there, we were given a room that was so disgusting and beyond nasty. Firstly the room was stink of smoke and stale sex. We looked in the bathroom and there was rolled up toilet paper with poop on the floor. The soap was open and it was obvious the bed was used prior to us going in the room.We went to the front desk and the guy gave us another room. At first glance the room appeared cleaned but there was this disgusting smell of stale vomit. Later we discovered what appeared what appeared to be vomit splattered on the base of one bed. One bed had stains all over it. The wall beside toilet had brown substance on it. So disgusting!!! He claimed that was the only room he had available and we were just exhausted and couldn't get anywhere that night because of a match in town, so we decided to stay the night Anwas assured the manager would sort out a refund for the three additional days in the morning. Whilst we were complaining about our room another guest told us her room was equally dirty and that she had found a used baby diaper in her bath.We checked out on the th and was given a document showing  $  as owing to us. We left and was told -7 days funds would be reflected.  I called on the th to check that the manager had gotten the document and was told that I would only be refunded for two days, an amount of  plus tax. The document suggested that I checked out on the th. The manager is never in and the front desk agents are clueless. I have been calling both the hotel and choice and was assured by the choice agent that words from the manager says I will get back the  as indicate by Katrina at the front desk. I called my bank today as I am not seeing any refunds from Comfort Inn Blue Ash and was told no such refunds was made. I called Blue Ash and the new manager or so h and the new manager or so he claims insisted it was made and even sent a document to show same. The manager was so rude and claimed he is new to the job and hung the phone up. I am most disappointed and angry that Comfort Inn think it is ok to charge me $378 for one night in a hotel room that had vomit on the base of the bed, blood stains and bodily fluids on the sheets and walls Sure. That is the amount that they claimed to have sent to me I am back home so my contact number is now  Thank you for reaching out to me Case # that was received from Choice Agent when formal complaint was made My name is Nordia My bank has not received that refund Please provide evidence of same I have called booking that have confirmed no refund was done I refuse to accept anything that is lower than the funds that should be refunded to my card My issue is why am I being offered points below the amount of  $301 My card was charged and not refunded

Message: My husband and I are just getting home from being on the road for a month.  Of all the hotels we stayed in (from Nevada to North Carolina and back, taking different routes to and from) the Quality Inn we stayed in in Knoxville, TN was the worst I have ever seen.  I have pics of holes in the walls, stains on towels that were suppose to be clean, cigarette burns in the sheets & bedspread, and even watched (& photo'd) a drug deal going down right outside our window.  I slept fully dressed so that I would not come in direct contact with the bedding.  I would like to request a refund, but I know with the "Quality" of this Inn, it would take more effort than it's worth.  Will NEVER stay at a Quality Inn again, and will tell everyone I know to steer clear...it's a scary place to stay.  Am looking into how to contact health dept. in Knoxville. My recent post seems to have disappeared!!  Not sure if it was the mention of a drug deal going on outside my window, or because I dropped the "Health Department" bomb.  In any case, I do not take it lightly when I have to pay to stay in filth.  Holes in the walls,   burn holes in the sheets and bedspread, and towels with stains that looked like they hadn't been cleaned in months.  I slept in my clothes to prevent contact with the sheets, and used my own towels.  It was too late in the evening to find a different hotel in Knoxville TN.  I have pics of all of this, including the drug deal going down, which I intend to share with the Health Department.   I won't even bother to ask for my money back...I'm sure the business ethics for this Inn is probably as "Quality" as the conditions of the rooms.
Summary_T5_1: The Quality Inn in Knoxville, TN was the worst I have ever seen. My husband and I are just getting home from being on the road for a month. I have pics of holes in the walls, stains on towels that were supposed to be clean.
