Message:
Wow! I thought I might be the only one overly disappointed and dissatisfied! Apparently Im one of many! I had reservations at the Comfort Inn in Franklin TN (a picturesque town). I was expecting the hotel to follow suit. It was deplorable! Drips down the wall,curtains literally falling off the hooks broken, stained furniture and carpets, large yellow spots on the mattress pad,spills on the floor,and etc. I obviously took pictures before I checked out10 minutes later. The front desk told me to contact corporate. I have done so. After a few emails back and forth they did agree to give me back y points but are refusing to. Reddit the balance I put on my Choice Credit Card! Saying they cant!? I didnt stay there! Why should I have to pay for walking in and out. I already paid after a  hour trip by having to find other accommodations! HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!  This message is in response to a request from Debbie for more information about my recent experience. Member Number LCB2520. Name on account Lou Bigsby. Stay Im referring to Comfort Inn  Franklin Common Court Franklin TN . Check in /28/2021-9/29/2021 (however, I checked out within  minutes of arrival so I never stayed). I uploaded several pictures to Guest Relations. My customer care advocates name is Paul @    (Im not sure if thats of any help). Thanking you for your further investigation!
Mrs. Bigsby I didnt respond as I wasnt satisfied as stated in my email. I used put $46 on my choice rewards card. I was told the $ couldnt be refunded. My nephew who is COO of Hyatt in Ft. Lauderdale said you can not only can refund it but you should. Why in the world would I hAve to pay for a room that the curtains were falling down, there were stains on the sheets and drips of lord knows what on the walls?!? That is why I disagreed with the resolution. My email is  I live at  Durby Ln, Foley AL  If what theyre paying out in wages for what must be a small army to respond to and address these issues was put towards improvements wouldnt we all be happier  I understand what I checked and what I agreed to. However, I did so in good faith that the accommodations would be tolerable! I didnt cancel on my own accord. I cancelled because I wouldnt ever subject my grandchild to such conditions! The thought of her crawling on that carpet was unacceptable! So your telling me there are never any exceptions to that policy. There is no upper management that understands I cancelled due to YOUR inadequacies not my own? Choice Privileges Visa.  Name on the card Lou C Bigsby. Linked to my Choice Hotel LCB2520 member number.
Thank you for your reconsideration. Im truly confused at this point about buying and using points. But Im also exhausted by this. So ok.

Message:
Hi Choice, 
It's been a while hasn't it. I have been a member of this program for quite a while now. I just wish your franchises would abide by your brand standards. All guests should be treated accordingly whether they are club status or diamond. I have been a diamond for over a year now but I always dread securing travel accommodations because of the way I am never given consideration to my questions about the hotel and any requests or upgrades are disregarded.  And I know very well they are not overbooked...they are just being stingy when a diamond member pays for a stay and politely requests a room upgrade that showed up available when checked after the denial. The place I am referring to is the Clarion Pointe, Corydon Indiana . These proprietors need another course study in guest services. Thoughts? Look forward to hearing from you

Message: Hello. I am looking to talk to someone about my horrendous stay at the Econolodge in Tonawanda, NY this past Friday night October st and get a full refund. Thank you. My sister and I were visiting my daughter at the University of Buffalo for Homecoming/Family Weekend. When we got our key and got to the room, room , the door was unlocked. We could not get the door to lock!! It looked like it had been kicked in numerous times. The wood and locks were all broke. Felt % unsafe! The room reeked of cigarette smoke. The TV did not work, the Wi-Fi did not work, the phone did not work. There were mouse holes in the walls. A man who could not speak English tried to get in our room. I'm pretty sure we witnessed a drug deal in process in the parking lot. Worst experience ever! We stayed Friday October st at the Econolodge in Tonawanda, NY on Niagara Falls Blvd. Name on reservation was Audrey A. Gerrard. Case number  was just opened. However, I am requesting and demanding a full refund, not points like I was offered. Thank you Ed. Thank you for understanding. I do accept the $50.00 refund check. Mailing address is: Audrey Gerrard  Wheeler Hill Road Blossvale, NY . Email:  Thank you. Very appreciative. Thank you so much!
Summary_T5_1: The Econolodge in Tonawanda, NY was a terrible experience. My sister and I were visiting my daughter at the University of Buffalo for Homecoming/Family Weekend. We saw mouse holes in the walls and a man who could not speak English tried to get into our room.

Message:
Good morning before I start a formal campaint on a multi media level I thought I would give you a chance to help. We stayed in the Comfort Suites Perrysburg Ohio Friday and Saturday night but even though our confirmation stated mobiltiy accesible room we got there and they had given it to someone else. Our confirmation number  was created on your website and paid for by our credit card. The manager that was working at the time was a Brandy Broach and she was not very helpful.  Her intial response was I can not do anything about it. What I am seeking is reinbursment for at least one of the nights stay from this trip.  We did get moved into the room that we had researved for the second night but it was not a very good experince.  Brandy was not your best respresenitive. Thank you!! Thank you.  The name on the reservation was Elena Halbeisen.  The hotel was clean and otherwise pretty good. I will say when we did finally get the accessible room it is not a true roll in. But I could have dealt that with my wifes help.  
The real issue is that we used the Comfort Inn website to reserve the room and selected the wheelchair accessible room because I am a paraplegic.  I have been in a chair  years so I am used to challenges but the response of your representative towards my wife was troubling. 
We will be traveling to Bowling Green several times over the next couple years and hate to think that our hotel options will be limited.  Please look into the policy of Orbits or others being able to override a reservation that a client made directly.  This is one of several excuses
She gave us. Then even coming all the way around and say we used a third-party. But that doesnt make sense because of what she said before that. What I am seeking is reimbursement for at least the first night and hopefully change for the future. Thank you again for replying please let me know what you can do. Fernando I will talk to my wife about your offer.  But I would like to know what you suggest when I go to book a room again. Should I use the Convenience of the website or should I call directly in to the hotel? Seems silly that you offer the rooms but can not guarantee that I will get what I need.  
I would honestly prefer the Reimbursement of the first night since it was very difficult and inconvenient for me but if points are the only option then you can double the points so it will make it worthy effort to stay at a Choice hotel again. Well the boss shot down your offer. She said she will never stay at a Choice brand hotel again.  Refund the first night is her only request. I would recommend  reviewing the reservation process. Hey Debbie why only the ?  I was unable to use the room except to barely be able to climb in the bed.  I could not shower use the toilet or anything.  How about the full amount for the one night. I accept this offer and agree. 
Elena Halbeisen   Devonwood Dr
Cincinnati OH 

Choice Privileges	
Elena's Account: #EXH99091 -703-0458
Thank you Ed.

Message:
I stayed at a comfort suites in Newport Kentucky this weekend!  I reserved two rooms. They were on the same floor. We went to a concert so when we got back it was late. We got up to the th floor and it smelled of marijuana so bad. Went into our room to sleep and at :00 I woke up to something that bite me on my back. I went into the restroom and turned the light on and several bugs (roaches)scattered on the floor.  Mice turds in the sink. I was so grossed out. I called the front desk immediately and she came up and took pictures. We had to pack our things into garage bags and left at :30 am. Which means I had to wake up the rest of my party that early to tell them what was going on and we all left. I spoke with a general manager and sent pics through email. I was informed that I could only have a refund on the one room because I didnt see anything in the other room other than a booger in the wall( which she said could be anything) needless to say I am disgusted and will never stay at a choice hotel again. Message:
Worst hotel ever!  We stayed at the Ames, IA location this last weekend.  Reserved and paid for our room in June but they charged us $100 more jacking our room rate up when we arrived.  Manager lied and said our reservation was incorrect but wouldnt look at my confirmation email confirming our stay.  Called corporate x  and everyone had some excuse but no reason for the rate increase.  Credit card was charged without authorized.  I was told no refunds were possible and to call my bank.  Garbage.  This hotel is the worst.  Had to ask for clean linen and the toiletries in our cleaned room had already been used.  Ridiculous. We stayed at the Ames location Oct  through the th.  The manager Bonnie Alley provided the worst customer service.  I was told my reservation was only booked for  nights which was why I was charged another $100.  Even though, I have the confirmation email showing my reservation and payment for  nights.I have documentation from phone calls with corporate showing the same thing.  She was rude and not helpful and then refused to speak to me after that.  She wouldnt even take calls from Corporate when asked.  I was told before I left by the front desk that the rate was what I had paid for back in a June.  However as soon as we left my credit card was manually entered and charged the extra $100.  I was told my reservation couldnt be changed or cancelled.  If thats the case, then why did my rate change for no reason?  I couldnt change my reservation but an employee did back in July increasing my rates.

This as the worst experience.  I had the opportunity to stay in your chain of hotels in Seattle the next day.  I wouldnt stay in or ever recommend this hotel.  Ever.  And the manger needs to be fired for her lack of customer service or doing her job.  Making the front desk staff be the go between and lying to me about what my reservation shows without ever looking at my documents.  Just dismissing me.  Terrible. All of these images are from my June th reservation and payment.  It shows  nights.  Paid for  nights.  Please refund my money of the extra $100 that was charged.

For my inconvenience I would like more than that refunded.  Even the hotel staff when I checked in, Thiago?  Agreed that this should be allowed to be cancelled.  Please fix this situation. Sent.  Ive been trying to obtain information on how to reach the owner to try and get this resolved as the manager that works there wont speak with me or look at my reservation.  Im sure glad you guys promote the pineapples there as a sign of hospitality.  I think there should be a training in what that actually means. Thanks but no thanks.  Why would I want to run the risk of staying at this line of hotels after this experience?  Like I said, I wont ever stay with Choice and will let everyone I know what kind of treatment your hotels provide.  Individually owned or not, its still under one name: Choice.  I choose not to support a corrupt business that steals money from people. Please provide the contact information to someone higher up at that hotel so I can continue to try and get my money back.  Thank you. No thanks.  A place shouldnt be able to raise the rates after you make a pay for a reservation.  Thats why you make a reservation. Corporate is no help.  Please give me the information for the owner of that hotel. Ive tried talking to Bonnie.  She wont look at my my confirmation email or assist me. Someone has to have the information for her boss. Wow.  Glad that this whole time, over a week, corporate acted like they could help me since that hotel is worthless.  Thanks for wasting my time and money.  Have a good day.
Summary_T5_1: The manager at the Ames, IA location charged us $100 more jacking our room rate up when we arrived. She was rude and not helpful and then refused to speak to me after that. This is the worst experience I have ever had.

Message:
I was would like to let you know about my stay /14-10/18 at the Quality Inn in Orlando Florida.   Please forward this to the proper people.
  There was no chair in the room.  I had to go to the front desk to ask for a chair as I could not call down as there was also no phone in the room.  There was also no alarm clock, iron or ironing board.  All of these items were supposed to be in the room according the web site  Amenities.  When someone brought up a chair, it was dirty and had unknown stains on it.  I sat on a towel on the chair as the chair was so disgusting that I didn't want to touch it.   
  The faucet in the bath tub leaked and could not be turned off.  The constant dripping noise was only drowned out by the clanking of the AC unit.  
   There were actual sheet rock screws holding up broken bath room tiles and the shower rod as well as holding the toilet paper holder together.  The paint was pealing off of the walls. 
 The light on the bathroom ceiling was just an exposed bulb in the fixture.  The was no covering on it.  The bathroom exhaust fan did not work. 
  On Saturday night there was a constant flow of cars coming and going as if they were renting rooms "by the hour"
  On Sunday morning the back parking lot was littered with numerous small zip top type baggies which are commonly used for drug paraphernalia and Sunday afternoon/evening there was a group of men sitting on the outdoor stairs smoking weed.  
  I have stayed at choice hotels on numerous occasions in the and have never seen a worse hotel.  I know that I will never stay at this hotel again and am not sure about staying at any other  Choice Hotels in the future.  Had there been other hotels in the area with vacancies I would have cancelled my reservation and gone elsewhere.  It most certainly was not what I was expecting based on my previous Choice Hotel stays and was not worth anywhere close to what I paid for my stay The stay I am referring to was /14-10/18 at the Quality Inn on  International Dr.  in Orlando Florida.  The reservation was in my name, Christopher Newins Confirmation Number:   All of the issues in my first PM to you were ALL from this stay,  Thank You and I look forward to hearing back from you. Thank You for looking into and taking care of this situation Yes I was given  points for this occurrence vis email
Summary_T5_1: Christopher Newins stayed at the Quality Inn on International Dr. in Orlando, Florida. He says there was no chair in the room, no alarm clock, iron or ironing board. He has stayed at Choice Hotels on numerous occasions and has never seen a worse hotel.
Summary_T5_2: theres no phone in room drug paraphernalia writer

Message: The Asheville Dowtown Quality Inn Hotel has such rigid cancellation policies during a time where reserving rooms are risky due to so much going on. Customer service will add a few points to your account and then try to sell you a credit card to use and call that resolution. Horrible customer service.  I get you cant just cancel a reservation. What I dont get is why not offer a credit for future stay? Nope. Just take the money and lose customers. Downtown Asheville. No flexibility at all during times when travel is a bit risky any way. Choice Hotels . I was told this was the policy and I was given  points on my rewards. I was also given the opportunity to get a credit card with your company which I declined.  Not sure why things have to be in private message since this is company policy.  The manager at this location stressed that there was no one above her and the matter was closed.  I appreciate that but to use those I would be spending more money with a company that I do not agree with their policy of keeping almost $500 that I feel could have easily been given in future credit for stay. I want to thank you for reaching out and trying to make what I feel is wrong better. I will accept your offer. It makes it less distasteful for me knowing that the corporate office is willing to try and make a customer feel better even if the manager would not. Just let me know what I have to do to accept the offer and I will let it go. I obviously wont be booking at the downtown Asheville Quality Inn but hope for a better experience at another. TXM664521. -330-6645.  Academy St Salem Va .  Thank you. Choice Hotels I want to thank you for reaching out and making this situation a little less distasteful. You did what the manager of the Asheville Downtown Quality Inn was not willing to do, compromise during a stressful and costly situation. Although we will not book with that particular hotel again, we will give another one of your hotels a chance.
Summary_T5_1: The Asheville Dowtown Quality Inn Hotel has such rigid cancellation policies. Customer service will add a few points to your account and then try to sell you a credit card to use and call that resolution. Choice Hotels: I will accept your offer and hope for a better experience at another.

Message:
The GM from Chattanooga sent me an email after my survey. The basic formal informal apology wasn't acceptable. I have been a Choice member for  years and a Barclay card holder. After this experience and the total disregard of the hotels GM towards my safety I don't think I would ever be able to stay at another Choice member Hotel. I never use my membership for instances just like this one. Thank you for replying It sounded sincere /29 or /30/2021, not sure of date exactly. My wife and I checked in around midnight. Comfort Inn and Suites, Hamilton Place in Chattanooga, TN.
My name is Jeremy C. McKendree, I did not have a confirmation number that I am aware of. I checked in at the desk when I arrived? At nine am in the morning on the th day of October . My wife and I started getting ready to leave the hotel and head home. We had talked about how the room smelled like urine all night and how unkempt the hotel bathroom was. I had went into the bathroom to get washed up and went to blow dry my hair and the blow dryer caught on fire (a literal flame three inches high) was blowing out of the dryer and then it exploded in my face. A piece of the dryer went into my eye and I was trying to figure out how to put the fire out because the dryer would not shut off. I was going to put it in the sink but knew I would be shocked or something worse. So I held the dryer and unplugged it from the wall. I held it till it cooled off and quit smoking. I reported it to the front desk as I was leaving. I've have ,000 points and will not be staying at another Choice property.  Thank You for the offer and your concern for your members. No thanks No thank you, at this point the safety of the people staying in this type of hazardous environment is unacceptable and there really isn't a price anyone can put on that. We live and we learn
Summary_T5_1: Jeremy McKendree checked in at the desk when he arrived at the Comfort Inn and Suites, Hamilton Place in Chattanooga, TN. He had gone into the bathroom to get washed up and went to blow dry my hair and the blow dryer caught on fire. She reported it to the front desk as I was leaving. After this experience and the total disregard of the hotels GM towards my safety I don't think I would ever be able to stay at another Choice member Hotel.

Message: To whom it may concern: I just checked out of your hotel in Scottsdale, AZ, the Papago Inn. While most of the stay was ok, my experience to end my visit was so terrible I may never stay at a Choice Hotel again. I would offer feedback through your website but I assume that if I submit feedback on a specific hotel it goes to the hotel GM and my poor treatment was at the hands of the general manager so that is not an option. For your reference my confirmation number was  and I stayed checked in on Monday, November  and checked out today, Saturday, November . I was told that checkout time was noon, but in an attempt to be courteous to the cleaning staff and because I needed to return my rental car I was out of the hotel around :30. I did leave my suitcase at the front desk as my flight is not until this evening and I wasn't ready to go to the airport. I returned my car around noon and walked the handful of blocks back to the hotel with the plan to find somewhere to sit and get some work done before departing for the airport. When  I returned to the hotel I was told a couple of places where I could sit and work but first I needed a restroom. I asked where a restroom I could use was and was told there was not one. Without getting too far into detail I was in a situation where I needed a restroom. This was not a situation where I just wanted to go freshen up. The Papago Inn is in an area largely surrounded by apartments and  car dealerships. There weren't many options for another place to go. I mentioned to the woman at the front desk (who turned out to be the GM) that I had just spent about $500 there and the past  nights. I simply needed a restroom. She said that there was nothing she could do. I asked about the attached restaurant's restroom and she said it has been closed since COVID started. She wasn't allowed to let people any restroom. I asked if there was one nearby and she told me that I could go to the Circle K down the street maybe half a mile. This wasn't a satisfactory response, but as I mentioned I needed a restroom so with no car I started walking to the nearby Circle K. A little while later I arrived at the Circle K and was told that they didn't have a public restroom either (I hadn't spent any money there so that was an entirely different situation). At this point I left and started back to the hotel. I called the front desk and the same woman answered. I reiterated that I needed a restroom and ask whether this was an issue related to COVID protocols. I have family that works in healthcare and have taken COVID very seriously. I continue to wear a mask indoors and am fully vaccinated with my booster. The manager said that it is a COVID issue at which point I mentioned that if they are concerned about COVID maybe they should consider requiring masks for their staff as I hadn't seen any staff with a mask on since I arrived at the hotel. This really set her off and she began absolutely screaming at me. I may not have handled the situation well myself but her behavior was unacceptable from someone who I had just spent $500 with and a full  days giving business. Again, my suitcase was at the front desk so I decided to return to the hotel, plead one more time for access to a restroom and go from there. When I returned to the hotel the manager hid in the office, trying not to give me any service. I asked loudly if I could at least get my bag. She came out and gave me my bag screaming at me the whole time then rushed out of the lobby, reminding me I was on camera as she went. I had a family member on the phone through this last stop at the Papago Inn and in response I said I had done nothing illegal or wrong. I just needed a restroom. I decided from that point that I would take my bag and get an Uber to the airport  hours early for my flight so that I could use a restroom at the airport. I stepped outside the lobby into the driveway and waited in the parking lot for my Uber and left for the airport. This was a very simple situation. There were a variety of ways it could have easily been resolved. Again, all I needed was either access to a restroom or a nearby place where I could go to get access. The Choice Hotels affiliated hotel GM refused to give me either. Sending me to a location that didn't have a restroom and then berating me when I became upset and panicked. After  nights at a hotel when I was as low maintenance of a guest as possible. I didn't require anything. When my floor mat for outside my shower looked dirty I didn't mention it and when the hotel phone had no power cord I called to the desk on my cell to let them know that I didn't need the phone but wanted them to be aware of the issue. When the free wireless wasn't working and I couldn't access the internet with my computer I called down to the front desk, asked if something was wrong with it. The front desk employee said it was working fine for him and I moved on. This experience was an absolutely terrible way to end a trip and leaves an awful taste in my mouth. I should also mention that I asked if there was a manager I could speak to or who I could reach out to and was told that she was the manager. I asked if there was a general manager and she told me that was her as well. I asked who I could speak to above her and she said "That would be the owner and they are out of state so you can't talk to them." I recognize that Choice Hotels is a massive company and many of the hotels are franchised, but the Papago Inn is listed as part of the Choice Hotels family and I can tell you that this reflects extremely poorly on the entire corporation in my eyes. When I travel I have many options for hotels. I chose a Choice Hotel this time and may not again.
Summary_T5_1: The Papago Inn is in an area largely surrounded by apartments and car dealerships. When I returned to the hotel I was told a couple of places where I could sit and work but first I needed a restroom. Without getting too far into detail I was in a situation where I simply needed a restroom.

Message: I stayed at a Clarion last night in Pensacola, FL. This hotel is one of the WORST I have ever stayed in.  You should be embarrassed to have your name on this place!  There was no one at the front desk to greet us upon arrival and no one answered the phone.  We happened to run into a maintenance guy who got the FD clerk.  The room was dirty and most of the lights broken.  There is no smoke detector.  The floor was sticky!  People were sleeping in cars in the parking lot!  No cold water or ice.  Abysmal conditions!  Only stayed here because unfamiliar with the area.  I have another reservation for December in NC and hope my experience is better.  You should close this one for safety.

Hi im a choice member and I would just like to let you know I will never be using choice hotels again and I will be using my platform and telling everyone I know to do the same. 

I have a friend who travelled to the Rodeway Inn in Colorado Springs and her personal information was provided to a male staff member who proceeded to contact her. Not even the minimum of a refund was provided to her. 

We have contacted local news media and will be taking this to our contacts in DC because this behavior is absolutely unacceptable. Women should be reasonably safe at your establishments and we have received the message loud and clear that women will not be protected in your spaces. 

I am relentless and will not give up. I will tell everyone I know not to use your establishments especially women. I will contact bigger platforms as well as advocacy groups to hold you guys accountable. No one should have to pay to be violated. And you providing personal information to predatory staff members and not even refunding your guests is indicative of your priorities as a company. 

I assure you this will not be the last you hear about this situation, but as of today you lost year another guest, who once spoke highly of your company and intended to use your establishments for business. 

I hope you guys feel secure in your choice to dismiss what could have ended in a dangerous encounter and making it clear that the privacy of your clients will not be respected. As I feel secure in mine pursuing this relentlessly as I do not stand for the commodification of women. 


-Joaly Nicole Cuba Cruz

I need to reach out to someone higher than the GM urgently  Before I expose Woodspring Suite Good afternoon. So my husband and I booked a room from th October,  thru th November,  due to us buying a home and the closing was suppose to happen with this time. Okay fast forward to th November, I went to the front desk to extend our stay because the closing is taking longer than expected. So I extended until th November, . So this morning, the th November as I am getting my daughter dressed for school, A staff by the name Paris knocked so hard I thought it was the police and said check out is at  am dont forget. So I replied but I paid until tomorrow which is the th November, . I have my proof where I paid so I showed the GM Dominique and she insisted that I own so because I have my children here and I didnt have no other options I paid for it and now I have gotten my lawyer involved because its not fair Hi Jendy, did you miss what I said? The General Manager is the person who refuses to acknowledge the error but you know what I will make it known what happen There are tons of bad reports at this Carol Stream location. I would never recommend this to my dog WoodSpring Suites I would never ever recommend my dog to stay with you guys. I booked a room from th October,  thru th November,  and before the th, I went to the front desk on the th to extend until the th Nov. only to be awakened by Paris a cleaner to inform me that I had to check out now because the room where me and my three kids were staying until the closing our our home was done has been sold to accommodate someone else. I proceeded to the front desk where the General manager Dominique McCoy insisted that it was not her problem that the other lady made a mistake and my children and I were to get out in the cold. I have proof of the payments and I am warning  any other person who has intentions of staying at  Woodspring Suite  N Gary Ave. Carol Stream, IL  not to. The level of professional is a negative zero and zero cant be negative. 

In addition to that, there was a night where a lady knocked on my door and I phoned front desk to let them know and Derrick was on and try made me feel like it was nothing and I should not call the cops. When morning came and I asked how is it possible Derrick then told me that oh the lady was lost how the hell did she get lost and choose my door to knock on because according to property rules you need a room key to pass the security door for the rooms. Besides that the scent of drugs is so strong in the hotel every morning. People please do not waste your monies going there.  WoodSpring Suites I have my proof and I will take this further  BradJen Heaton I am still waiting on their reply I have my proof and I will get my lawyer involved

Message:
This is what my TV was like my whole stay at Quality Inn, Bangor Maine while visiting my elderly parents. 
This was only one small problem of many.  I wrote a review regarding the hotel. Im not sure what youre going to resolve considering there are multiple bad reviews. Its the Quality Inn in Bangor Me. I tried uploading pics but it wouldnt let me. . The staff was excellent. 
The staff deserves better. 
Never again. So this was my table. 
The heater if put on high or any length of time sounded like a jet was landing next to your room. The bathmat was so dirty it was slimy. I had to ask house keeping to play clean the bathroom. Mind you this was my nd room. The first smelled like smoke. And not just a little, i had the same problem with the heater. 
My light next to the bed was bent so when turning on or off Im surprised it didnt fall. So long as it stays this way I wouldnt recommend anyone staying here and I have family here so they will listen and tell their friends. 
My bedspread was stained. The mattresses were nice and the refrigerators were clean. What staff I did see were nice. 
This quality inn is on hogan rd, Bangor Maine.  Ps, the dials do not turn so theres only the setting you get when turned on.  Sent you a DM. Oh, o forgot to mention the TV. It constantly froze. Now I have Directv at home and I never have this issue. Until last night it was clear outside. Also the tv had a black line going thru it. Pixels must be gone. My friend had the same experience who stayed in another room. While he paid for my room with his points Im reimbursing him. It cost around $350 for the  days. His name is Dennis Michaud. He will be calling. He said hes never had this experience b4. Thats saying something. No it is not resolved. Im getting the info from my friend who had a bad stay at this hotel as well. Im trying to get info Bc he used his points to pay for my room. DXM 
Reservation 
#  I dont have FB. But this is the info I have. It was reserved under Dennis Michaud of whethersfield, CT I sent him your message
Summary_T5_1: The Quality Inn in Bangor Maine is on hogan rd, Bangor Me. My bedspread was stained. The mattresses were nice and the refrigerators were clean. What staff I did see were nice.

Disappointing stay with  Hi there,  arrival was Wednesday November  (I did have a one night reservation Tuesday November , then the following  nights on another reservation) my name is Terra Fawcett Hey  I reached Gold Elite, now can we discuss my last stay that was disgusting and extremely disappointing? Hello, thank you for getting back to me! I have stayed at this property many times over  years. It has always been a wonderful experience. However, my stay last week was far less than that! I was in room  Tuesday- Friday. I checked in, the room had a smell, the tile and light fixture in the bathroom were disgusting, the shower head was black. I spent Friday out of the hotel and returned to find a bag of chips had been chewed (I am assuming a mouse or something similar!) I immediately went to the desk explained this, showed a photo and asked for a new room. The girl working said she would need to call her manager before this could happen. I was moved to a new room, with the smoke detector hanging off the wall. I asked the front desk how to reach the manager to discuss this and no one would provide me with that information. Incase you need a photo for proof Thank you so much! I appreciate that. My member number is , phone number -421-5882,  and P.O. Box  Beachville ON N0J A0.
I look forward to future stays with Choice Hotels. Smoke detector in room  as well. Thank you so much for getting back to me and taking care of this.

Message:
Was staying at WoodSpring Suites on Stahl Drive for over  years. No issues No warnings No letters from the manager.
Over a month ago I came homethe room and found my mother on the floor dead. And that was the last time I have been in that room.
Not by choice tho
Manager at Woodspring Extended Stay on Stalh drive informed me for the st and and only time that I am not allowed in the room.
The room I lived in  for years which contains everything I owe. As well as Mothers belongings. The day I found my mother on the floor I was forced to leave with clothes on my back and my cats in carriers. After multiple calls to manger to please allow me some personal items or anything from room the answer is still no.
Then I found out they boxed up everything in the room. And the manager went on to say. She personally boxed up the room and did everything by the book.
Not long after she boxed up everything in the room by the book
My mothers phone which was in the room I wasnt allowed in ended up in Kentucky. Few calls later its been sold to a kiosk by someone. If she boxed up everything by the book then how is it mothers phone was in Kentucky?
I was told since I was staying there I owe half of the bill. 
Then the same manager tells an officer that she wont allow me in room because I dont have a key and my name isnt on the room.so please think of this if any of you or anyone you know who may know who might be thinking about staying there Woodspring Extended Stay on Stalh Road.. I lost my mother and everything I own and have not been allowed in room. If I was there  years and get treated like that, just imagine how someone staying a weekend or a week would be treated after such a loss of a loved one.
Wish I had a way with words and could make this go viral and maybe make someone stop and think about staying there and something happens and to lose everything in  day.Woodspring Extended Stay needs to examine their GM. Good evening ,these are videos from a room I was supposed to stay in on Friday, November in Ann Arbor Michigan, however the room was infested with cockroaches so I had to leave I was not able to stay at that hotel due to the cockroach infestation! The GM of that hotel refuses to give me a refund tells me that the room is free of cockroaches no one even bothered to go check that room the night that I asked them to! Dear Anita,

On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.   

Also thank you for taking the time to inform  us of the Issues you had while visting our  hotel , however as I stated to you  you  when we spoke on  yesterday  you booking was a non- refunealbe booking .  We have also  inepected the room and found it free of pest.. I have also reach out to staff and will be requireing them to complete  coustomer service traming offer by Choice Hotels,  if you decide to vist our hotel again   please acept this as a % off you next regular bokking at the hotel front desk


Sincerely,

Eric Temple
General  Manager 
Quality Inn and Suites  


This is a copy of the email from the GM, ! The GM never one time told me on the phone that he was not going to refund my money he told me to submit my complaint and videos in an email and he would make a decision within  hours however it took him four days to respond back to me I continuously called the hotel and never got anyone to pick up a phone!
Summary_T5_1: The GM of that hotel refuses to give me a refund on my money. I was supposed to stay in a room at Choice Hotels in Ann Arbor, Michigan. However the room was infested with cockroaches so I had to leave. No one even bothered to go check that room the night that I asked them to!

Message:
I stayed at the Comfort Inn at  E Iliff Ave, Aurora, CO  on Thursday night,  December . I reviewed this stay yesterday. Along with all the lowest rankings, I wrote: 
There was a "masks required" post on the front doors. None of the staff wore masks. None of the people staying there, except me, wore masks. I had to wipe down my hotel room with disinfectant wipes because it was obvious that counters were sticky, walls were dirty, door handles had hand oil on them, etc. 
I couldn't eat breakfast, which I paid for, because none of the staff setting it up were wearing masks. 
You put my health at risk in the middle of a worldwide pandemic. You made it clear that you don't care and don't respect everyone's right to be safe. I am angry I paid you to have my health jeopardized.  
Do you not read the news? Do you not want to protect your employees as much as your patrons? My experience tells me you just don't care who gets sick and who dies. 
I am disgusted with Comfort Inn. 
Adrienne Pond


Below is what you responded this morning. It is a stock reply that tells me you did not read my review and, again, that you don't care to do anything better or to protect people. And, I will not consider staying with you again. You should refund my money and apologize, as well as clean your hotel and require masks. Seriously, what is wrong with you that you think you are exempt from doing the right thing? 
  
__________________


Property CHI 
To:Adrienne Pond


Sat, Dec  at :31 AM

Dear Adrienne,

Thank you for taking the time to complete our online survey regarding your recent stay at our hotel. 

On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for failing to exceed your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future.

I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience. 

Sincerely,

Property CHI
General Manager
Comfort Inn Denver Southeast
Summary_T5_1: Adrienne Pond stayed at the Comfort Inn in Aurora, CO on Thursday night. She wrote that there was a "masks required" post on the front doors. The hotel has since apologized for failing to meet your expectations.
Summary_T5_2: donâât care whos sick and whos dying chinese guest

Message:
Hello,

On /13 I booked a room with Sleep Inn & Suites Denver International Airport.  The room was for my son.
Confirmation # 

When my son went to check in they would not allow him to stay because he was only  years old.  There is absolutely no notification of this hotel policy anywhere on their website. I've searched exhaustively. 

Upon speaking with the General Manager Jonny she informed me it was a policy and there was nothing she would do. I explained he was checking in  alone ( afraid he was going to  have a party), enrolled in College, and an honor student. 

So, at :30 PM with a temperature of  Degrees, my son was literally stranded on the side of the road. Please understand I'm ,000 miles away and unable to help him. Rest assured, he's in peril and should something happen you'll hear about it

Posting on Facebook was not my first choice to contact your group. I tried several times on your website, but kept getting an error message. your privacy settings do not allow me to upload a screen shoot of the error message,

A reply would be nice, Hello,

On /13 I booked a room with Sleep Inn & Suites Denver International Airport.  The room was for my son, Satchel Prairie.
Confirmation # 
 
When my son went to check in they would not allow him to stay because he was only  years old.  There is absolutely no notification of this hotel policy anywhere on their website. I've searched exhaustively. 

Upon speaking with the General Manager Jonny she informed me it was a policy and there was nothing she would do. I explained he was alone, enrolled in College, and an honor student. 

So, at :30 PM with a temperature of  Degrees, my son was literally stranded on the side of the road. Please understand I'm ,000 miles away and unable to help him. Rest assured, he's in peril and should something happen you'll hear about it

Posting on Facebook was not my first choice to contact your group. I tried several times on your website, but kept getting an error message.

A reply would be nice Sorry for the delayed response. I myself was traveling from Japan to the US. The Name on the Reservation was Satchel Prairie.  His date of Arrival was /16/21. Departure /17/21.  The Hotel was the sleep inn and suites.  North Tower Road Building B, Denver, CO , USA He had no mode of Transportation as he was dropped off at the hotel by the airport shuttle. I begged and Pleased with the hotel GM and even offered to put ,000USD security deposit on my credit card.  I got a hard NO. He was running low on funds and didn't have the USD he was quoted by Uber to get him to a Denver at that time of night. He ended up "sleeping" outside ( behind a row of bushes for safety) in temperatures below  degrees. Fortunately he had a hat and mittens. IF A HOTEL HAS A POLICY OF NOT ALLOWING A PERSON UNDER  TO STAY TEHRE IT SHOULD BE CLEARLY STATED ON THEIR WEBSITE. ( or even n fine print). #ChoiceHotelsHeartless! If it happened to me I could deal with it. However, when it happens to a family member, and I am powerless to do anything to assist at the time it's heartbreaking. Yes Grettel, I understand some of your hotels might have age restriction policies.  However, don't you think it would be prudent to publicly state that policy? Prior to booking online I diligently  scoured their website. There is no mention of such a policy. The result was my son sleeping on the streets in below freezing temps. ( Way below) Hi Grettel - I can see you and Choice Hotels are all about delivering PERSONAL satisfaction. My name is Shane. My son's name is Satchel.  Earlier in this thread you called me Mathew "Good morning, Matthew! ". Now You've asked me to send you Casandra's member number, address, ph number and email. WHO IN THE HELL IS CASANDRA?  Your attention to detail is impeccable. I'm going to ask that you keep your ,000 points and send me a name of a customer service rep that can address the issue i'm seeking clarity on.  Thank you,   Shane Prairie Hello Ed, Sorry for not promptly replying. I'm currently enjoying the holiday week with my family and they are my priority. To be frank, this issue has been causing me nothing but stress, and i've been trying to forget that one of your hotels wouldn't allow my son to stay in their property, but had no problem with him sleeping outdoors in Denver, Colorado where the temperatures were in the teens. However, the ,000 Choice points will more than make up for his/our hardship.         ( Please note sarcasm). Choice Member since . Membership number 
SEP49300.  W/I my profile you can find my email, address, and phone number. As of this morning, the hotel  and issue at hand, have NOT been addressed. If you are curious about the issue please see this thread from its origin.

Message:
hello I am a diamond member of your choice privileges.   I am currently at the Quality Inn and Suites in Platte City, MO.  The amentities in the room are used bottles left over from someone else.  Room  has water stains on the ceiling, the shower arm comes out the wall and even when I pushed back in, it popped right back out.  There is blue splatters of something on the ceiling.  The bed is comfortable and the room appeared clean. The biggest concern I have is the motel advertises they serve a full breakfast...not at all.  they had scrambled eggs, coffee, juice, and a couple sweet rolls and pork sausage.  Nothing else.  Nothing else   nothing else.  The friendly clerk, said their supplier is not able to provide them with the food and supplies.  I responded proper management would go to the store and buy those things and besides other motels have the stuff.  No napkins, no tea, no fruit, no butter, no waffles, no syrup.  No gift for elite members.  The friendly clerk said they were out.  No yogurt.  No milk.  no cereal.  NOTHING.  The internet works good. A safety concern. The cement step on the side door entrance toward back of hotel is missing. So its approximately two feet to step up or down onto the cement platform to enter or to exit that part of the hotel Arrived /19/21.  Confirmation .   Karen Franke Please note the two staff in which I interacted were friendly. They just were not able to provide because management failed to purchase or make the side entrance safe They wont give me the  points for being an elite member. They say its their choice each hotels can choose to give or not.  I showed the manager the app and it showed diamond member  she said its their right to give or not. They choose not As I was checking 
Check out I asked if the night clerk had given me the extra points for being an elite member they told me I was not an elite member I wasnt a member at all he said I did not book through Choice which is not accurate I did I walked out as the lady was trying to explain to me and help me to understand that the motel is independently owned and run and therefore they can do what they want to do and it doesnt matter what Choice has in place they make their own decisions she was very nice as she tried to get me to understand I will send info when I get home.  Thank you. Not resolved I agree.   My member number is KLF06240.   My email is   My address has been POBox . Salem Oregon  or  Stayton rd SE,  Turner, OR .  It is now P.O. Box  Ozark, MO .   Phone number . Thank you. Take care

Hello, this is Annjela. My case no is , it has been  and a half months trying to get this resolved with you guys. I have called and emailed numerous times. To call you guys and talk to someone, explain everything takes approximately an hour so I do not have that time every day to follow up. The last person I spoke to few weeks back was supposed to have someone call me the next day but no one called. You guys do not really care reaching back to your customers. Pls take your time and review my case. Your people are offering me  points, in the first place I do not want to be associated with your hotel so I did not want the points but few months back when I spoke to one of your customer service agent, he was nice enough to offer me all the  some thousand points, you have to understand that we were  adults who took two rooms and stayed for  nights. We were humiliated, ill treated, discriminated. I was given your corporate emails and phone no but no one answers the phone and the email bounces back. I am beyond upset at this point but I will not leave it at this. Either you want me to go public or seek legal help on this. This is the last time I am reaching out to you to let you resolve my issue.  /2 months is a long time and you are really trying my patience. Hello Zaira, thank you for responding quicker than expected. Its a shame that you guys keep offering me -10,000 points. I did not accept  some thousand points the agent offered me few months back. I feel humiliated each time you guys do this and I have to explain everything all over again and the experience comes back as a nightmare. Btw I was not alone, as i mentioned before. We were  adults and stayed for  nights and had booked  rooms. If you cannot offer me ,000 points. Pls send me details of your corporate office with a valid email and phone no. I do not want to waste my energy anymore on this issue. You are simply underestimating the situation. Otherwise refund me all the money I paid for the hotel. I do not want to be associated with choice hotels if you guys keep pushing me. So you are offering me  per person correct? like i mentioned, you guys only humiliate me more every time i contact you. I am not here to bargain. So do me a favor and give me your corporate office phone no and email. As always, i have to spend so much time just talking to you guys. If its  per person i will take otherwise forward this to someone higher. You were not with me or my family so you wouldnt understand. And I am not reaching out to claim my points on what I spend, mind you I never asked for points, someone in your company offered. Zaira, the number you have given a above is your customer service, where I have called many times. That number, the email and this chat is not where my problem is going go be solved, so pls send me your corporate number and email where I can reach out to someone higher. Thank you You make the reservation under one name if it is a family but clearly my reservations show  adults, and my elderly mother and husband both were equally affected by the experience. The most unacceptable service ever received from Choice Hotels. Its almost  months now and you guys have wasted my time going back and forth communicating via email, phone, private facebook message. Pls pass me your head of dept email or contact because your unreasonable discussion over me and my familys experience is getting no where. Choice Hotels - Zaira, ofcourse you did, but I do not agree with anything you are offering on the private message. I do not want your points, I never did in the first place. Let me talk to someone higher. Thank you Its almost  months now. You have wasted my time and energy just with the communication back and forth. Me and my family were discriminated. I had to tend and go back and forth to tend to my mother because of the inconvenience. In front of my eyes, one of the other stuff at the hotel gave my husband the key on the rd day and said she would accommodate us next to my mothers room. But then in few mins she took the key back and told my husband someone booked the room so she couldnt accommodate us. I had booked the same room in the first place but because I am not white, your staff who were both white decided they could give more preference to white people? We were humiliated more than once, mind you. And this is just one of the incidents I have mentioned. If you go and read my case, you should see more details. And you are valuing this to $147.60? We were  adults equally involved. I tried to stay out writing this publicly, thinking you guys would solve this issue, but I believe you pay attention when you only go social, right? And on Christmas eve, you still want me to spend time going back and forth trying to solve this issue. I think you can do much better, having said you are at the highest level. Since I had two rooms booked for  adults- and you are giving me back $147.60 for one night. Why dont you give $147.60 x  and close this long argument. I really do not wan to take this to the new year. You have to understand my frustration as its taking so long for you to solve this issue. You guys make me laugh. How would my matter be resolved. I do not have time every day to spend in communicating with you guys because you guys really do not care. I have learned that discrimination and ill treatment means nothing to your company. So after wasting  months you ask me to go back to the hotel? I paid choice hotels, I did the booking directly with you guys, why dont you contact the hotel and dispute all the charges. I do not have extra time to do that. You have not solved my issue. Seems like you dont treat people well. I tried to be patient and waited for this long but seems like I will have to seek legal advice on this. Can you suggest on what basis would I dispute this with the credit card company? This is not their fault. I am not seeking refund to the credit card. I am filing a complaint on other basis with Choice Hotels as I booked and stayed in your hotel. I know you are not the highest level of this complaint and you are not willing to give me the information either. You are justing wasting both yours and my time going back and forth, causing me extra stress. Compensate me for twice the amount you have stated. This was for  adults who got affected- pls remember that. Hello, do you guys check the account issue or just handle complaints? It says i have an account but am not able to log in. I want to check my status before i go ahead and end this issue. Thats alright. I called to sort this out. I am really really tired of dealing with you guys so since you offered me points or cash. I will take the points. My member number is AXB105732 so pls just deposit the points there. And pls know I am not happy but for my own peace of mind I want to end it here and take this issue any further So earlier you offered me $74 or  points and you went up to $147.60. How many points are you giving me for almost  months of struggle? If you calculate, hope it is more than . If it makes sense. Its so difficult to communicate with you guys. Pls just deposit the points in my account and why do you want my mailing address. I already provided you my member no. Pls scroll up to see message. You guys are utterly time and energy consuming. What do you mean by once we have this information, we will follow up with your inquiry ??? You guys dont have my home address, why do u need it further? How will u verify if you dont have it? I can send you my email and phone no My address:  Chastain Cir, Newnan, GA, 

Email: 

Phone:  Thank you but just so you know you never rectified my bad experience. Just coz I do not want to take this negative feeling towards the new year I wanted to end this here. Besides the experience it took almost  months of additional stress for me. Anyways its not your fault but I did want to let you know how I have feel.

Message:
Nope. Never again! Complaints headed to corporate since the desk clerks are not able to provide the promised and advertised services, the manager seems to be non existent (told there wasnt one last night but would be in at  am but of course when I went to the desk after not sleeping well due to the less than ideal check in experience, to no the manager is not here but will be in at ) and was hung up on four times when calling the -800 number!!! On top of it I brought extra business to the hotel by making a recommendation to a co worker that booked his family here last week because of my recommendation! Choice Hotels Gladly. Sending now Helder. Comfort Inn Miami International Experience   Mokena Drive 
Miami, Florida 

Tasha Blumenberg 
Booking number: WGR5DB

Checked in: /22/2021 approximately :00 pm

Desk clerk name: Amantha 

Traveling with a family to a city youre not familiar with during the holidays comes with stress. Thats a given. However, I work hard to do my due diligence when making travel plans and so prior to booking a hotel I read several reviews and narrowed my choices down by location, reviews, Anne iTunes and price. Then I called each hotel to confirm the advertised hotel shuttle from the airport and to the Port of Miami. I was chose Comfort In. Because the reviews donned cleanliness, family friendly and shuttle service was reliable. I then called the hotel on /92021 called to confirm airport and port shuttle service was available and how it worked. I was told to put my name on the list when I checked in. Although Comfort Inn was more expensive than the competitors I was shopping, I was satisfied with the responses I received and justified the extra money given the amenities. On /10/2021 I booked a room and paid in advance. 

On /22/ I arrived for check in at the hotel and when I asked to add our name to the shuttle service I was  told shuttle service was full. I asked how can that be I contacted you directly prior to booking and was told the service was available. The clerk explained that due to covid they are offering few rides with limited space. Then she proceeded to tell me the only thing I could do was come back in the morning and if there was a cancellation, I could then fill that spot. I looked her as calmly as I could and said I was very frustrated with this situation. I understand its nit your fault but I would be contacting management and proceeded to my room. 

I went up to room dropped off bags and tried to call down to guests services with no answer so went back downstairs to ask for sheets only to see the two guests that were right behind me at check in getting shuttle tickets. I then asked the guest as they were walking away if they got shuttle tickets and she said to me in a stunned manor uh for the :00.

I then went back upstairs to compose myself because I was to upset to question the front desk clerk in that moment. 

Upon returning my room I proceed to unfold then unfold the sleeper sofa to find no sheets, a band aid and a bed full of what appeared to be beach sand. 

I then go back downstairs to ask for sheets and after getting the sheets asked the clerk how the girls behind got shuttle service and was told oh someone cancelled the :00 (now remember the guests told me they got on the :00 shuttle). I bit my tongue and again walked back upstairs. 

I find it extremely unlikely that someone cancelled between the time I walked upstairs and back down when the guests were literally behind me! And the clerk would of had to stop checking the guests in, answer the phone and then continue checking them in and book their shortly and print their tickets (because she was the only one at the desk). Additionally, if it was the case that there by chance a cancellation in that short amount of time and the desk is booking shuttle on first come first serve basis (even though that was never communicated), I checked I prior to the guests behind me, expressed my need for the shuttle and therefore should have been offered the tickets first. 

At this point I was done for the evening. My husband decides to go downstairs to ask for an explanation. He is told the shuttles only take a few people because of covid. Which still is an unacceptable answer given complemtary service is advertised, confirmed and honored to other guests and the shuttle we took from the airport to the hotel that was offered by the hotel didnt have an empty seat on it to include the front passenger seat that did not have a seat belt available!!!! At this point my husband requests to speak to a manager. He is told there isnt one on duty but one would be in at :00 am. 

So then he decides to contact the  number to explain the situation and gets hung up on three times. Then when someone stays on the phone long enough to speak to he is told shuttle service isnt provided at this location. Which is simply not true as its on the website, I verbally confirmed it prior to booking and confirmed at check in. Once that was communicated the customer service rep informs my husbands twice hes documenting the call and then, big surprise, hangs up. 


Im addition, to the fold out bed situation, theres  a broken handle on the dresser and theres mold on the outlet. The reason I discovered that is because the chargers didnt work so we checked to ensure the table was plugged in and it wasnt. 

Im a very patient person but was upset when I learned that after doing my due diligence, paying more for this hotel over my other choices in the area because of the shuttle service I confirmed was in fact not available, I was pretty upset, but realistically looking at this as humans and given the issues the service industry is facing I would have moved on as this issue could be solved with  an Uber or taxi. However, after going back downstairs to learn the guest immediately behind me was treated differently, that made this situation unacceptable!  All services should either be available to all guests or no guests. You should never pick and choose which guests you would like to service and which you choose not to. 

Tasha Blumenberg, MBA
Texas A&M University Thank you for the quick response. We were told the manager wouldnt be in until  after they told us theyd be in at  and we had to order an Uber in order to make our pre scheduled cruise check in. Thank you Debbie
Summary_T5_1: Guests at Comfort Inn Miami were told shuttle service was full when they checked in. The hotel has been accused of being too busy and not providing the promised services.

Message: Will never stay in  city again. Was only in the room less than two hours took a nap and woke up to multiple bed bug bites on my face, the back of my head and more and they wont refund me. Had to call corporate   Here is video of the bed bugs crawling in the bed. I was bitten on my face my arms in the back of my head while sleeping in this very hotel bed. I sent corporate these videos and Im still waiting for a resolution.    Here is video of the bed bugs crawling in the bed. I was bitten on my face my arms in the back of my head while sleeping in this very hotel bed. I sent corporate these videos and Im still waiting for a resolution.     My name is Justin Stewart. I arrived at the comfort in Pentagon city about  PM. Hello, I have already checked out. The hotels manager did not offer me a refund for my room, after the receptionist called him several times to try to get an answer. She offered no resolution either. So I am actually headed back to New Jersey where I live. I had to call out of work today because my face is swollen and itches from the multiple bites on my body. Ive actually called corporate and found a case number please see the attached photo.   Here is what I was told by the receptionist.  Yes you do see that I was bitten on my forehead the back of my neck and my arms by these bugs that were in the bed  I called the hotel and it says yes that I am still checked in but I have driven three hours and  minutes to New Jersey where I live. So I am not in the hotel I checked out about  PM. Lauren the receptionist said that she is having computer issues and it will not allow her to check me out until the morning time. Update: So i havent gotten my $ back. Called the  & manger said hes waiting for pest control to come & confirm bed bugs in the room, & corporate sent me a dm me to offer my k hotel points. SMH         Yes      Nope, I called today and filed a complaint with the VA health department. manager of the hotel says that they have to confirm with a pest control person that its bedbugs b4 they offer me a refund. This is so frustrating. Meanwhile Im nursing bites on the bck of my head and face     Thats what i said i sent to their corporate but there independently owned and i sent video and pics to the va health department..who was very nice and called to check on me this morning. They took the room i stayed in out of rotation along with the rooms beside & below it

Message: Thanks, but I literally just got thrown out of your Rice Lake Econolodge by the police thanks to your rude nasty third shift clerk. She started insulting and threatening me, and lied flat out to the police to get them to have me leave. At pm on NYE in below zero cold.  All because I was upset the hot tub wasn't working after I paid full price for a hotel with pool and hot tub.  Until she came in and started screaming, the second shift clerk and I were working it out.  I'm filing several complaints.  I got the impression she does this regularly. She was a huge rude bully.  I'm A middle aged disabled woman. This is appalling. Just an FYI, I was completely sober and just came here to swim with my grandson who lives nearby. I used to come here regularly for this purpose. At least they didn't call the cops on you for complaining about their false advertising. They three me out in sub zero weather at pm on NYE. Unreal. They threw me out too! A middle aged disabled woman! Because I complained that they were charging full price but not telling people amenities were broken! At pm on NYE in sub zero weather! Choice Hotels Hello, and thank you.  I just got home actually and saw this. I will message you all the details here. Let me gather the confirmation number from the email and I will get that message out. Thank you!  I just returned home and saw your message.  I arrived on Friday night a little after :30pm. Its a  mile drive in very cold weather and I had been looking forward to a nice swim and soak in the hot tub. I pay extra to stay at hotels with pools so my grandson can come and we can swim and relax.  After completing the check in, I noticed the pool area,was dark and asked wh Sorry, hit post by mistake.  I'll finish my post and repost! I asked why. There was no notice at the front desk nor on the website at booking that the pool or hot tub were down.  She stated the hot tub had been broken for several days and wasn't sure if/when it will be fixed. I expressed dismay as this was the third time over the holiday season that this had happened to me while checking into a hotel.  In the other cases, I was offered a room upgrade if I wanted, which I chose. I asked about this option here but the clerk wasn't sure this was something management would allow. I was contemplating my options, including going elsewhere but was concerned because any potential refund would take several business days to process.  The clerk and I were debating options when the third shift clerk, an older heavy set woman with longer grey hair came in about pm.  She sat down on the couches and started yelling rudely to me that if this was going to be a problem that I could take my money and get out. I asked her if she was a manager and she said no. I stated I didn't wish to interact with her as she was treating me rudely.  This got her very upset and she stormed over stating she was calling the cops to have me thrown out. I'm a middle aged disabled woman, who was a threat to no one. She just completely flipped out. She lied on the phone to police and made it seem like I was a danger, so they sent two squad cars and four officers came in, two of whom were extremely aggressive really with me. I was insulted and put down, then forced to leave.  I had to find a last minute place to go on NYE at pm for the remainder of my stay. Needless to say I ended up having to pay much more for the same stay booking this late at another place on a holiday weekend.  Reading reviews on trip advisor you can see several negative reviews regarding rude staff, including a previous review where others were also threatened with "take your money and get out".  The clerk at the Micro tel where I ended up says a lot of people have stated to her this is a problem with that kind of treatment at Rice Lake Econolodge.  This was an extremely traumatic experience for me.  I had just gotten off the road and was looking forward to a nice relaxing weekend.  The second shift clerk did state she had told management this had been an issue with people, and indicated that fell on deaf ears. I honestly can't believe that this rude and unbalanced woman on the third shift has been able to continue working here so long. Some of the complaints go back a few years. It was double digits below zero when they threw me out. Not including a bitterly cold windchill. Someone like this has no business working with the public, much less at any place that values their reputation. Both she and the officers refused to give me her name, but she worked third shift NYE.  Thank yoh for listening. Previously I had stayed at this property and enjoyed it. Thank you. Here is the confirmation number.  Booked through Hotels.com  I arrived at :39 pm on Friday December st  reservation was for three days, leaving on Monday January rd, . Please keep me updated on this investigation, thank you very much. Rice Lake Wisconsin Econolodge.  S. Main Street Rice Lake, WI . I was to be in room  they said, if that helps. Thank you very much. I really appreciate how well you are handling my concerns.  Let me look up my choice rewards info. Just a moment please. My choice rewards membership number is LXS090143.  Phone number -329-0420.  Email is  and mailing address is P.O.Box , Butternut, WI .  Thank you. Hey, you didn't say if I accepted the points that the case is closed when you offered them. What happened to me was a very serious offence against a person with disabilities. I don't want this case closed, I want the employee who behaved in this manner to be held accountable. I would have refused the points had you said upfront that  this will mean the case is closed. I do not wish for my case to be closed without resolution! You did NOT rectify the situation! I told you my PO box because the mail won't come to my home address as I had to switch to a PO box because of the snowplow. This is quickly turning into another situation of poor customer service! Thank you. I just wish to continue to be able to check the progress on this case as I am concerned that local management will do nothing, in which case I would wish to escalate this issue to corporate.  They have an employee who is abusive to people.  Nothing will change as long as they continue to employ her.  I'm concerned nothing further will be done. I appreciate your honesty, its just frustrating that potentially nothing could be done. The local talk in Rice Lake is that place has had long term problems that management turns a blind eye to.  It's concerning that choice hotels doesn't seem more concerned about this overall. Thank you. I do appreciate that. It was just a difficult experience, and unpleasant way to start a new year.  I hope this doesn't happen to anyone else.

Boo - totally disappointed in this hotel chain - we had Platinum and Diamond status the last few years -  but I do believe we will find a different hotel or Air BNB to give our loyalty to.

https://Boo - totally disappointed in this hotel chain - we had Platinum and Diamond status the last few years -  but I do believe we will find a different hotel or Air BNB to give our loyalty to.  And I am a Veteran - so yeah - youre so grateful for your Veterans - this is literally the worst Hotel Chain and we are finding that out now! 

https://Attention Debbie Our daughter has Autism. She wears pull ups.  She leaked through her pull up.  We even had a note requesting a first floor room because she is scared of elevators.  They said they didnt have any rooms available on the first floor so we took the stairs.  The room was not clean and sanitary when we got there but we didnt complain because there is usually no point. 
I literally took the bedding off the bed so the hotel staff wouldnt have to - 
I have many people telling me to get an Autism Advocacy Group and the News involved.  I am considering getting an attorney.  I have also been told that they are not able to charge the $300 because they never notified us of it and didnt inform us of it ahead of time either. 
This has happened before at a hotel and they literally sent staff with new bedding and a snack for our little girl. We were treated with kindness at another hotel. 
This hotel is NOT one I would want representing my brand - you can even look and see other complaints and some pretty serious ones on the FB page of the hotel location itself. 
Here is my post and you can read the comments and know that this is definitely spreading awareness to NOT stay in Choice Hotels.  

Boo - totally disappointed in this hotel chain - we had Platinum and Diamond status the last few years -  but I do believe we will find a different hotel or Air BNB to give our loyalty to.  And I am a Veteran - so yeah - youre so grateful for your Veterans - this is literally the worst Hotel Chain and we are finding that out now! 

https://Those pictures are from other customer reviews.  I saw them after leaving my review and would have NEVER stayed at this hotel if I had seen/known about the owner being a sexual predator.  I would highly recommend taking his rights of using your brand on his hotel. 

We would also like the right thing done and our $300 refunded.

Please let me know if I need to contact my attorney and the local area news. I am going to speak with my lawyer about this - I have been advised hat the $300 charge is illegal because it was a separate charge and we did not authorize it. 

If we can get the full $300 I will be glad to accept that - but I would need it immediately and feel this is not good customer service.

Stayed at Comfort Inn in Rivergate, Madison, and the woman (Samantha?) at the front desk thought it was wise to follow my boyfriend and I out while filming us with her phone as we were loading our trunk. When she was noticed, she runs back behind a door, resfuses to let me in, and accuses us of stealing a TV. She filmed me the entire interaction, and made me feel pretty low after not letting me show her I CLEARLY DIDNT STEAL A DAMN TV. The manager Amanda today apparently thought that was the right action, and treated me just as a thief over the phone even though it was clear I wasnt. This is usually where I make a funny joke to dog on your business, but Ive honestly been treated terribly for no reason and did nothing wrong. Its sad how the business was ran. Never had this experience in my life actually.
Really enjoyed the room though! I wouldve came back just to use the hot tub... A shame. 
Comfort Inn condones their employees unprofessional and antagonizing behavior. Boooo. This is the first message I got. Heard back from what? If somebody tried to contact me I did not receive a message. Apologies! Ive searched and I cannot find the notification. I already called and made a formal complaint and the manager was nasty. I dont know where there is to go from there but heres a photo of the info.

Honestly just you responding is nice after my recent experience. Thank you. I carried out a couple lights in a bag. She was suspicious, but there were a lot of other ways to approach the situation that didnt involve filling and locking me out and did involve treating me like a normal person that spent money and cleaned up before I left.

Thank you again. Involve filming* The last name is Casler.

I called management yesterday morning and got so much of a rude treatment that I thought it was the same woman recording me from the night before. At first I wanted a refund, but I think I just wanted some kind of acknowledgment from the company this was not acceptable behavior. Thank you for your response and decency. Hi there! I would love to take you up on the free night stay and appreciate the response more than I can say! Here is the information you requested:

Member ID: DXC154812
Address:
Phone: Sorry that is incomplete, here you are 

DXC154812  Lombardia Ln
Madison TN  -916-1548
Danielle Casler

Thank you again!!

Message: Choice Hotels That's all you do is refer us back to the actual hotel, even though your company oversees all of your hotels.  Comfort Suites in Redmond, Oregon, won't return ANY of our phone calls.  Yes, it was also a non-cancelable reservation, unbeknownst to us, but we can't even get the manager to call us back.  Why are you attaching your name to hotels with such poor customer service?  Won't be returning to your hotels. Anila Wilds Yep, they DON'T CARE!  Unforeseen snowstorm so can't make it to Central Oregon and, nope, still going to keep all our money.  Can't even get the manager to return a phone call.  Shady, shady company. Nothing has been resolved.  Your manager at Comfort Suites Redmond Airport will not return a phone call.  We have stayed there MANY times and have never had an issue, but to not be compensated at all when an uncharacteristic snowstorm prevents us from traveling is ridiculous.  You put people's lives in danger, braving the weather, so they don't lose their money.  What if we would have come down with Covid?  Should we have come to your hotel so we don't lose our money? Message:
Tried to stay at the Sleep Inn in Savannah Ga on Abercorn street this past weekend. Absolutely awful. As soon as I walked there was dirt and grim on the walls behind the desk. Got to our room and it was already used, snuff on the counter and snacks on the bed in the room. Told the hostess, got us a different room and it also wasnt clean. Dust on everything, food pieces on the carpet, just gross. Along with that, there was a dog in the room beside us just barking and going absolutely ballistic the entire time we were there and no one was doing anything about it. Hallway was warm, grimy and stunk. Everything looked and smelled horrible. Canceled the reservation and left immediately after that because there was no way we were staying there. Even though Im a choice reward member with a lot of points, they would not refund me for that night, only the next two (booked for three total), even thought I was there for maybe less then  minutes just getting everything figured out and never slept in the room. Even if they technically had to clean it again because I walked in there, it needed cleaned as soon as I unlocked the door? Extremely upset and will never stay at a choice hotel again. Had a bad experience at another choice hotel in Gettysburg PA and management never seems to want to fix it or remedy things for a loyal member. Disgusted.
