Alexis Cassella 

P.O. Box 
Fairmont wv  These are the specific details for the stay I had a large issue with at the comfort suites Im Gettysburg I stayed at this hotel for multiple weeks. There was never a discount for extended stays or healthcare workers. There was an old lady who worked the desk during the day who was usually very rude. I called before I even booked this specific stay and asked if they offered a half day rate because I needed to check out past check out time that specific day but didnt want to stay another might. She said multiple times I could get a half day rate for not staying the entire night and to let her know the day of. I did in fact let her know the day of and then she said it couldnt be done anymore because the hotel was at a high capacity and Id have to pay for another night in full if I wanted a late check out. I told her that I stay there  nights every week and was going to continue to stay there  nights every week for  weeks because Im a travel nurse in the area and asked if she could give it to me at a half day rate like she said. She was extremely rude and said that she called management and they also said no. That was the last night I stayed there and will ever stay there. I dont understand why she or management would prioritise keeping a room open instead of accommodating a loyal member and customer. That business ideal doesnt make sense to me. Prior to that I also had issues such as: multiple dead and alive stink bugs on the floor/ bed/ carpet, moldy bathroom, bathroom water that took  minutes to get hot, microwave with old food covering it, stained sheets and couch, and leftover food on the carpet (this stuff occurred every week with every room, not just once). When I asked if someone could come up and vacuum, the housekeeper came to the room and gave my boyfriend the vacuum to do it himself. Also had someone playing loud music one night and told the nightshift desk lady about it and she said she would look into it but the music never stopped and I had to go into work early in the morning, I was always there for work, never for leisure. I was going to look past those issues because the hotel was very close to work but after being spoken to rudely by staff I went to a holiday inn express for the remainder of my nights in town. Yes I would also like to accept the ,000 points for Gettysburg as well, thank you Thank you!

It's approximately :30 a.m. and your desk clerk on site refuses to help me log on to the internet and says that he's going to call the police because I hung up the phone on him. Teach your personnel how to help guests log on to the internet and not to become defensive and argumentative because they do not know how and then threatened to call the police and kick me out of the hotel who holds the license for the Quality Inn on Mayport Rd., Atlantic Beach Fl? Hello Debbie could we do this by email .  
The details of this event are quite horrific. I emailed a full explanation to a Mr. Kai Patel on Monday who I was told is the manager of this property on Mayport Road in Atlantic Beach. I have not heard back from him. I have also requested a  tape of the call I presume Justin made because I believe he made false allegations to manipulate the police to respond.  It is a crime to lie to the police to get them to initiate an investigation for the purpose of harassing someone.  The three officers who came to my room were very polite and courteous. I'm sure they were as astounded as I was as to why they were there.
When I finally checked out, Justin was laughing and joking that he had gotten the police to pay me a visit... he told me to go back to Baltimore and that I was never to come to that hotel again or as he put it "his" hotel. His behavior was a agitated, aggressive and alarming. I'm a  year old woman. I've been to that hotel on two prior occasions with absolutely no problems from other staff and I had a pleasant experience upon check-in the day before with a clerk named Morgan.
Please continue this conversation with the appropriate people via email. thank you Are you planning on responding to my inquiry about the conduct of your employee Justin at the Quality Inn in Atlantic Beach Florida? I will do that.  I am waiting for the Atlantic Beach police tape of the phone call from your employee Justin at the Quality Inn in Atlantic Beach.  I intend to use this phone call to file criminal charges against this employee  who made false statements to the police to enlist them to harass me during my stay at your hotel.  They came too my hotel rom, spoke to me briefly and then left.  Hours later when I checked out Justin laughed and said if I every came there again he'd call the police and have them "talk to me."  He was agitated and aggressive.  His supervisor a Mr. Patel, he not bothered to respond to my emails.  I have also told my credit card company to open a dispute since you are the only one who has bothered to respond to my complaints about this disrespectful and dangerous employee.  Denise B I told you before... I'm waiting to get the police tape of the call Justin made... it is a crime to make false allegations to the police to use them to harass someone without a credible Foundation. You'll hear from me when I get the tape I intend to seek a criminal complaint against Justin for harassing me by calling the police Please advise if the Quality Inn in Atlantic Beach is a franchisee owned property licensed by Choice..please also advise if you provide any management services or oversight. As I wait to obtain the following three pieces of information from the Atlantic Beach Police Department ( CAD report/ body cam footage/ police call tape) regarding their response that morning to the hotel... I was informed by them that that property is a "hotbed of drug activity" and they are "frequently called there".
That is important information that the public deserves to know..I wish I'd known that.  I will be posting on relevant travel sites accordingly.

Message: Yesterday I stayed at the Comfort Suites on Peoria in Denver, Colorado. I had the worst experience I have ever had at a Choice Hotel or any hotel really. I checked into the room March th @ around :30 am. When I got into the room I noticed my phone in the room did not work. I went back to the front desk to tell her that and she said she would have the maintenance guy fix it and he would be there in  minutes to fix it. Well, he never came. Check out time came around and the front desk said they were calling the room for me to check out but I had already told them my phone didn't work and it never got fixed even after my complaint. She came to my room being very rude. I asked for a  PM checkout like the Choice Hotel members were allowed to and she denied my request very rudely. When she came into the room to wake me up, she came very rudely. She was saying very rude things to me and made me leave the room door open while I cleaned the room. I told her I was naked and asked if she could close the door while I got dressed and she laughed and told me no. I finally got dressed and while I was getting the last of my things, she came in calling the police on me. I told her I was almost done and she said I dont care youre going to jail.I started crying because she was being very rude and she told me she doesnt care about me crying. I told her I felt like I was in jail with how rudely she was treating me and she said that's where I was going anyway. I have never had an experience so bad in my life. I felt like I wasn't a paying customer at a hotel. Is there any way I can get a free night at a hotel due to the HORRIBLE experience I have had with one of your hotels tonight? I felt so violated due to this issue! CRP4829, Courtanea Page,  (720)453-9300,  Fundy St. Denver, CO , I don't have the confirmation number at this moment because it hasn't updated yet. The reservation was under my name (Courtanea Page) I arrived March th and checked out March th.,  Peoria St. Denver, CO  I looked into the account and that was a really old phone number but I changed it to my current phone number, (720)453-9300. And I send my agreement for the points. Thank you for listening to my concern. Thank you so much. I am sorry for having to complain against one of' your employees at this hotel. I appreciate the ,000 points. Thank you for listening to my concern and handling it so fast. You too  Thank you

Whether your rate plan said non-refundable or not, it's a predatory practice. The "special rate" I was locked into was actually $100 higher than the Choice hotel I later stayed at. A reputable company would at least convert this to a credit. In order to avoid this issue in future, I will be spending my travel dollars at hotel chains other than Choice, and recommending to my coworkers that they do the same. No it's not resolved, other than confirming to me that I need to patronize hotel chains other than Choice Hotels in future. I am totally dissatisfied with your rapacious business practices and your unwillingness to service me as a customer. Nothing short of a refund or credit will resolve this for me, so if you're not going to offer that do not contact me further. You can give me the points My privileges number is ADM06370, email is  address is  W Manzanita, Rialto CA, . Phone is

Good morning,

I need a number to the corporate office/franchise owner (Veer Vora) to obtain the information needed to purse legal charges against the hotel Comfort Suites Airport- in Newport News Va for discrimination and tampering with credit card/receipt documents. John Clark left instructions to illegally evict my family into the streets as a result we were forced to stay in our vehicle until other arrangements could be made with  children. We called the NN police department out to the hotel on Sunday /3/22  to ensure our safety as we prepared to leave. The embarrassment we encountered in front of our grandchildren, other guest and hotel staff was unethical and beyond regular resolve. This experience has left my family emotionally scared as we were given less than  minutes to vacate the property after being their over  days. We were treated less than human and will take the necessary steps to ensure this never happens again to another African American family. Covid-19 reshaped the way that people travel and being abruptly put in the street during a World wide pandemic was detrimental to our safety!
We have live video footage, pictures of the room, phone records and detailed bank statements documenting when the harassment began! It is imperative that I hear back from the owner. My family does not feel safe communicating further with John Clark out of fear of retaliation. We are not comfortable that he will not further abuse his power by calling other choice hotels with false information after receiving an email from him on /4/22 stating we were banned from staying at the property in the future.

Message:
we need to talk Good evening Im reaching out in regards to a horrible reservation I experienced at one of you hotels. confirmation number-  Name on reservation- Rahkim Summers Arrival date- Thursday March st 

Hotel address-4716 new bern avenue Hope to hear back in the morning about this matter Good morning, yea Id like to voice the biggest of complaints. About this hotel and I used that word very vaguely. Because staying there it felt very little like a hotel and more like I was renting a room at an apartment building. This building had people who had been obviously basically living out of there. Roaming the hall, getting arrested.  Smoking, playing loud music at all times and  even offering  me drugs. Upon arrival I was not aware of this, seeing as though I had arrive late on a Thursday night and was staying in town until that following Monday. I was hoping to have a peaceful vacation away. But this was the complete opposite. The sink in my room had a leak, To which someone from the staff had placed a trash can under it, I didnt notice until said trash can was overflowing with water. Part of the carpet in my room  was coming up from the floor. And the icing on the cake was without any notification on Saturday the water in the hotel had been cut off completely after the room next to mine appeared to have some sort of leak which caused my room floor to get wet. 

I thought I was choosing a well enough hotel to not be met with so many problems  let alone the magnitude of the problems. If I had the opportunity I wouldve immediately left and went to another hotel the next day. However my allotted money to stay somewhere had already been charged to my card from this residence. For the rest of the weekend I didnt even stay at this hotel. I simple houses my items there and went back and forth to get them. I notified management of my complaints and disdain and even asked if I could receive some sort or refund to which I was told Id have to talk to booking or to customer service for the hotel   I am highly and I mean HIGHLY disappointed with this Hotel and personally dont think it should be running if these are the standards it keeps. How does this work? Seeing as though I go not have a rewards account? Ok, please find below all the info needed. Address-5175 w Columbia avenue, Philadelphia park 

Phone number-2678041880

 Just outta curiosity since I have not made an account will that account be linked to me somehow? ???
Summary_T5_1: Rahkim Summers was staying at a hotel in New York City when he found out about a leak. The sink had a leak, and the carpet in my room was coming up from the floor. I simply houses my items there and went back and forth to get them. I am highly and HIGHLY disappointed with this Hotel and personally dont think it should be running if these are the standards it keeps.

Message: I stayed  in Comfort Suites /1 & /2 in Gasden / Attalla in Alabama  This was a miserable stay, the location was nasty, lots of mold in the bathroom , my room was not cleaned the second day. I have pictures of the mold.  My daughter was with me, she is a Safety Officer on Ft Knox. I expect something to be done otherwise Im calling the Health Dept & will be posting the pictures my daughter took No, its not been resolved Would you like for me to send you some pictures my daughter took of the mold covered bathroom? Thats only one of my complaints. You should call me or give me a number to call you.   My # is -366-3614.   Peggy Harris Here are some of the pictures my daughter sent me My email address            Phone } is -366-3614. Id think ,000 each night would be more appropriate, after all our inconveniences. The purpose of the trip was to attend a wedding. Our room was not serviced at all the second day. We left for the early am, my daughter dropped me off at the motel to shower and get ready for the wedding. I called the front desk and explained to her the room had not been cleaned. She informed me there wasnt anything she could do. I asked if I could get clean towels as I needed a shower. She told me I could but she was alone  Id have to come get them myself. I explained I was  years old and unable to walk that far.  Well someone finally took  minutes and brought me towels,  /2 hours LATER!!!   Needless to say I was not even showered when my daughter was to pick me up. So I missed the wedding Id gone to the area to attend.  Plus come home sick from being allergic to mold!!  This was a absolute miserable weekend!  The attendant at the front desk  rarely answers the phone . It rings and rings, and the message box is full. I attempted so many times calling the front, finally once I got through .....  it was a waste of time.

Message:
This company is a rip off make all reservations directly with your hotel. This company does nothing in case of a serious issue. Choice Hotels I was not talking about your promotions. I was talking about the reservations I made for the Rodeway Inn Escondido where I  requested an accessible ground floor room months in advance. When we arrived they had me on the second floor with no elevator. I tried to get  refund but was given the run around between the hotel and Choice Hotels app. Your customer service said to go to the manager and the manager said we had to go through you. I have had multiple knee surgeries and I  cannot get up stairs easily. As it turned out with no refund and no other available rooms I had to drag myself using mostly my arm muscles up and down the stairs. If I  had fallen someone would now be talking to my lawyer. Since that didn't happen due to my husband carefully shepherding me up and down the best I can do is ruin your reputation online, give the hotel a bad reputation, and cancel any further reservations I have through you for future. It so happens I do have one in May so that will now be canceled. I will not qualify for any promotion but who cares, I am now so sore from pulling myself upstairs for  days that I  wouldn't take the chance that my future reservations would honor any requests made anyway. Choice Hotels how can I  send you a private message? My confirmation number has disappeared from my past stay info on the app but I can send you a copy of the invoice if you will telle how. We arrived on April rd and left on the th. The confirmation # has since been taken off the stay information on the app so I have no idea. Why would you rove that if you need it? Our member # is MXT88466 Hi there. You are not doing anything more than you did last Sunday when I called you about this situation when I got there so I'm not sure what you expected to hear from me. You are referring me back to the hotel and they referred me to you.   I will never make reservations through this app again and I  have already canceled the reservations I made for May. Just so you know I will stay in that hotel again. It is very close to my daughter's home and they have a good price. The staff is friendly and I  am very certain that it was your fault that the reservation got messed up. I have had trouble with stairs for  years and I never make reservations without asking for a ground floor room.  This hotel has been very accomodating in the past when we have stayed there. Your  points do not even begin make up for what I had to go through to get up to my room each night. I demand a full refund from you, not the hotel. You need to hope that I haven't injured myself
more than I was before. You are very lucky that I didn't fall down the stairs.I will see my doctor next week so you can expect to hear from me again if I have further injury and believe me you won't get off with mere $292.00 refund. I tried to get a ground floor room at  other hotels when I  could not get one at Rodeway Inn. One was over $400. and the other had given the last ground floor room to the man standing in line in front of my husband. I  trust this answers the question of whether or not this has been resolved for us. It will be resolved when YOU CHOICE HOTELS give us a full refund.. That is IF I have no further injury. If I am injured further you can expect to hear from my lawyer. Don't worry I will not book through your app ever again. Keep your points I won't need them but do understand you will hear from my lawyer if it is found that I injured myself further due to your indifference.

Hi! I finally got around to making an account. My account number is MXS768530. Phone number is -822-3906. Email is  Home address is  old post rd, worthington, MA  thank you See directly above please Im confused why you need a different phone number. Here are the initial details I had sent. I have no idea what more information you could need. Is there something specific you need? I only have my cell phone, no landline. Hi,
The hotel confirmation is . It was the Econo Lodge at  Canal St. Brattleboro VT . My name is Mikaela Spence. Date of stay was /20/21 to /22/21. It was booked through Bring Fido. There was a clear cancellation policy listed that if we needed to cancel after the deadline we still had to pay for the first night. After pulling into the driveway and seeing people sitting in the parking lot drinking in hotel chairs in parking spaces, we decided it was time to cancel. The front desk staff would not allow this and we couldnt afford to pay for a second hotel so we stayed.   There were no pillows in the room and it didnt look cleaned. There was hospital discharge paperwork on the desk from someone who apparently lived there and listed the hotel as his home address. He also apparently stole the batteries to the smoke detector when he left, which were not replaced. The second night we were there we were told not to leave our room because someone beat up their girlfriend really badly and they didnt want our daughter to see it. The police were interviewing them for a while. There were roaches in the hallway (luckily we didnt see any in our room). All in all it was a horrible experience. If they had refunded us even a portion of the stay I would h e considered using a different Econo Lodge in the future but this was horrible. Here was the initial reply from choice hotels: It is disappointing that your stay was not up to the level of quality you have come to expect from our hotels, Mikaela. With your feedback, our field staff teams will be taking the appropriate measures to ensure this hotel continues to operate under the expected terms of its franchise agreement to avoid this from happening again. As it turns out, as a franchisor, our limited access to the hotels' billing system prevents us from refunding our guests' Credit Cards, so we cannot offer you a refund. Nonetheless, we sincerely hope you can consider giving us another opportunity to serve you better and show you the great experience you can have with us by offering you ,000 points as compensation. You will be able to book a free night at over ,500 hotels with these points. Kindly know that reward nights are available from ,000 to ,000 points, depending on the hotel's location, season, or arrival day. Please reply with your member number, phone number, email, and mailing address to credit your points. If you are not a member yet, we can help you open a new account with the same information requested. Hope to hear more from you. -Jendy Hi, the points sound good. For the phone number then it may be -923-7685.

Message:
Comfort Inn and Suites

We are season pass holders for Six Flags Over Georgia and we visit as often as we can. We have stayed at Comfort Inn and Suites the past few times we have came and it was just okay. Not bad enough to complain about, but bad enough to say we wouldn't stay there next time.

Well, today was next time and my dear husband forgot that we said we wouldn't be back and went ahead and rebooked for our spring break visit. 

We spent the morning/afternoon and left early, thinking we would relax at our hotel and then go out to dinner and return to the park and visit the aquarium the next day. When we got to our room on the th floor, we immediately noticed the smell. It was like wet dog that had been covered with perfume and cleaning products. Not pleasant. We walked in the room and immediately noticed stains on the couch and chair. Stains on the sheets, what looked like pieces of the popcorn ceiling all over the bed, duct tape on the floor, and a sticky substance on the nightstand. That was plenty for me.

We stayed for about an hour debating what to do and ultimately decided to go to the front desk and ask for a different room. In the time we were there, myself and my  year old started having major allergy flare-ups. Coughing, itchy eyes, runny nose. My husband went to the front desk and they told him that there were no other rooms for us.

He then asked them to refund us and would find somewhere else to stay. They refunded, took our key cards, then told us it would take about  weeks for our refund to appear in our bank account. So now we're out $200 of what we had saved for our trip, and have no hotel room.

As we were gathering our things from the room we noticed a HUGE corner full of black mold in the room. I mean, huge. No wonder we couldn't stop coughing. When the manager to came to check the room, she seemed shocked at the mold and said she had no idea.

They had a smaller room (2 queens) that she could give us for a discounted rate.  We are a family of . No way we're fitting into that room to begin with, but then we'd be out even more money. Heck no, we were not paying them for THEIR poor business. 

So now, we are driving back home (4 hours away) with four disappointed kids and two very angry parents.

Will NEVER stay here again, and unless you enjoy paying for filth and mold, I'd advise you not to either. Lithia springs, Ga Thank you for the response. We booked through Hotels.com so the confirmation number we have would not work to submit this feedback on your website. Even though we didn't book through you, I thought you should know since it's one of your hotels.  W. Pointe Ct. Lithia Springs, GA  

Check in date was /9/22. We were in room . The name on the reservation was Christopher R. Barnes.
Summary_T5_1: We are season pass holders for Six Flags Over Georgia and we visit as often as we can. When we arrived at our room, we noticed the smell of wet dog covered with perfume and cleaning products. The manager to check the room seemed shocked at the mold and said she had no idea. Now we're out $200 of what we had saved for our trip, and have no hotel room.
Summary_T5_2: us family stay hotel room due wet carpet

Get more pools/hot tubs lol That is all at this one. Ill let you know Monday or Tuesday my complaints if any at the next one. Good evening, I just got back to my hotel from work. So my stays are through work since I travel for work and I cant get the confirmation number. Its a pain because they dont let me do choice points either because Im not paying even though Im staying. The last hotel was  nights and they didnt give me any points. This time around were staying at best western for  nights and no points. It says heated pool, the guy assured me it was heated but its not warm at all. We climb cell towers and work on them  in the air all day so we look forward to being able to stay in a nice hotel and get taken care of after a hard day. I work outdoors, I understand cold haha I couldnt even swim in it. Personally I would upgrade breakfasts and try to get more pools/hot tubs. Youd have a lot more stays.

 -358-8685 - I cant talk at work, use email or here.  S Concord St Concord, Mi  My mistake, I was told we only stay in Choice hotels so it was under the assumption that was one. Im back into the comfort in air port for a couple nights because this is where my company is regularly used and the ladies you have working the front desk here are phenomenal. If you had a hot tub here Id be thrilled every time I stayed. These are nice hotels, Im not complaining, Im simply offering a suggestion to make it better. Ill try the breakfast in the morning and see how that is, thank you for reaching out, its awesome to see a company use social media for good. Allow for guests staying to use choice hotels points no matter who booked. My company pays for the rooms but they arent the ones in the room and they dont collect points either.

Thanks a lot! I had asked them when they checked me in and they said they couldnt do it in the system because I didnt use it to sign up the room. Thats so awesome! Thank you for that. Ill be sure to ask them again and let them know its possible. If not then Ill be sure to reach back out. Im not sure the next hotel yet but Ill be happy to keep you guys updated on our stays so you know how things are going. Again I really appreciate all of this. I wasnt expecting anything since it was just kind of a small complaint for no hot tub. Your team is excellent and Im happy to be staying in your hotels. You as well, thanks again. Grand Rapids, MI 
Staying just tonight.
They also couldnt add my rewards number here due to being booked on Expedia with my job he said. So in  hours Ill ask for that.

Staff is great so far, room was nice and clean. I really like the set up of the rooms, again no pool or hot tub so thats a disappointment. Ill let you know how breakfast is here. Oh thats awesome. Sorry Fernando its not me that books them, its my work that does it so Im just trying to get points when I can at the right places. I dont have any control over the booking at all. I appreciate the points for the promotion too, I like choice hotels so Ill be happy to stay in them on my free time too. Your team has been amazing and since I live out of hotels its nice having a team I can rely on. Well Im back at the econo lodge in the same room I was in last time. This time Im not sure whats going on but this noise has been going on for a good  hours now and Im not sure what it is. It keeps waking me up and not only was yesterday an extremely hard day climbing cell towers because it was cold but it was super windy as well so you could imagine Im pretty tired. This is the first issue Ive had at any choice hotel but its a pretty aggravating one. This econolodge is pretty outdated with pretty much no amenities so its a disappointment to have to write you this. The company gets a great deal here and uses this place religiously so no doubt Ill be staying here many more times but not if Im choosing. I have to be up at :30am not a fun day doing dangerous activities on little sleep. Im not in the hotel, Ive been out since am working. Im actually not the only one on my crew that had the issue. It sounds like the plumbing there is what causes the issue. We both noticed someone was in a shower or using water when the noise was going on. Appreciate all your help and thank you for that. Were at a comfort in over in Utica, Mi for the night. Hotel staff as usual was amazing. Cant use points because work booked through Expedia again. Never had an issue with any staff members so far. Elvis is the front desk gentleman here and he was absolutely great. Rooms are nice here. Still the only complaint is no hot tub/pool/lack of amenities. I do love the direct tv here and so much to choose from. Im heading back to the econo lodge for the next  nights so well see how they go. I got lucky and it was full, all choice rooms were so Im at a holiday inn express. Ill let you know next time Im bunks up in a choice hotel next week. Thanks for all the help. Ive been in the comfort inn airport again in Grand Rapids for a  night stay so Ill get ahold of you guys Monday to see if we can add my rewards. Im not sure how she booked it but I think it was through the choice website this time. I believe its been the allotted time. MW1261 is my rewards number.

Grand Rapids, MI  night stay May nd-5th.
Hopefully she didnt book it rd party. Everything was good with the stay. Thank you Fernando, much appreciated.

Message:
I booked a  night stay at Wingate by Wyndham in Greenville Noth Carolina the weekend of March   through Expedia. When we checked in and went to our room (10pm), not only were some of the blankets and pillows dirty, but we could very clearly hear the people in the room next to us laughing and carrying on - note we had to get up at am the next morning and were told there was a no party policy and all guests needed to start quieting down at pm. We had to call the front desk THREE TIMES before the noise issue was remediated at AM. By  AM it was evident that there was a physical altercation and the police were called to physically remove these people from the hotel - which then carried over into the parking lot for another hour. 

The next morning when we go to take shower, there is ZERO water pressure and not only that but the water was FREEZING cold. So all of my guests that were with me, including myself, took a cold shower to the point where our finger nails were turning purple and had constant shivers. 

Upon checkout I informed the front desk who took down my information and told me I would hear from a manager Monday. Monday morning, afternoon and evening came and went without me hearing anything so I decided to call the hotel. NO MANAGEMENT ON STAFF. I was told to call Tuesday between the hours of am and pm. Tuesday I call during the hours I was told, NO MANAGEMENT ON STAFF. I was told a manager would be coming in at pm that day. I asked for a name and COULD NOT BE TOLD a name because their schedule was not posted. 

I call Wingate corporate and was directed back to expedia for a refund. I paid $105 dollars for a crappy stay at what I thought was a reputable hotel. Expedia informed me I would receive a $75 refund - NEVER RECEIVED. I continue to call Expedia and work with their customer service MULTIPLE TIMES - starting the process over and over and over each time. The first  calls i was told I would receive a refund. The th time Im told Wingate has now been bought out by Comfort Inn and have no record of my stay. I was offered a coupon, but who wants a coupon to another crappy night stay at a crappy hotel? I continued requesting a refund. Expedia opened a service request and could still not contact a manager. It was becoming clear that a refund was never intended and the coupon was offered to shut me up and end the conversation. 

I receive an email stating the hotel wanted to maintain their terms and conditions and I would not receive a refund but instead a $25 coupon. To that I ask, is this what your customers are worth to you?? $25? I will NEVER stay at another Wingate. I am HIGHLY disappointed in Expedia, Wingate by Wyndham and Comfort Inn for this horrible customer service, lack of quality in a hotel, and frankly just not caring. 

I hope no one has to experience what I did when using Expedia or staying at a hotel that they were under the impression is a nice hotel. I actually recommend not using Expedia or staying at Wingate or Comfort Inn at all. Choice Hotels thank you for responding. I have posted this to the fb page for wingate as well. I was looking for comfort inn and must have click your page by mistake. Choice Hotels if you could help direct me to the comfort in fb page that would be amazing! Message:
Hello in my search of trying to find head office that deals work comfort inn and suits I found your management company.

I had some big concerns with my room. I'm not a picky person I just really wanted clean sheets.. Manager and front desk people were horrible to deal with Before I put on Google and trip advisor etc I thought I would forward to hopefully a head office I am not picky but it's gross I just wanted clean sheets. I picked this hotel trying to stay close to a dying\palliative relative and lots of hotels were booked. I have my kids with me that i thought having a water slide and pool would help keep them entertained while dealing with my relatives needs. The hotels manager and front desk attendant attitudes sucks when you bring up concerns.. They tried to tell me the drips behind the one headboard was from covid cleaning measures. I highly doubt there is any covid cleaning measures happening here... we were leaving the hotel for two hours to be with our dying family member and they said they would put clean sheets on. We returned hrs later and nothing was done so i went to ask why. The manager finally offered me another room after he was getting embarrased of people over hearing me explain my issues and showing pictures. He showed me another room I pulled back the sheets infront of him  in the new room and those sheets were  stained and gross 
Comicon a big event was happening I  the city and hotel were limited. 

 I then checked out google reviews to see if anyone else had similar gross dirty room issues...  someone recently found used undergarment in their bed like wtf

I never did get new sheets, followed up on etc. The hotel was disgusting. After everything room a couple down from me had loads of people partying, music blaring way too many people in the room at am I had to call and ask the front desk what was going on. 

It was the worst stay at a hotel where everything felt super unclean This is a Google review that also confirms cleanliness issue there are many... Thank you I arrived April  paid the extra $30 for early checkin and left April  by am. My room # was  The room they eventually offered me was just up from my #203 room maybe  or  same side of the hallway. But I declined that  one because the sheets were stained when I peeled them back with the manager Name of the reservation was under my name I think or my husband's 
 ) Lannea Mcleod 
 )Jenman Luk 

I forgot who my husband booked it under when he called them Thanks for following up sorry I've been away in and out of the house with a family  member in palliative care. 

I just forwarded my issues to a higher level hoping that management issues at the hotel was dealt with. I don't need a anything in return I do appreciate all thr follow up and kind offer. But honestly I just hope my information gets to the right people to make positive changes. It was such a crazy experience and for or it to be this bad it didn't happen overnight.  It must have been  a long process of low standards that people higher up might not havd been aware of. 
I stayed at the days inn the two nights prior very similar hotel but i had such a great clean stay. I just couldn't believe it was such an opposite in experience from one hotel that was similar to this one. 

Please just forward my info to the right people is all that I ask. The manager and front desk people will hopefully be educated  how wrong this was. I was just shocked at how normal and unphased him and the frony desk person was with my concerns. Maybe hotel management isn't the right career choice for them. Or hopefully they will strive to do better. If the basic cleanliness is not prioritized what else are they missing \hiding. 

Thanks again for all your follow up. I appreciate it. Just send info to the right hands so they can be informed of what's going on

Take care
Summary_T5_1: The hotel manager and front desk attendant attitudes sucks when you bring up concerns. They tried to tell me the drips behind the one headboard was from covid cleaning measures. It was the worst stay at a hotel where everything felt super unclean.
Summary_T5_2: google review confirms hotel was gross staff sucked

Message: I had a terrible experience at one in Allentown several years ago, a problem with housekeeping, and the manager at the desk didn't care. (He actually said those words.)  I said fine, in that case I'm not satisfied with my stay and I need a refund, and pointed to the sign on the wall where it says satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.  He said and I quote, "Don't point at the sign, I don't care about that sign, I don't care that you're not happy, no refund, you can leave now."  Not wanting to get arrested for trespass (or for strangling him with a telephone cord), I left.  Corporate customer service said they would look into it, believed the complete BS the manager told them, did absolutely nothing for me and said they "considered the matter closed".  I responded politely but assertively that everything the manager told them was a lie; they offered me $25.  I declined. They called to discuss, and I ended up with vouchers for three nights at any Choice location. Point being... if you have a problem, stay polite, don't take no for an answer, and don't accept any offer that you're not completely satisfied with:  it may take a few tries, but Choice customer service will eventually make it right.
Summary_T5_1: The manager at the desk at Choice in Allentown didn't care about her complaints. She said she needed a refund and pointed to a sign on the wall where it said satisfaction guaranteed or your money back. Choice customer service said they would look into the matter and considered the matter closed.
Summary_T5_2: didnt care manager told us hes fined

Message: Would never stay at the comfort inn in Cadiz Kentucky I have never been treated so rudely and with a threatening attitude by the manager because I was frustrated after traveling  hour my room was ready at :55.  I left in tears after he wouldnt give me a room never again I cant believe someone would treat another person that way. Could you please call me  -6678 to discuss I arrived at the comfort inn at :55 the girl at the desk said she had no dog rooms ready and I should leave and come back.  I had been traveling since :00 am she didnt  offer a time I was the frustrated and said I thought check in was at :: she then told me it wasnt three yet I asked what time it was I said you got to be kidding me at that time the manager came out upset thinking I was not appreciative of his staff I never raised my voice swore or said anything about the staff he became more agitated I asked him to stop numerous times and to stop yelling at me I couldnt believe it I was frustrated but not angry. The girl then said she had a room on the second floor I said that was fine she asked me how big my dogs were when I told her she said we really dont want to take dogs and told me my dogs were not nine pounds each.  During the conversation I must have said stop giving me crap the the manager really started yelling and told me to leave.  I couldnt believe it I begged for a room and pleaded for him to stop I have never ever been treated so threatening and rude in my life.  There was absolutely no customer service I have been a nurse for  years never can understand how cruel this person was. He told me he didnt want my service and told me to get out he also said everything was recorded maybe some really needs to listen to it.  I left in tears so upset bothered me for days thinking how I could of handled it better even when I explained my situation he was so mean.  I will never stay in a hotel that would let a manager treat anyone the way he treated me.  I dont expect much maybe an apology he made me afraid I was thinking about calling the police but I left peacefully I never raised my voice I believe he really needs anger management and the girl was quiet just looking at me I am sure she didnt want to loose her job. Thanks for listening but never again will I stay at a place like that.  Did find a room in eddyville a super  good experience but I guess staff not very friendly in Kentucky.  My reservation number  on April  thanks for your concern It is a shame this goes on at this hotel from now on choice hotels will not be where I choose to stay   Great words from you but I am sure nothing will be done.  Already looking for different hotels for next year. Thank you for the offer of a free room, but that does not change my view of this hotel chain.  Offering a free night does not take away the extremely rude and aggressive way in which I was treated. I will not support a business that allows this to continue to occur.  I have been and will continue to share my experience with others. Your manager at Cadiz resort told me to get out and he doesnt need or want my business that says it all
Summary_T5_1: I have never been treated so threatening and rude in my life. The manager told me he didnt want my service and told me to get out. I left in tears after he wouldn't give me a room ever again.

On March th I booked a room for May th at Comfort Suites in Batesville, MS. I booked it online thinking I was using the choice hotels website since it was the first to come up when searching, and it looked a lot like the choice hotel website. Once I booked I realized my mistake and called the company immediately. They refused to do anything because it was  nonrefundable. Since I still needed the reservation I didn't go any further.  Now, our tournament has been canceled and I can't cancel the room through the company and get any of the money back that I spent. I also tried calling the hotel directly and choice hotels.  They both told me that there was nothing that could be done because I booked through this company.  I asked both the hotel and the  choice gotel representative if I could use the credit for another room, they also refused that. So now I've paid for a service I will never receive.  CMM1006
Cass Garrett

Pisgah, AL 

Comfort Suites  Covenant Drive
Batesville,  MS

I will be following up legally if not. Econo lodge Portland airport, rude, kept calling me sir, then charged me $275 saying I broke their TV - I didnt watch it or even touch it.. #TransWomenAreWomen #transphobia #fraud  Fraud. Stay away from Econo Lodge Portland Airport. They charged my card $275 they claim for a broken TV. I am a quiet and cautious person and traveler. I am on a vacation to get out into nature didnt even touch the TV. Kept calling me sir #discrimination #trans   Yeah they kept calling me sir from the start and the phone call with them today. So rude. Like I am on a calm and chill nature vacation. Im not going around breaking things??? Im calling legal aid tomorrow if its not refunded immediately.  Choice Hotels is not helping. Offering me points toward a free $60 stay at another econo lodge (which might try to also take advantage of me, a trans person) and no accountability for the $275 fraudulent charge. I guess because I am transgender it is safe to assume I am a baddie  Still no accountability from  Since I am transgender its where Econo Lodge and Choice hotels stands that it is okay to assume I am at fault. Trans folks, especially trans women, stay away from this Portland location as the management obviously has it out for us. Paying the #trans tax, when people or orgs take from you extra because of your identity.   charged me $275 for a broken tv they insinuate I had lots of people coming in and out. I am a professional and single parent. If I was cis this would not happen I was the only one in the room. Flight got in late for my vacation to Oregon to enjoy the great outdoors and I went to bed. No time or money to go around breaking tvs. This is the #trans tax and price we pay to exist.  trans folks stay away from Portland location  I have done this already and still no appropriate response. I dont want a few points for the inconvenience. I want and need my $275 back.

Message:
Hello,

These are the photos and videos regarding the case. There are moldy cabinets, a toilet that won't flush, an air conditioner not working, a fire alarm hung on the ceiling with duck tape, and the entire room smells like weed.

This is in the Mainstays suites Jeffersontown in Louisville, KY.

I talked to Alex on the phone about a refund of my money paid for the stay. This unfortunately looked like a great deal, but after checking in, we saw other-wise.

Thank you for your cooperation,
Emma Kreis

--
Emma Kreis
Virginia Tech
Thank you for your quick response. My arrival date was today, May and my confirmation number is9167852709635. Due to a festival going on in Louisville, we were unable to get a hotel room tonight, but were able to for the remainder of our trip. We are checking out early tomorrow morning and switching to our new hotel. We're trying to make things work tonight, but again it's not the conditions you really want to stay overnight in.

Thank you so much for reaching out and I'm hoping we can move along with the refund process smoothly.

Thanks,
Emma Kreis

On Thu, May , , :28 PM Choice Hotels Social Media Emails <

Dear, Emma

Thank you for contacting us and bringing this experience to our attention. Unquestionably, what you have described and shown does not represent what we aim to provide to all our valued guests. We're sorry to hear of your dissatisfaction with the condition and cleanliness of the accommodations.

We will be more than happy to rectify the issues encountered at the hotel. For a proper follow-up, please reply with the confirmation number and the arrival date of your stay? Once we receive the information, we'll continue assisting you.

Regards

Ray
Social Media Team

Message:
Since I'm in the mood to air out companies who owe me money:

 
 
 

You have until COB today to reach out to me about the money that is owed to me or it will go public and I will sue your company.

  We stayed at your Mainstay location in Williamsburg, VA and there were bed bugs. We were told we would be reimbursed for having to move to another hotel at am, plus our laundry and grocery costs. We still haven't received those funds. #IWantMyMoneyBack  DMing now        The hotel agreed to reimburse us for our laundry bill, groceries, and offered to give us choice rewards points. Thank you for the ,000 points offer. Do I need to continue to reach out to the hotel for the reimbursements? (757) -5369
P.O. Box 
Newport News, VA 


Also, I have been waiting for  months to get reimbursed from the hotel. You said you would take care of this if I DM'd you. Instead, I'm still having to call and follow up again. It's been  months of doing the same thing. No one has time to keep calling and calling and calling. That's why I made the tweet in the first place. My email address is  Thank you for the additional points  And, while I understand what you're saying, I'm at Med Express right now because my wife just cut her knee on a bed at yet another Choice Hotel. It's really a shame that these franchise businesses are operating with no real accountability or consequences. I'm a Diamond Elite member because of how much I use your network of hotels. Won't happen again -- I was hoping that the bed bugs was an isolated incident. But now I see that the lack of accountability is par for the course with Choice Hotels and the corporation won't intervene with the exception of offering a few points.  Unfortunately, though you are publicly acting as if you're being proactive, your company is not willing to step in and take accountability for your individual franchised hotels.    We've been waiting for over  months to be reimbursed for our laundry bill and groceries.  Calling and emailing over and over for months on end is a full-time job and I am not getting paid. No customer should have to call and call and call to receive a refund after experiencing bed bugs in the middle of the night and being forced to go to another hotel.  Keep in mind, we had to pay an early check-in fee for the other hotel. They did not do anything except refund us our stay. 

They did not pay for our laundry. You see the receipt that I attached where I paid for my own laundry. Ask them to provide the receipt from paying for my laundry. 

They did not send the money for our groceries. Ask them for a receipt showing the payment.

They said they were putting in a claim with the insurance company and there has been no communication from them since then.      My wife bent down to pick something up and this is what happened I reported it to the front desk. We simply got an apology. 

The front desk attendant from an incident report that he refused to give me a copy of. We've been at Med Express for over  hours, missed a day of work, and she has stitches for the next  weeks. PO Box 
Newport News, VA  Thank you When will the points be deposited? Good evening, I just tried to use the points that were added to my account and was told that this hotel requires a $250 cash deposit when you're using points, which is not listed on the Choice Hotels app anywhere. Now, they have locked my reservation and are saying that it cannot be cancelled and won't be reviewed until tomorrow morning. Can you please help me? The staff says there's nothing they can do. Unfortunately, after my wife was injured at another Choice Hotels earlier, we spent the entire day at the hospital. I didn't see the $250 Cash-only deposit until I got here. We are still sitting in the parking lot I'd honestly just like to be able to sleep We spent the entire day at Med Express And, now we go to use the points you just gifted us and we can't actually use them I'm just asking for the points to be returned so we can book elsewhere We are being told there's nothing the hotel staff can do about it Please, I'm sitting here with my wife, who has stitches from the injury at our hotel this morning, and my children We would just like to be able to sleep Any updates? Thank you   #boycottchoicehotels   #boycottchoicehotels

Message:
To whom it may concern, 

Something needs done about your hotel in New Columbia, PA. I cant begin to fathom how these employees got hired at the front desk, and also housekeeping. What a clown show. 

I reserved two rooms and the conference room. I threw a baby shower for my daughter. We had about  guest. My fianc and I arrived the night before. Several times the front desk got my instructions wrong for the rooms. Ill admit I did change my mind about the room situation a couple times, but they kept getting the info wrong. It was hard to communicate with them. 

My fianc gets employee discounts since he travels and renovates hotels all over. He called about a room and (I think was John), was very rude to him. So I called back. He was ok with me, but odd. 

But what happened Saturday night is insane. We were checking out the conference room and noticed the floors werent swept and tables were dirty. It was also super hot and muggy so we opened door. (They brought a fan for the next day but the room was so disgustingly hot, people were miserable). We asked the front desk if they would clean the room before the next morning or should we sweep it and wipe tables. The girl with the bandana on her head assured us they would. She was nice. No issues with her. Then we went back to the conference room to plan how we would decorate it the next day. 

Suddenly we hear screaming and yelling. 

We walk down to the corner and head to front desk where the noise is coming from. We see the girl with bandana screaming at the employee that has just arrived for her shift. The girl with bandana was screaming that she sits on her fat ass all day. Earlier a woman by the last name of packer (nickname Duff) had ran and hid when she saw the new employee walk in. She voiced that she couldnt stand her.  Duff was dressed so inappropriately for a business setting. Very unkempt. The new girl waking in was actually dressed professional.  

When we approached the front desk to see if everything was ok, the employee that was new on the scene yelled at me and told me to mind my own business and got nasty with me. I responded with wow. And she became enraged. I told her I was calling corporate. She then starts bawling and telling her life story. She said her daughter had just been life-flighted for a mass on her ovaries and then said she (herself) was on disability for  years and her husband works maintenance at that hotel. I told her she shouldnt have come in. I told her she should be with her daughter. But she said she would be fired. I explained to her that no one is that heartless and they cant fire her for a crisis. And during these times hotels are desperate for help. It shows by the people that were working those two days that hotels are definitely desperate.  

Meanwhile the woman with no teeth, and dressed so trashy, was hiding and recording the scene between the two other employees and shes motioning for me to be quiet so she could record. I ignored her. 

We left and shook our heads in disbelief. I couldnt wrap my mind around what just happened. But it doesnt end there. 

We got to our room and theres a dehumidifier in the room and the room smelled moldy. But the room appeared clean. No complaints there. But the next morning we had a DND sign on the door and the housekeeping walked right in!! We kept telling her to leave but she was talking. I wasnt dressed! We told her we got a late checkout for :00 since we were changing rooms to put things in the next room for my daughter. But it was around noon she did this, I believe. Ill have to check times. We still left a tip for her. 

But the room we got my daughter (mother to be) was the king jacuzzi room and there was wet floor around the doorway near bathroom and dehumidifier in her room. The room was clean. My daughter enjoyed her room very much but when she was leaving, she walked out back door, and saw several employees smoking out of glass pipes that smelled like cat pee! She believed it was meth. It was definitely not marijuana. This would explain so many things we witnessed. It would make it all make sense. 

I also want to add that Sundays staff was very strange. They had a dog barking and trying to attack if we even got near the desk! Im terrified of strange dogs. It was a smaller black and white dog. It wouldnt shut up. It kept trying to jump up over the desk! I was there because my key card didnt work for the king room. There was also a very large man in shorts. So unprofessional and gross. They all acted like a scene from the three stooges. 

Not all the employees were bad. We did see an old friend working there who is the son of Doctor ward. Darin ward. He was very friendly. He was working on the pool to get it opened. We did not know he worked there. So not all was bad about our stay. The shower went well. But I will be leaving a review. That hot mess of a hotel, needs revamped. Do better vetting with employees. We shouldnt feel like were stuck in an episode of the Beverly Hillbillies. I trust you will look into this. 

Thank you! Thank you for getting back to me. The hotel rooms were under Bob Pringle and Melanie white. The stays were May th and May th. I will have to get the confirmation number. Thank you so much for looking into this! I didnt get a confirmation for the Sunday night stay we arranged for our daughter. (Mother to be) but I did get one for the Saturday night one that Bob purchased online. His was . The Sunday night room was for our daughter. The king jacuzzi. Mailing address:

Bob Pringle 
PO Box 
Mifflinville PA 

Our physical address is:  W rd st
Nescopeck PA 

Its literally the same town but gps has it as Nescopeck 

The mail is always going to wrong place so we got a P.O. Box for mail. 

The email he used was 


Phone is: -316-3112
Or -317-4722 Thank you so much and you too

Message: Just don't book at Maitland FL... That was by far, the worst I have ever seen. Please read the reviews before you make reservations Good morning! Let me start from the beginning! My friend and I needed the room for an overnight stay in the Orlando area for an event. I booked the room through booking.com. We arrived at Woodspring suites in Maitland FL. on Friday, June rd around check in. The front desk clerk looked like he was high... Raised eyebrows! I told my friend "this guy's looks high!" No biggie! I have him my name and ID. He smirks and asks if we would like to see the room first That should have been our cue to run like the wind! So we got the key card and went to the room (429). The key didn't work! Strike ! So we go back down and tell him that the key didn't work. He programs it for a different room (402). It doesn't work there either. This time I called downstairs, and he comes up. While waiting, my friends noticed that there was a white powdery substance around the threshold of the door across the hall. She says "is that roach powder?" By that time, Mr. Concierge comes up. I say "Hey! Do you guys have roaches?" He told me that he wasn't allowed to tell me that and precedes to open up room ... I was absolutely disgusted and itchy! The  drawer nightstand had all  drawer facings broken off and lying in the drawer spaces. The double bed was filthy and unmade, and was sunken down in the middle. There was trash on the floor and the room was not clean at all. We left immediately to try to find a decent place for the evening. I scratched all night thinking about the roach motel! Thank God I wasn't charged for motel hell!
Summary_T5_1: Guests at Maitland FL.'s Woodspring suites were disgusted and itchy. The room was dirty and unmade, and the bed was sunken down.

Message:
Good afternoon. I am an Associate of a Choice Hotel. I recently found out that Choice Associates are not eligible to receive rewards, or "points", for their stay since we receive a lower price than other Choice Customers.

When I called in this afternoon to Choice Customer Service, the Call Center Representative reiterated Choice Associates were ineligible for the rewards.

The reason for my persistence Associates should be eligible for rewards is to keep up with the competing Hotel Brands and to retain Associates.

IHG Hotel Associates and Marriott Associates are eligible to receive points at their Associate Rates .... their rewards are based on the dollar amount they spend at the property; meaning it takes time for Associates to obtain the higher rewards membership.

When I asked for a manager, the Call Center Representative refused to transfer me to a manager.

I am a former Marriott Call Center Representative, when a customer -- Associate or not -- asked to speak with a Manager, I was obligated to transfer the customer to a manager.

My Account Number is WBS02050 .... I am being persistent with my question not because I am a Platinum Member prior to becoming a Choice Hotel Associate but because I am faced with financial hardship. Summary_Bart:
Good afternoon. I am an Associate of a Choice Hotel. I recently found out that Choice Associates are not eligible to receive rewards, or "points", for their stay since we receive a lower price than other Choice Customers.

When I called in this afternoon to Choice Customer Service, the Call Center Representative reiterated Choice Associates were ineligible for the rewards. 
The reason for my persistence Associates should be eligible for rewards is to keep up with the competing Hotel Brands and to retain Associates.

Yet that TV had been on CNN for over an hour our first morning there. I see that Choice Hotels is now advertising on Fox News. Why not allow your customers to watch their Choice of news in the morning? Is it truly a "policy" as Ms. M----- claims, or just her personal Choice? I was terribly disappointed in Rewards when this past Jan-Feb we traveled to Florida.  nights on our way there,  nights on our way back. Which was  nights in less then  weeks. We received minimal points for those  nights. But did not qualify for the stay  nights get  free. 
We will no longer go out of our way to find choice brand hotels as the rewards are only good if your staying at say a resort or your nightly stay is top dollar. No longer our choice for hotels. My member number is 
SXM041789
Email is

My address is  Hwy D 
Iowa Falls, Ia 

I also check details of my account balance regularly. Its very hard to accumulate points to stay at hotels in the area we go to. Since  weve only received  free night out of many paid nights. On our trip to Florida we would get told that Choice only allows so many discount rooms a night and they wouldnt give us the discount. But we could call choice booking and let them book. 
Ok great but. If its pm or even midnight and you call it takes forever to get that call completed to be able and just get checked in. Thus you give up. Agents always want to discuss other travel plans, give offers, GET your credit card number so they can RESERVE thus wonderful offer.
WE just wanted to get a room and go to bed. So no discount, full price paid and very few points due to hotels not being priced high enough.
Its all a racket! Well of coarse I needed to reserve thru your not online service and that would be fine when your planing based on flying but driving across country your never sure where you will stop. Then add that online doesnt always work so Id call and try to do it but your phone people are so worried about booking us a cruise or extended trip to some other destination that your forced to just check in. 
Thus my reason for saying Choice points are not that great. Way too many hitches to gain.
